Summary: The hotel is well maintained although it was built in the 1950s. The room was spacious, well lit, with nice linens, and the king size bed was very comfortable. They offer amenities like a Keurig and a minibar in the room (no heir dryer, though). At 5pm they offer free wine at the lobby and at 6pm, recently baked cookies. In the morning they have coffee and a large variety of teas.  The view of the sea from the hotel is obstructed but Laguna Beach is such a lovely town, you probably will not spend too much time at the hotel.  The best part of Laguna Beach House was the service.  Everyone, from the reception staff to the janitorial team was VERY friendly and welcoming.

We were pleasantly surprised at the perfection of Laguna Beach House. Location is great, staff was amazing, rooms and beds were fantastic, parking was convenient, no problems at all. Access to beautiful Heisler Park right behind the hotel. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the 5 star review and excellent feedback. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and beachy decor. Thank you for the compliments to our team and property. I am delighted to hear that parking was easy for you as well. We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House in the near future!

Summary: Exceptional place! Clean, friendly, knowledgable and perfect location. We stayed two nights and want to definitely come back and bring our children here. The rooms are perfect and attention to detail is immaculate. 5pm - 6pm free wine is served free at reception and 6pm it’s cookies time! Wonderful place highly recommended!!

Summary Heading: I’d recommend the Laguna Beach House
Summary: Excellent location one block from restaurants, shops, Heisler Park and the beach plus a small pool. The room was nicely appointed, the bed was comfortable, and the daily cookies and wine was a nice touch.

Great location and rooms were clean. It does seem like new mattresses are needed at least in my room. The rooms with the balcony only have a small vanity which is not convenient for a couple. The other rooms have a much larger vanity.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our location and the cleanliness of our rooms. We appreciate the input as we are continually striving to improve the experience for our guests at Laguna Beach House. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: The house cleaning staff routinely DID NOT ensure the door was fully closed after they cleaned it.  We arrived 4 times during our stay and found the door wasn't completely closed.  hat's just not very good but easily fixable. Just need to pay more attention because our room could have been easily robbed.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I apologize for the repeated issue that you experienced during your stay. I have alerted our housekeeping staff to the situation as the safety and security of our guests is very important to us at Laguna Beach House. Please reach out to me directly if I can be of further assistance. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House in the future.

Summary: The best location, near the beaches, parks, and downtown with a small intimate property.  Great updated beach themed rooms.  Very clean, safe property with friendly staff. Daily evening fresh warm cookies and wine hour sitting by the pool firepit sealed the deal. The only place we stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and feedback. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location and beachy decor. Thank you for the compliments to our team and property. We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House in the near future!

Summary: We got the reservations through the Internet at a hotel advisor. If we choose to return I will call the hotel  directly to make reservations because I did not like the room -  a corner room facing a wall was very upsetting to me and took away the joy of being in Laguna. We also didn’t appreciate having to pay $25 a night for parking in the hotel lot.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. We offer may rooms that have balconies, those on the Coastal Level enjoy views of the water. We hope that you will consider staying with us at Laguna Beach House in the future!

Summary: Stayed here for the night. Great location, and good value! Beautiful beach is a 5 minute walk.   The ONLY issue was some bad owner left their crying puppy in their room (above us) while they went and had dinner. They didn't return until after 10:30 pm, which was not only cruel for the dog, but for any other guests that were near their room.
Manager Response: Dear guest. Thank you for the feedback. I apologize for the issue with noise due to an unattended pet. That is against our policy. We want each of our guests to be able to enjoy a relaxing stay and apologize for the disturbance. We hope that you will give Laguna Beach House another chance in the future.

Summary: We found this gem after an exhaustive internet search of all options in the area. Mary Anna at the front desk was very warm and welcoming.  The room location is ideal, we parked the car and found everything was within walking distance.  There is even a free trolley that takes you around town.  We checked in to a balcony view room, great view room was very clean, bed was very comfortable. Best compliment is we will be back Thank You
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at Laguna Beach House!  I am delighted to hear that Meriana gave you a friendly welcome, we sure are lucky to have her. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our convenient location, the great views and comfortable beds. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The hotel is pretty old, the rooms are clean and remodeled, bathrooms need to be updated as well. Book directly or they will comment on that and not treat you well. Even ocean view rooms are partial. A bit pricey for what you get.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. I am sorry that your stay did not go as well as you would have liked. Our intentions are to treat all guests with a warm welcome. I apologize that we did not meet expectations. I hope that you will consider giving Laguna Beach House another chance in the future.

Summary Heading: Very nice stay at Laguna Beach House
Summary: Great little hotel in a great location.  Very clean property & rooms, professional & corteous staff, easy parking, reasonabe walk to beach & downtown restaurants & shops.  Very easy to get in & out of, & beds were comfy, rooms were nice.  Nice coffee bar in the mornings, free wine service at 5pm, & cookies in the evening were a nice touch.  Ocean view from top rooms is nice, but no beach view.   Just a view to the pacific.  Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed feedback regarding your stay with us at Laguna Beach House! I am delighted to know that you enjoyed our well maintained property, courteous staff and the amenities we offer to our guests! We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary: I absolutely loved my stay at LBH! Everything was outstanding. I want to keep this my hidden gem and never write reviews but it was so fabulous not to share :) The location was wonderful and all the staff was so kind. Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review! I am delighted to know that you had a fantastic anniversary trip and stay with us at Laguna Beach House. Thank you for the compliments to our staff! We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We had an excellent stay at the hotel.  We borrowed chairs and towels and sat by the beach.  Great location.  Very clean.  Fresh cookies baked nightly after wine served at 5 pm.  Block from the beach and great location.  Parking is easy, $25.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay with us at Laguna Beach House! I am glad that you were able to use our beach equipment and enjoy Heisler Park and the beaches as well as cookies and wine. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Small Hotel on the Beach
Summary: Wonderful, relaxing stay.  Staff couldn't be friendlier and more helpful.  Beautiful property with close access to beach and oceanside park with beach-view walks.  Rooms are comfortable and cleanly maintained.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments to our staff! I am delighted to hear that you had a relaxing stay and enjoyed our convenient location to Heisler Park. We hope to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary: Overall a wonderful stay! Staff was friendly, it’s at a great part of the city, being right next to the park! Rooms were nice and clean! Service was quality! The cookies were amazing! Overall this was a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful stay with us at Laguna Beach House! Thank you for the compliments to our staff. I am glad that you enjoyed our convenient location to access Heisler Park and were also able to try our delicious freshly baked cookies. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful retro-modern hotel close to the beach and downtown Laguna.
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at Laguna Beach House in January. We found the hotel very comfortable, well designed, and nicely decorated with a retro-modern feel. The pool and jacuzzi were wonderful and we found the pool to be nicely heated in January. The staff was friendly and helpful without being intrusive. The hotel is very close (3-5 min walk) to the beach and beautiful cliffside walking paths. It is also close (10-15 min walk) to the shops and restaurants of downtown Laguna Beach. We can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and review! It is great to hear that you were able to enjoy the pool and jacuzzi facilities and that you enjoyed our convenient location. Thank you for the compliments to our staff! We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary Heading: Great choice for stay in Laguna
Summary: Great location walking distance to shops and restaurants, wonderful customer service, spacious and cozy rooms (including hot water in showers), cozy beds, right on the beach, super dog friendly! Will be coming again.
Manager Response: We are so delighted to hear the feedback about your stay at Laguna Beach House. It is great to know that you enjoyed our convenient location and that your dog had a fun time, too! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Nice location, but for no direct beach access it was a bit pricey. Clean roomy rooms and I appreciated the "dog friendly" status a lot since I was traveling with my Australian Shepherd.  The short walk to my old haunt, Heisler Park was a big plus.  Late night dog walk along the ocean bluff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Laguna Beach House! Our rates do vary so check our website for specials. We are delighted to hear that you and your dog enjoyed our location convenient to Heisler Park!

Summary: I like this hotel very much and would recommend it. It was a good location in Laguna Beach. I especially love the wine and cookie happy hour. Also, the fire pit was great. I also really like that I could use the amenities at the sister hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Laguna Beach House. I am delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy our amenities during your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The guest rooms were bright and clean.  At first I was a little concerned about outside entrance to room, but the area was safe and there was no problem at all.  The hotel was super close to the beach and easy walk to downtown.  Staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments regarding your stay with us at Laguna Beach House. I am glad that you felt safe, that you enjoyed our convenient location and found our staff to be friendly. We hope to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary Heading: An Oasis for a New Yorker
Summary: I came to Laguna Beach to write, to relax and enjoy the wonder of the Pacific. All three goals were accomplished. Laguna Beach House was welcoming, accommodating and the perfect place for me. I would definitely come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am delighted to hear that Laguna Beach House met your needs and you found staff to be accommodating. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: It's been cold and wet at home and we needed to "recharge" when we visited SoCal to see some friends so we decided to go to the beach and stay at the Laguna Beach House.  The room and all the facility were very clean, the staff were friendly and the location was great.  There's a beautiful park along the bluff right behind the hotel where we watched a stunning sunset.  We sat by the pool where there is a gas fireplace, had a cup of wine and talked with other like-minded travelers escaping the cold of home.
Manager Response: I am delighted to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us at Laguna Beach House! I am happy to hear that our facilities met you r expectations and that you took advantage of our convenient location. We hop e to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I loved my stay here! The fresh Chocolate chip cookies, wine hour and fire pit by the pool we’re highlights. The bed was extra comfortable and roomy and the location cannot be beat, steps to Heisler Park and all of north and downtown Laguna Beach at your fingertips. Friendly staff & great value. Highly recommend and will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed our amenities, facilities and convenient location. I appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary: We loved our stay at Laguna Beach Hotel! The location is perfect, walking distance to the beach as well as downtown. The staff was super friendly, facilities were incredibly clean. No complaints at all!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for sharing your comments and recommend us to others. we are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at Laguna Beach House, and we hope to welcome you back in a near future.   Sincerely, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised with our stay at The Laguna Beach House. It’s cozy beach house vibe is charming and you can’t beat the location. It was an easy walk to nearby restaurants and the beach. The staff was attentive and helpful. We will stay here again the next time we are in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the vibe and location of Laguna Beach House. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My husband and I were without an accommodation and walked into Laguna Beach House on Thanksgiving Day (evening). We were met with a friendly and efficient staff member who accommodated us with a very nice room. We walked in somewhat distraught and feeling "homeless" to feeling welcomed and able to breath a big sigh of relief. The place is clean, friendly and conveniently located. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am so glad that we made your Thanksgiving a little warmer and welcoming during your stay at Laguna Beach House. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Good Service The rooms were clean, The staff were very friendly Prices too high for Friday and Saturday night. WE enjoyed coffee and tea in mornings and did not use the wine service but noticed others did. The fresh cookies were wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  I am glad to hear that we met your standards for cleanliness and were able to try our freshly baked cookies. The rates do rise on Friday and Saturday nights. If you check our website you can price a month at a glance to find the best rates for your budget. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: The saltwater pool and hot tub sold me on this place, the balcony off the room was not expected,parking was nice and available, Great location great staff. The free trolley stops around the corner and on the corner across the street so getting around is cool
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!. It sounds like you really enjoyed your stay with us at Laguna Beach House! I am delighted to hear that you took advantage of our amenities and convenient location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Charming, great location and value for the money
Summary: Fantastic location - only a few blocks away from the main downtown area (good, quiet!), the staff was warm and welcoming, and just loved the overall decor and spacious room. GREAT value for the money as well - was much less than nearby hotels, but quality was way better and amenities fantastic (well stocked room, bathrobes, coffee, fridge, nice pool/hot tub with outdoor firepit, chairs for beach).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write such a complimentary review of Laguna Beach House! I am delighted to hear that you were able to thoroughly enjoy our facilities and amenities. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary: We loved our stay at Laguna Beach house! the staff were all super nice and helpful, the fresh cookies were amazing as well as the wine! the room we stayed in and the hotel itself was beautiful too. views are unmatched!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! I am delighted to hear that you loved your stay at Laguna Beach House and that you were able to enjoy the amenities that we offer. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Stop over along the PC Hwy
Summary: Fun hotel - over-the-top friendly and helpful staff - super clean.  Great location - close to the beach and shops.  Great attention to details - wine reception in the evening, cookies in the lobby, coffee and tea in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are grateful to know that you enjoyed your stay with us! Our team focuses on providing a high level of personalized service by going above and beyond to ensure the expectations of our guests are exceeded and that our guests return home with lifelong memories.   thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back in a near future.   Sincerely, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Laguna beach house is a quaint and perfect place to stay. Great location and size of resort was perfect! Staff was friendly and helpful. Rooms were awesome! Close to the beach and walking paths that take you all over Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed our facilities, convenient location and had pleasant interactions with our staff at Laguna Beach House!

Summary: This is a charming, well maintained property on the ocean. The hotel group offers wine hour and cookie amenities - no meal services. Staff was generally pleasant and helpful. The layout and two-story design makes for unwanted noise in first floor rooms.
Manager Response: Than you for the feedback about your stay at Laguna Beach House. We are continually striving to improve the experience for our guests so we appreciate your input.

Summary: We loved this spot! It was a quick stop to decompress after a conference and did not disappoint. The team was friendly and so on top of everything and then room was beautiful. Great location and even snuck in a perfect massage at the place next door. We will be back
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you found Laguna Beach House to be a great spot to unwind and were able to take advantage of our convenient location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Wonderful, quiet, ocean views, grocery store two blocks away. Did I mention quiet? Staff was helpful and friendly, Rooms were clean and delightful, and they have this great ice chest where the ice is bagged up to match the size of your ice bucket in the room - Awesome!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am so delighted that you noticed the details and enjoyed our friendly staff and convenient location. Thank you for the feedback, we look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary: We love The Laguna Beach House and will most certainly be back!  This location is perfectly located to shops & restaurants & most importantly, the ocean! The hotel is beautiful and staff was so friendly!  Thank you for the wonderful time!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback! I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our convenient proximity to the beach and excellent dining options> We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a good price.
Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Laguna Beach House.  It was very convenient to many local restaurants and the beach.  The area felt very safe and everything was clean.  The staff was very friendly. I arrived a little early and was able to check in right away.  The parking area is well lit and had plenty of room to maneuver.  There are some really good restaurants and coffee stops with a 5 minute walk too.  I’d definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, It is also great to hear that you enjoyed a quiet retreat outside the center of Laguna and that our team delivered outstanding service to exceed your expectations.  We are happy to hear you are planning to stay with us again and thank you for recommending us to others!  Sincerely, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: It was decent for the price. I think it was overpriced for sure. The hotel is old and needs to be updated. The sleep quality was terrible due to screaming and running children upstairs. The beds and pillows were comfy though.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We are sorry to hear about the unnecessary noise that you experienced and can understand your disappointment. Can you please reach out to me at cagonzalez@thelagunabeachhouse.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Totally charming hotel, location/rooms/amenities/staff were great and tasteful, there was even sunscreen available by the pool,! There was complementary coffee in the morning, wine at night, and cookies too. didn't want to leave, would definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are delighted that you were able to enjoy the many amenities here at Laguna Beach House. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary: Lovely hotel in Laguna beach. Had everything we needed and a relaxing atmosphere as well. Lovely design throughout and lovely touches such as fresh cookies in the evening. Pool beautiful. Great views from the balcony
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am delighted to hear that we met your needs during your stay at Laguna Beach House and that you were able to enjoy the amenities that we offer. I hope that you are able to return for another visit soon!

Summary Heading: Laguna Beach House - a great place to visit!
Summary: The Laguna Beach House is located close to the beach!  The facility is well maintained, and the staff is friendly and helpful.  It is a short walk to the FANTASTIC Heisler Park which has a amazing cliffside walking paths and lots of places to sightsee, take photos, and visit the beach.  The Laguna Beach House and surrounding areas are worth the trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the property at Laguna Beach House and our beautiful surrounding areas. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I was surprised our pool floor room had a little outdoor balcony. It faced a nursery that was actually really cute.  Beach was a 10 min Gorgeous walk and the hotel provided towels, toys, chairs and an umbrella
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are very excited to know that you have enjoyed your stay with us. thank you for letting us know that we exceeded your expectations with our facilities and services.  We hope to welcome you back in a near future.   Warm regards, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: A wonderful beach hotel with amazing staff in a perfect location
Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at this property for week and would highly recommend this hotel. The location is excellent and the deco throughout the hotel and in room is the perfect look and feel for a beach hotel with surf boards and classic beach memorabilia throughout which puts you in a great mood from the moment you walk in. The staff was friendly, helpful and caring and that's hard to find these days. They pump a certain scent through the lobby / front desk area and hotel smells so good, its very unique.  The room I stayed in was charming, with a surfboard above my queen size bed. The room included a refrigerator which is nice to have and had a balcony that included a table and chairs if you wanted to eat breakfast outside and full size pool lounge so you can grab some
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are thrilled to hear that your stay at our Hotel and appreciate the recommendation to others!  Hope next time you visit California that you choose to stay with us again!   Sincerely, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Everything about our stay was excellent: great facilities, comfortable beds, convenient location. We easily walked to the beach and nearby restaurants. The hotel was quiet but also everyone we met—guests and staff—were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks you for sharing your great experience at our property.  we are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, our facilities and our staff.   Thank you so much for choosing us as your Hotel in your visit to Laguna Beach, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in a near future.   Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Staff were both friendly and knowledgeable.  Just outside downtown core but easily walkable to galleries and restaurants downtown with some good galleries just steps away and a great breakfast “Urth restaurant” two blocks away.  Offerings of a glass of wine to start your evening and cookies at the front desk as a treat later were simply small pleasures, but amply covered by their daily amenities charge.  From street the hotel is not a “stand out” but it’s retro 60s decor is well maintained.  Bed a bit soft for my back but big thick towels and skin care moisturizer were very appreciated.  The smaller venue gave you the opportunity at poolside to feel more at ease in opening a  conversation with others gathered around the fire pit.
Manager Response: Dear Gary Party,  We are thankful that you stayed with us and thrilled that you loved the amenities we have every day for our guests plus relaxing at the pool! Recommendations to others is always appreciated!  We hope to welcome you back in a near future!  Warm regards, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: We loved the location of the hotel as we could walk to dining options and shops. The bed was very comfortable and love the decor.The view from the balcony was nice as well.We had king size bed with coastal view room.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are grateful that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience at the Laguna Beach House.   Please visit us again soon!  Best regards, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: This was a wonderful hotel and the location is convenient to restaurants, shops and main beach. The property was very clean and the staff was always friendly. Our only issue was our room keys needing to be reset multiple times. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your feedback on your experience.  we are happy to hear you had a great time during your visit, and we are also thrilled to hear that we have exceed your expectations with our staff and the property.  I do apologize for  the inconvenient you experienced with the keys.  We hope to welcome you back in a near future.   Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: It was me and my girlfriends 1 year anniversary we stayed here for 3 days, 2 nights. Beautiful stay, friendly, parking was amazing and safe, view and scenery was ok and was really close to the beach. Pool was just a bit dirty but for the most part perfect! Thank-you again will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us in celebration of your 1st year anniversary, and we apologize for the quality of your experience at the pool area.   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your comments.  Warm regards, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. The team is so friendly, and you really have the feeling you are staying at a family's home. Just the price per night tells you, you are not :-). We were there late SEP and prices were really high. Everything was clean, which is important for us. The "complementary" coffee was also very good. The pool are is tiny, no showers. Parking is also perfect. The Hotel originally a Motel, which you can see form old  architecture. So it gives the hole Hotel a vintage look. The location is near to the beach, and some restaurants. We would come back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are grateful that you stayed with us, and that you recommend our property to others! Our team focuses on providing a high level of personalized service by going above and beyond to ensure the expectations of our guests are exceeded and that our guests return home with lifelong memories. We are thrilled that you will definitely be returning and we look forward for your next visit!  Sincerely, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Great location, updated rooms, quiet pool deck, wine hour in the evening, kid friendly,  Complementary boogie board loaners. Helpful staff. Rooms are very clean.Great experience. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We appreciate the kind words and that you chose to stay with us. it is great to hear that you enjoyed our facilities and the exquisite wine hour plus the excellence in the service of our team. We make every day a new effort to provide our guest an unique service, since our goal is to make each and every one of our guest to feel like they are part of our family.   Thank you so much for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back in a near future.   Sincerely, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Very happy with the bedding & pillow comfort. Liked the late night cookies & water too! Friendly staff and great location. Wish the required amount of review characters wasn't so long...Just writing now to fill the 200 minimum amount.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to recommend us to others. we are happy to hear you had a great experience, and that you enjoyed our facilities and amenities prepared for our guests.  We hope to welcome you back in a near future.  Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: The hotel is very beautiful and in a great location. The staff is friendly. The parking is easy and its steps from the beach. The pool is quaint and nice. The wine hour is great. However, the hotel is a bit outdated and the rooms A/C didnt work for us.

Charming hotel. Friendly and helpful staff. Glass of wine and there were cookies when we checked in. It was a nice 15 minute walk to Pageant of the Masters. Close to beach, restaurants, shopping and galleries.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. I am delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy our amenities and took advantage of our convenient location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Took my man here for his birthday stayed pool level which was perfect the pool was right outside of the room. Everything was a 5 to 8 minute walk which was awesome. Parking was expensive and sad there is no concierge to help with special requests like a birthday. The hotel is very clean and cute though.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for your choosing The Laguna Beach House as your Hotel in your visit to Laguna.   We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stayed with us and the location of our property.   We hope to welcome you back in a near future.   Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: My wife and I stayed at LBH during a work trip of mine.  It was clean and quiet, and its location was wonderful for my wife to find things to do during the day.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Good, easy parking!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us al Laguna Beach House Hotel.  We are pleased to hear that you found everything you needed for your trip, and that along with it you enjoyed your stay in our property.   Thank you so much for your comments, and we hope to welcome you back in a near future.   Warm regards, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: This is the best upper-end, affordable hotel in Laguna Beach (next level Inn at Laguna Beach, Ritz Carlton, Montage).  Clean, upgraded rooms, all the amenities that you need - love the beach chairs and umbrellas
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations.   We hope to welcome you back in a near future!  Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Wonderful vacation spot in Laguna Beach
Summary: Wonderful location in Laguna Beach, close to walk to Las Brias for dinner; downtown for lunch; walks on the beach. Room great, staff wonderful  Perfect get away, bed /room so comfortable. Stayed 4 nite
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and the location of our property.  Thank you for sharing your comments.  We hope to welcome you back in a near future!  Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Location was amazing, 3 minute walk to the beach. The hotel will give you beach chairs, towels and an umbrella to enjoy on the beach which I thought was a great touch! Came back from the beach to complimentary wine! Cookies and breakfast served with a friendly staff! Amazing view and clean room. Overall great experience and will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations.   We hope to welcome you back in a near future!  Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Very nice remodel achieving the beach motif and located very close to the main beach and the town of Laguna.  The cleanliness of the rooms was excellent.  Great, friendly staff.  Nice pool for couples, but a bit small for families.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations.   Thank you so much for your comments, and we are looking forward for your stay with us in a near future.   Warm regards, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Staff was amazing and the special thanks goes out to Kristopher with a K. He was always smiling, very helpful attentive
Summary: Love the location of the hotel, the cleanliness of the rooms, the decorations and especially the staff. The staff with Ari, Michelle, Carlos, Kristopher and many others went above and beyond to take care of our group. Ari was also super and got us all setup once again the year.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Gregg,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations.  It was a real pleasure to have you all as our Guests.  If you need anything please don't hesitate to contact us directly to the Hotel.  Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Took a trip with a group from Trilogy at Vistansia in Peoria AZ for 4 days.  What a wonderful experience and location!  Easy walk to shopping, beach and restaurants and bars.  Kristopher at the front desk was super helpful and friendly, always available to help us and give assistance and directions.  And, the room was made up each night….what a change from the chain hotels that always give the Covig excuse for why their service is subpar.  If you’re ever in Laguna Beach, it’s the place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. James,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations.   Thank you so much for your comments, and we are looking forward for your stay with us in a near future.   If you need anything please don't hesitate to contact us directly to the Hotel.  Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Perfect Casual Weekend in Laguna Beach
Summary: Nice Beach Feel. Updated, retro, beach hotel, stylish but not pretentious at all. We had wonderful weekend and the corner room with private patio/courtyard was a treat. Clean, simple style and was a comfortable "home base" for wandering around Laguna. Pool was not fabulous, but nice hot tub and very comfy bath robes.  All in all, an easy and pleasant hotel experience.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations.   We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in a near future.  Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: 2 night Stay at Laguna Beach House
Summary: Beautiful location, lovely rooms that are comfortable, clean, great pool, friendly staff, walking distance for beach, kids friendly. We loved out 2 days here and would definitely come back again! Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we exceeded your expectations.   Thank you for your comments, and we are looking forward for your stay with us in a near future.   If you need anything please don't hesitate to contact us directly to the Hotel and we will happy to assist you.   Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Very convenient and ideally situated.  Close to everything.  Not a beach front property but serves its purpose.  Staff was friendly but information with regards to their sister hotel about the Happy hour was incorrect.  The room was clean but do not have a mini bar.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House Hotel.   we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we are sorry to hear you didn't receive a correct information with regards to our sister property.   Thank you for your comments and giving us the opportunity to improve our services.   Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: Very cool and cosy hotel with the feeling of a local motel conbined with all the ammenities of a hotel. Really awesome pool patio in the back (away from the street) with ocean view over the roof tops and a very nice fireplace. Hesler Park and a beautifull park walk to the beach right behind the hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and every detail we have prepared for our Guest to have a great experience.   Thank you so much for your comments, and we are looking forward for your stay with us in a near future.   Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary Heading: Very cute stay walking distance to everything
Summary: Very beachy and cute hotel. The room is comfortable however the noise from the pool and in room air conditioning difficult.  Overall friendly and thoughtful style really helpful in considering it for a future stay. Great underground and safe parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us at Laguna Beach House.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.   We are working to improve our services and we hope that in a future stay you could have an even better experience at our Hotel.    Best, Carlos Gonzalez

Summary: This place use to be a diamond but they have decided to let lots of families book at one time.  The pool is small and when the kiddos take over it no longer a place to relax, read or just nap. Don't get me wrong I love kids but the area for pooltime is small. There is not much for kids to do!  Rooms are also very pricey $$$ and if you pay you want to have some relaxation.

Summary Heading: Great place, would stay at again.
Summary: The desk and housekeeping staff were outstanding; friendly, polite, helpful! The room was clean and cool when I arrived. The provided amenities were spot on. The view from the balcony was just plain awesome!

Amazing location,nperfect for a couples get away. The young man checking us in couldn’t answer any of our questions, which were details about our booking +  why we chose this hotel… just started the experience off wrong. The room was just ok.. sticky muggy rooms, said there was AC but ours definitely wasn’t functioning. Floors felt slimy or sticky and I didn’t feel comfortable walking without my slides on. But all the bummer hotel moments were doable because of the location. Just walk around the block and you’re at the sea wall with a great walking trail. Truly majestic!

This was my first solo trip in honor of my 50th birthday. The hotel is quaint and sweet and I felt very safe. I didn't have a car and I didn't need it. There are so many things to do within walking distance. Shops and restaurants and the ocean is just steps away. The pool is very small but it totally met my needs. The staff was helpful and kind in answering all of my questions and giving recommendations. This is not a 5 star resort. It feels more like an Air B&B and that is totally my vibe. Totally recommend.

Our experience was great overall! Very clean rooms with nice amenities (complementary coffee in the AM and wine and cookies in the PM; towels chairs and umbrellas for the beach). The location if within perfect walking distance to downtown Laguna Beach and the trolley. The staff, especially Carlos, were nice, friendly and very helpful!!! 10/10 would stay here again!!!

Ambience - yes!  Such a cute hotel with a charming beachy motel feel.  The room was very well appointed with a comfy bed and pillows, but the A/C was quite noisy making it hard to sleep.  The location is a 10!  So close and walkable to everything.  Heisler Park is not to be missed.  One of the prettiest beach boardwalks I've ever seen.  Sadly, the price was over the top.  Total was over $1K for 2 nights (Wed & Thurs.) w/2 days parking.   Yes, there was coffee in the room and free wine and cookies, but this price is hard to accept for what we got.

Summary Heading: Laguna Beach House is a Hidden Treasure
Summary: Laguna Beach House is perched a half block up from Heisler park and one of the most scenic views on the California coast.. Peek-a-boo water can be seen on property from the inviting pool/jacuzzi/fire pit area and a number of rooms. The cheerful surfing theme makes for a relaxing vibe, and the ocean air and comfortable amenities encourage a good night's sleep. Well behaved dogs are welcome - not one woof was heard.  Laguna's Village and Main Beach are just a few short blocks away, and you can leave your car parked in the covered parking lot and walk everywhere, or just take the trolly.  Beach visits are encouraged by providing needed supplies.  Tip: The first Thursday of each month 6:00 - 9:00 is the much loved Art Walk. People stroll in and out of art galleries, (some serve

This remodeled classic Motel was perfectly located as it was walking distance to restaurants and the beach.   You could walk almost anywhere or opt to take the free local trolly with several stops a short walk from the hotel.  The rooms were large, clean and had a great beachy feel.  I did wish our private patio was a little nicer and the pool is a fun stop but does not warrant more than a hours stay.  The staff were above and beyond and the hotel has everything that you could need to enjoy a day at the beach.  I would high

First time stay! Loved everything about LBH. Great staff, great room and wonderful location. We normally stay at larger hotels when we travel, but we will always stay here for our future trips to Laguna Beach. The location was so convenient…easy walk to grocery store, coffee shops and restaurants. And of course to the beach! Loved the evening wine and late night cookies!

Great location. Very cute and clean hotel. Close to everything and easy to walk to places. Great covered parking, friendly staff! Great little pool, jacuzzi and fire pit.cookies and wine served at 6 pm and great coffee and tea all morning.

My sisters and I had the most wonderful experience here during our first ever girls trip. We stayed 3 nights and the staff were more than accommodating when we asked for extra pillows and dozens of towels. They offered us free beach chairs and umbrellas for our beach visits, which was just a 3 minute walk. They happily gave us recommendations on restaurants and all of them were wonderful. The beds were very comfortable and we felt very safe. The pool and hot tub area is beautiful and well maintained. The nightly fire pit was so nice too! Almost everything we did was within walking distance and we quickly grew fond of the neighborhood and downtown areas as well. The whole place had a great vibe and really made our trip enjoyable. We will definitely stay here again!

This hotel is so great. I fell in love with the lobby and with the fact that is really family and pet friendly.  It has a great game room, and bar area. the outdoor space is so nice with multiple fire pits and a green lawn perfect for kids to run around and the view of the pine trees and mountains is the perfect extra.

Summary Heading: Disappointed with room view; feeling of “bait and switch” (read review)
Summary: Pros: very friendly staff; clean, quiet room; cozy robes and nice toiletries provided; Keurig for inroom coffee; comfortable beds and pillows; AC in rooms; close to Heiser Park; covered parking area; wine at 5 pm, warm cookies at 6 pm, beach chairs and towels available; nice fire table in pool area  Cons: Parking $25 a night; unexpected $25 per night amenity fee; AC a bit loud; the pool area and jacuzzi were dominated by families with children. The pool closes at 9 pm but jacuzzi open until 11 and children used the jacuzzi after 9 pm.  Balcony very small with stucco walls, not pleasant to sit on due to traffic noise from Coast Highway  Our big disappointment with this hotel was the feeling of “bait and switch” in regard to the room. My husband booked it based on the mostly

Summary Heading: Great stay! Nice size room! Very clean!
Summary: I had absolutely amazing experience! The hotel was very clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Thank you so much!! I already recommend your place to my friends and hopefully to come back here soon.

The hotel is so close to the beach! Just walk around the corner and you can see the ocean. Just a quick walk to the shore. Definitely worth it for the location alone, but the room was nice, roomy, and clean as well. Pool & spa were also lovely.

We had a wonderful welcome when we arrived, with added information about restaurants and transport around the area. Our room had a great vibe about it and we loved the decor. Very comfortable bed, and spacious room and bathroom. The dressing gowns were a great plus, very soft. We loved the pool area, jacuzzi and fire pit. The loungers were super comfy.  This hotel is in a great location, such a pleasant stroll , by the beach, to get downtown in about 10 mins where there are some fabulous restaurants.  Loved the wine in the evening and cookies before going to bed- Parking was very easy, a little pricey for us English but this is California and we have noticed parking is at a premium.  We could only give 4/5 stars because realistically we did think the overall price was a little

Great location. Nice room. Clean facilities. Hip vibe. Easy walking distance to shopping and restaurant area. Easy in/out underground parking. Nice little touches - nightly wine hour and frame baked cookies.

Summary Heading: Laguna Beach House is a gem!
Summary: Laguna Beach House was so warm welcoming, with very friendly and knowledgeable staff. The hotel was extremely clean and comfortable. The beds were great, the room was relaxing and it had everything we needed. The amenities were good, we enjoyed the wine hour and cookies!  The location was great. It was far enough away from all the crowds, but we could easily walk anywhere we wanted to go.  I highly recommend Laguna Beach House and would love to stay there again.

Love this Hotel, rooms are clean and spacious. easy parking for my large truck. Walking distance to lots of activities and the beach. We especially love getting cookies in the evening a nice touch for all. We enjoyed our time and the room was quiet and well kept.

Clean large rooms with air conditioning. Lovely and helpful staff. There is an evening reception and coffee in the mornings. Quick walk to beach and restaurants and shops. There is Aldo a free trolley to take you to Laguna areas.

Hotel is cute, small and reasonably appointed. Upon check in was told fee did not include $25 a night and a refundable $50 deposit for any incidentals.  Location is superb. Lots of eateries abound. Walk down to the sand is two short blocks away.

We loved staying here. The staff were friendly. The hotel was beautiful, clean and comfortable. It looked just like the photos on the website. Great parking garage and everything was conveniently in walking distance.

This hotel was fantastic. Great vibe, great pool, great room. The internet service was up and down during our stay but aside from that, everything was amazing. The ability to enjoy the facilities and wine hour at the sister property was especially great!

Great location, staff was nice and helpful. Clean rooms, great mattresses and pillows. Plenty of outside seating area. Warmed pool and hot tub. Will stay there again. My kids and relatives loved it too. Decor was ver inviting.

Summary Heading: Great location and very comfortable room
Summary: I stayed in a coastal view king room. Not much of an ocean view but it was on the 2nd floor at the back of the property and very quiet. My room has a small sitting area that was nice. The bed was very comfortable. The property is older but updated in a cute beach decor. This property is within walking distance of the downtown area and theatre. There are many dining options in the immediate area. The beach access is literally a block away. The only negative is the price of accomodations in Laguna Beach in general. Anywhere else and the price of this room would have been half as much.

Staying at Laguna Beach House was a perfect couples getaway. If you want somewhere quiet and close to everything in Laguna, this is the perfect beach getaway.  We found the resort very relaxing and I could see myself going there again!

Enjoyed Laguna Beach House.  Good location, close to the beach and easy walk to the main downtown area.  Room was clean and comfortable.  Friendly staff.  A little too expensive for the overall quality of the hotel.

Summary Heading: Comfortable, stylish, family friendly, great location.
Summary: Enjoyed Laguna Beach House!  People are friendly and helpful.  The location is great, near Heisler Park and the beaches, yet away from the busiest part of town.  Parking set up is easy and convenient.  We plan to return!

This hotel is extremely overpriced for what you get. The photos are very misleading and its definitely NOT worth the price tag. The location is the only benefit. The rooms are noisy and outdated, and the staff are also very unwelcoming. Would not recommend staying here.

Our family of 4 was extremely pleased with the Laguna beach house. Cozy with a “beach” feel we loved it! Staff was amazing and beyond friendly. Beds were so comfortable and the room had ample space for all of our gear. Beach equipment was readily accessible when we needed it and the happy hour is a wonderful way to meet others who love the LBH! We will be back!

It's the little things and this place doesn't get it. From the switch and bait check in policy, to the Hilarious sign at the pool, to the noisy cleaning staff early in the morning. NOT A GOOD VALUE!!!

Laguna Beach House was a lovely get-away in February. The weather was mild but the view was great from the ocean view room. The private balcony was a nice little addition since it faced south and got great sun. The bathroom is a little small and dated but was clean and the robes were some of the best hotel robes ever. The hotel has easy parking and is right on PCH. It's an easy walk to the main shopping/eating downtown area and an even easier walk to the beach. Staff was very friendly and the room was clean.

We had an excellent stay and really enjoyed it. The location is pretty central to Laguna Beach while still quiet and relaxing. The heated pool, spa, and fireplace were all great amenities. Hotel was super clean and just an overall nice experience.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to end our trip
Summary: Everything about this hotel was fantastic. Outstanding service, location and amenities. And the huge bed- like a cloud! Beats the far more expensive and exclusive hotel in Malibu we stayed in the week before hands down- well done guys!

Summary Heading: Loved it! Will stay there again!!
Summary: We had a very good time, resting, swimming in the pool and enjoyed  the most beautiful beach in California - Laguna Beach. I would highly recommend this hotel to all my friends and family. The stuff was super friendly and nice!!

Classy establishment. Charming rooms. We had one near the pool. It was a little loud , but there is quiet times and we slept well in the comfortable bed. Beach access is around the corner. It’s a better in our opinion than the main one down the hill. Staff was lovely. They had nice bath products. We would come back again.

Great place located 5 blocks from the main shopping in Laguna. Kept in pristine condition.   Beautiful views from the common areas and from some balconies. Great value for the price.   I will be back.  Thank you.

We were in residence for 8 days. Each day was outstanding. The people were outstanding. From the individuals who cleaned our room to the young lady who baked the cookies in the evening. Would we stay here a again, In a New York minute.

Great location, we could walk everywhere. While I hate paying for parking at least it was undercover. Rooms were well equipped, full size high quality toiletries, wonderful robes, Keurig machine with good quality coffee. We didn't use the pool but they even had a sunscreen dispenser. Wine hour at 5pm (and it was nice wine!), cookies at 6pm (fresh baked and warm) and coffee and tea in the lobby in the mornings. Overall great stay, highly recommend!

Laguna Beach House was perfect for my wife and I.  It was one of the few properties that provided rooms with 2 queen beds.  I am difficult to sleep with because of medical issues.  This property had a view of the ocean from our room.  The rooms for a beach hotel were spacious and large.  Have stayed at hotels in other CA beach towns and felt like I was in a prison cell.  Room was clean and well maintained.  The property is located on the free trolley line and is within walking distance to downtown Laguna. This is a very nice hotel and I recommend it highly.  One thing if you have asthma or some breathing issue the hotel uses a scent throughout the property and it bothered my wifes asthma and caused her some minor discomfort.

Clean rooms, friendly staff that allowed an early check-in, perfect location. We stayed in room 216. Very comfortable bed. Offered wine and warm cookies. so close to Heisler park. Easy walk to Laguna for dinner.

We were upgraded to a one bedroom suite on the 2nd floor.  The space was nice but there were two problems: it was dark (only one lamp in the living area) and extremely noisy.  The room is right above the Pacific Coast Highway and the traffic literally shook the windows.  Fortunately the bed was comfortable.  We ended up cancelling the second night because of the noise and the staff were very gracious about refunding our money.

Summary Heading: Great little gem in laguna beach!
Summary: Had a wonderful girls trip. The staff were friendly and the little "extras" (wine, cookies and coffee/tea) were such a nice touch. The property is a short walk to the center of everything in Laguna. Could not have asked for a better stay.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel within a beautiful environment
Summary: A lovely positive hotel with bright, spacious rooms, providing ample toiletries and soft bathrobes. The central pool was clean, and inviting. Staff are so very helpful with local dining and experiential recommendations.

My wife and I decided to take a mini weekend vacation in Laguna. We saw the recommendation for the laguna beach house via TripAdvisor. We were sold on the price and location (just a quick 8 minute walk to the main beach). Upon arrival we were pleased to discover an attached parking garage with nightly priced parking. The room was exactly as depicted in the ad. We were pleased to see housekeeping diligently working to keep the rooms clean and stocked with towels. The pool area was clean. I was very excited to find out the pool was heated and was salt water (chlorine severely irritates my skin). They provide pool towels, plenty of seating, and a gas fireplace for the cool evenings.  Overall, our stay was exactly as we hoped it would be. Would recommend this hotel for small groups

We loved the property - the location was great, we walked everywhere easily.    The staff were  so positive and helpful.     We enjoyed the pool and hot tub,  and the wine and warm cookies - an added bonus!!    We will be back, from Canada.

Summary Heading: Great Weekend getaway at a great price
Summary: Spend the weekend for a weeding.  This hotel was great.  The rooms were clean and very comfortable.  Walking distance to shops and food.  No reason to get in the car once we were here.  Would come back again just to get away and relax.

Summary Heading: Great boutique hotel near the beach
Summary: The Hotel is nicely renovated with large rooms and a nice view of the water - through the trees and over  the beach front houses.  Located west of the PCH just east of Heisler Park.  Parking was convenient and well worth the extra fee.  Very clean. Try to get the top level (not pool side) for the view and also no noise from rooms above you. Beds were very comfortable and the rooms were spotess. Would stay again.

We loved our seat here! It was perfect! The room felt luxurious and such a great beach vibe. The location is exactly what you want. We didn’t use our car the entire time and was steps from ocean. The hot tub was clean and an amazing temperature! The staff was incredible. Every single person and especially our daytime desk helper was so friendly and eager to make our stay great!

Great place. It was very easy to walk to the beach. Nice pool area. Close to restaurants. even had a bit of an ocean view. Lobby was nice, loved the surf boards and they had bathrooms close by. Underground parking was nice.

Summary Heading: Laguna Beach House is attentive to details.
Summary: As a frequent traveler, I always appreciate a place that pays attention to details. This hotel is obviously well managed. The rooms are clean and neat. The property is safe and close to the center of town. You cannot go wrong if you choose to stay here.

Summary Heading: Really cool place to stay near the beach
Summary: I loved my 2 day stay with Laguna Beach House!! It was really cool to be really close to the beach , and laguna center!! Hotel was amazing , pool and jacuzzi are a perfect combination after a beach dive , and the cookies and wine at 6 o´clock are amazing!!! It´s a must visit , while in Laguna , the staff was amazing!

Summary Heading: Nice place!  I would return here.
Summary: Might give 4 1/2 stars if I was allowed to do so.  Enjoyed having a little balcony with a water view even though it rained a lot of the time we were there.  We had wine & cookies most night from the hotel lobby.  Very nice touch!  Liked that it wasn't right in the center of things but a bit to the north of most of the action.  Most of the time we walked everywhere.  Art museum, although small, was nice and enjoyable.

Summary Heading: Best little hotel ever!!!! Too wonderful for words!
Summary: We love this place! First time visiting here and we are in love. This is my new happy place and we will DEFINITELY be back!!!  The room was clean, clean, clean!!! Superb service (think 5 star at 3 star pricing), wine at 5ish and warm baked cookies at 6pm!  Pool, hot tub, and gas fire pit overlooking the water. Short walk to the beach. Can’t say enough about this place. Extremely reasonable pricing . They have made a beautiful, quaint, hotel by the beach something the average joe like us can afford.

Summary Heading: Great style in a great location
Summary: We stayed 2 nights at Laguna Beach House and wished it could have been for longer. The overall style and decor of the hotel was really cool, and with friendly staff and a comfortable spacious room we didn’t really need much more.  It was in a great location, just 2 minutes from the stunning coastline and the park/beach, and some nice bars and restaurants were within easy walking distance. Having the pool and hot tub were an extra bonus that our kids loved, and having good Wi-Fi also helped. My only issue was that the bed was a little too soft for me, but that is totally a personal thing, so may well suit the majority.

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay in Laguna!
Summary: We LOVE the Laguna Beach House. The location is perfect for walking to the beach or into town. Hotel parking is very convenient. The rooms are comfortable and tidy. Happy Hour and Cookies and milk are a very nice touch. The kiddos love to play in the pool, while we sit near the fire. There’s nothing we don’t love about this place!

On arrival, we wereserviced by possibly a rookie or new person. He could explain what "Coastal level" means when I asked to confirm if my room was indeed what I had paid for.  Then there were guests talking loudly in the lobby. It was difficult to have conversation with front desk.   Then we were alapped with parking fees ($25  per day) and amenities fee for coffee, happy hour and cookies. This was between 5 and 6 pm. Why manke this a mandatory fee if I dont want these so calles "amenities"?

Summary Heading: Misleading Room Photos, Inadequately Furnished, and EXTREMELY Unhelpful Staff
Summary: We decided to splurge for our 10th Anniversary trip for a much-needed getaway after almost 2 years of dealing with Covid, and decided on the Laguna Beach Hotel after doing lots of online research.  We chose it partly due to the location, but mainly because it looked elegant and beautifully decorated with upscale furnishings.  Check-in went well, and we were even offered a glass of wine as it was the nightly wine hour (the wine was cheap and almost undrinkable sadly).  Oh well, off to our room to finally check out the “vintage surf house look” - well as a positive I can say that our room certainly looked spacious … because it was almost completely empty!  It had about half of the amount of furniture as every other room that we could see nearby.  Other rooms = Nice round table

Location was perfect. Everything you need is walking distance and if not there is a free trolley. The beach near by is beautiful. Rooms are comfortable and clean. Wine and cookies every night was amazing! Will go back.

I booked my family member into the hotel for Thanksgiving.  The hotel is very nice, but after checkout he discovered a hidden fee of $ 25.00 per day.  Upon enquiry he discovered that this is mandatory charge for wine and cookies that are left in the lobby for guests to help themselves to.  Only thing is my family member doesn't drink alcohol and is allergic to gluten.  What a joke.  Guests should not be charged this fee at all.  If a hotel wishes to 'appear' to be generous and welcoming in this way they should be footing the bill, not the guests.

Went for business, enjoyed the modern and spacious rooms, had everything I needed. Would recommend. Depending on room you might hear a bit the traffic at night however, but it didnt disturb me too much.

We have stayed at multiple hotels in this area and Laguna Beach House was by far our favorite. Friendly staff, clean and quiet room, great amenities, central location. Can't be beat! We will look forward to our next stay.

Conveniently located within walking distance of the beach and multiple restaurants, this charming hotel has a terrific staff, with a particular shoutout to Meriana, who's enthusiasm and cheerfulness stood out.  Don't miss the complementary wine and cookies served daily, and if you have time, the courtyard pool and hot tub are great ways to relax.

We loved it so much that we’re already planning our next stay here. The concierge that greeted us the first night was incredibly pleasant and I wish I could remember her name to give her a shout out. Started with an “M”, that I do know.

This place is an absolute gem!  Great location along with helpful and friendly staff.  Enjoyed the evening wine and morning coffee in the lobby. They also provide beach chairs and towels.  Beach is a short walk away.

Great little gem!! Everything is so clean and decor is so fun! Great friendly staff! The location is awesome to walk to restaurants and shops. The rooms are a little small but work great and make you feel so comfortable!

Great vibes, friendly staff and beautiful views! Relaxing pool and Jacuzzi with a great music playlist. Rooms were cute, cozy and clean! Perfect spot for a relaxing vacation, only 10 minutes from main beach with other coves even closer. Highly recommend!

Walls are SO thin. Felt like we were sharing a room with strangers, one of whom was up all night sick. So we were up with them!   This is a motel. A nice motel! They’ve spruced it up. But still, a motel. Do not pay $300+/night to stay here.

Terrific location, very clean rooms, so cute, wine and evening cookies. Lovely soap and amenities, comfy beds and pillows. Pool and hot tub, Close to beach and blk dot coffee:) Easy parking, highly recommend

This place was perfect. I had been worried about it being off a Main Street but laguna is pretty quiet after all. Once you get into the lobby, pool and rooms it’s like a different place. I was able to check in early as my work schedule changed and they were very accommodating. The room was so cute, pool was great, so close to the beach and little restaurants and shops. This place is perfect. I work in Laguna once a month and will for sure be staying here every visit! Can’t recommend enough. I would recommend getting the second floor rooms for the view!

Perfect 3-day getaway from the Windy City. Great location and breathtaking views. Walk ability to shops, restaurants and beaches. Only drawback was pool and hot tub as advertised not available during our stay. Very clean, comfortable bed and great customer service. Would and will recommend LBH to others. 😀

Love this place.  Cute simple quite clean rooms.  Staff is friendly and accommodating and they make great cookies too! Well maintained facility.  Walk to town for great restaurants and only two blocks to the beach.  Our third stay and we will be back!

Excellent boutique type hotel. My family loved it. Easy walk to beach, stores, and restaurants. Loved the fire pit and pool area. Very clean. Nice parking as I knew the parking in this area was tough.

The hotel is cute, clean and comfortable.  The location was good and it was easy walk around as it is near the beach, restaurants and art galleries.  The only thing I would change--I wish there wasn't an extra cost for parking. I had a nice, relaxing and fun time and would stay again. :)

Loved this beach house hotel!!! the staff were so nice. We had bad smelly neighbors smoking but that’s not the hotels fault. Pool area was great had small pool jacuzzi and fire pit!!!! Cute quaint place will be back again!

Great location and affordable. Staff was gracious and no complaints. Truly a wonderful place - especially if you plan on being out and about most of the time and only need a place to clean up and sleep. Will return! Towels and sheets were a bit dingy.

Laguna Beach House is centrally located and a great place to stay.  Staff members are extremely helpful and friendly, rooms are very clean and comfortable and a great value.  Complimentary coffee and tea in the morning, wine/cheese/warm cookies in the evening are a wonderful addition to an already great place to stay.  The pool is clean, quiet and relaxing.  Definitely recommend this as a place to stay in Laguna Beach.

It was a perfect getaway and our little pup and a great time as well. We will be back! We loved the decor and the overall beach theme. And we loved the 5 minute walk to the beach and restaurants nearby! Thank you!

This is a darling property in quaint Laguna Beach. The lobby and rooms are very well maintained, and spotlessly clean. The decor is perfect for this beach community with an old surf vibe. The evening cookies and milk, pool area, and outdoor fire pit all add to a great property. The beach is just behind the hotel, and a quick 2-3 minute walk. The ocean view rooms we stayed in (206 & 202) offered a great Laguna Beach hillside view looking south. The beds are super comfortable! And to top it off the price was GREAT!!! I will be back for sure!

A wonderful hotel. The salt water pool is divine, as is the hot tub. The location cannot be beat. All staff are really friendly and helpful. A truly fantastic experience. I would love to return. Highly recommend.

Room was not 100% clean. Found clumps of hair on floors.  Was not notified of parking costs which was an additional $25 for an overnight stay. Unfortunately i did not realize this until I already checked out and at the end of the business day.

LBH was everything we needed for a quick, relaxing getaway from LA! Clean, quiet, calm, chill. Will definitely be back.  We had the coastal king balcony, and we thought the extra cost was worth it: no, it’s not a full ocean view, but our partial view to the north was really lovely, and we sat on the balcony enjoying takeout sushi and a bottle of wine and watched the stunning sunset and stargazed, before heading down to the hot tub and fire pit. The pool was lovely, and  completely empty during the day. Tip: splurge for the late checkout and enjoy an extra few hours poolside to yourself.  Other pros: spotlessly clean room, comfiest bed ever, very plush robes, excellent location (walking distance to several beaches and many great restaurants in North Laguna and down in the

Great stay with super friendly staff.  Good location, comfy beds.  Parking was spacious and easy.  We arrived about 90 minutes early and appreciated that we could get an early check in.  Yes, I'd recommend!

The best / most affordable hotel in Laguna.  We stay here every time we visit.  It's charming, clean, great amenities, great location, and always worth the fair price.  Beds are comfortable, pool/hot tub/firre pit area are wonderful.  Staff is always super friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!

Over all the room was fine, our room was clean; however, the bathroom needed a facelift.  Chips in tub and poorly filled problem around drain made the drain pop off.  Not as good as their sister property Inn At Laguna.

This hotel in lovely Laguna Beach had been on my bucket list for a few years due to their enticing marketing. To start with the good, the room itself, though fairly small, was very tastefully decorated, clean and quite comfortable. The bed was great and we slept well. The Lather lotions, shampoo and conditioner and soaps were nice and I appreciated that they are using big bottles and not the tiny individual ones. The location is very good, one block from Heisler Park and the paths to the beach. However, neither the room, the location or the amenities justified $975 for a two-night stay. The ocean view room/ocean view balcony does not warrant the rate. The front windows on this 2nd floor corner room offered a view of the coast, but because this is a refurbished motel, there is a

The only problem is that they charge you and a surprise charge for amenities even if you don’t use. Should of read the small print before booking. It’s 25.00 $ extra. Also the lady up front told me I could park in the handicap space. I guess parking was limited…. But I wouldn’t do it. Even if she had said that she will paid the ticket if I get one.

Summary Heading: Great place for solo traveler without a car
Summary: This is a beautiful place, rooms are large, clean and comfortable. Staff were always pleasant and helpful. I usually have a problem with hotel pillows but the pillows were awesome. It was a pleasant walk to the main part of town along the ocean walk.

Great vibe at this cool beach house in Laguna. Comfy beds & room decor, great view of sunset. Nice tiled wall hot tub, poolside fire pit, great location!  Second stay and scored home made cookies and wine tasting as we passed thru lobby!  The other property in Carmel captures the unique Cali area vibe.

While we enjoyed our stay here, there is nothing here to particularly draw me back to it. If you told me this was a Holiday Inn or the like, I’d believe you. Yes this one has a little bit more “personality” or whatever, but at least a Holiday Inn has a continental breakfast. So actually I’d have preferred to stay at a Holiday Inn.  The location is convenient - just a short walk to the beach, and the room itself is pretty cozy. We had the Coastal King Balcony. The view was not worth paying extra for. You have something of a view of the ocean, but nothing to write home about. There’s a building in the way and you can see the tops of some palm trees. You can't hear the waves or anything, just the cars from the street. It's a cute room, but the stay is overall lacking in amenities.

Property is a converted motel so at the end of the day it is just a nice motel. When you are charging $400 ++ a night I would look elsewhere before booking this property. Furnishings in rooms needs to be addressed.  Dresser in room 106 must have come out of a Fraternity house, not good shape.

Don’t be fooled by the reviews. The staff are lovely but the rooms are terrible. You can hear every sound from the neighboring room very clearly. Your window is directly towards the pool and in direct view to another room so you basically have no window unless you want to give up privacy. A/C is not the best. Fridge is tiny. No tv channels. Limited parking. Lastly, very overpriced for the lack of enjoyment. Seek elsewhere.

This is an excellent hotel in a beautiful area. Staff are friendly and helpful! The facility is updated with modern features and the beach house feel. Nice view with a short stroll to the park or many of the coves around the area.

We happened on Laguna Beach House by chance — What a gem of a find!  Perfect location on the coastal highway (5 min walk into the heart of downtown Laguna Beach!). Room was spacious and well decorated; amenities were high end quality.  Room was quiet.  King size bed was perfect!  We will be back soon!

Pretty nice place to stay. Wish the towels were plusher. Hot tub was actually hot thankfully. Many hotels don’t have “hot”tubs they have “warm” tubs - yuck. The staff wouldn’t honor our request for a one hour later checkout which was unfortunate for us under the circumstances. Aside from that our stay was pretty nice.

This is our 5th time staying at this cute and quaint hotel. Rooms are clean, people are friendly and looks like great pride is taken in the upkeep and running of this hotel. On the quiet side of PCH but close to the hustle and bustle of downtown. Everything is walking distance or trolley stop convenient. Park once and enjoy 😉

Felt more private if you like quiet when you are at the hotel. Pool, jacuzzi excellent. Rooms nice and clean. Easy parking. Wine hour which was fun for the adults. Cookie hour we used for the kiddos. Just a great time overall. Close to everything  Thank you, we will be back.

The property was super clean and well maintained. Very attentive to the little things such as ice for instance. The room was very clean and the bed was amazingly comfortable which led to a great night's sleep. Highly recommend this small quaint gem for a getaway.

We stayed here for our anniversary staycation. Arriving on location, the host was nice, explained what they offer (cookies and milk, etc.) I thought it was a cute little gem but it is definitely pricey! I think overall we paid around 550-600 dollars on 1 night stay for the weekend. The pool is much smaller and the room is okay. You can probably go to a Hyatt or Westin and get a much fancier room with digital access amenities/bar/lounge night life. If you prefer a smaller, private place, then this may be for you.   Overall 3/5.

Excellent location, you can walk to the beautiful beaches.  Very clean.  Staff was very helpful!!! You can walk to some great food places.  70's Surf Vibe. Onsite parking. Definitely recommend Laguna Beach House!

I'm not happy paying $25 per day on services I don't use or need.  i.e. wine, cookies, pool, towels... The hotel fee was $629 per night (expensive enough for the age/amenities of the hotel and then to add an additional $25 is absurd!

This is our second season of repeat stays at this hotel and we are always rewarded with a clean room and friendly staff. We cannot recommend this hotel more. The easy walk into town and to shops and places to eat make it stand out. Great hotel

Summary Heading: Know how to take care of guests
Summary: Booked a standard room the hotel for the Pageant of the Masters - -location is walkable from the venue.    There was a problem with the room and they quickly ( within 10 minutes) placed us in the top floor ocean front.  I am sure some of it was luck -- but I have to hand it to management for acting so quickly and making our stay at the hotel so memorable.   Customer service at its finest

Very reasonable rate for being so close to the beach.  Wonderful staff and very accommodating.  I would highly recommend this hotel for a stay in Laguna.  Many of the other occupants were from California and that's always a good sign when the locals want to stay at a hotel.

We have been going to this hotel since it was known as the Laguna Beach Cliffs Inn. We have found it to be very reasonable for the price as well as its location to downtown Laguna Beach. And it is not too far from beach access. I like the fact that it has a heated pool as well as a nice heated Jacuzzi. since the other hotel company took it over they have spruced it up nicely. Unfortunately the prices increased..
