We loved staying here! My husband and I came here for our babymoon. We were familiar with the laguna area so this location was perfect. Perfect walking distance to everything you would need. The staff was amazing and the pool was phenomenal. Would definitely return again

Summary Heading: Great Hotel in heart of Luguna Beach
Summary: We have stayed at thos location twice now. Both stays were eceptional. The location along with the extras they include (nightly wine, milk and cookies, etc) make it extra special. Great for both families and couples.

Our hotel stay was a last minute choice and we weren't disappointed. The pool was a bit small but was always clean and refreshing. The jacuzzi was hot and bubbly.  The beach was close enough and there were plenty of restaurants, galleries and grocery stores nearby. The bed was super comfortable and  the room was spacious.Hotel staff were helpful. The wine was refreshing at the wine bar.

This was such a sweet hotel. One of the nicest hotels I have stayed at. It was very clean. It was quaint in a 1960s Bohemian Surfer way. The lobby smells amazing! They have a trademark scent in a difuser. Wouldnt share details but it smells so good! Hopefully they can sell it someday! The lobby always had wonderful music and tea in the morning. Cookies and wine in the evening. We really loved it all. Our balcony overlooked the most beautiful plant nursery! If you stay stop in there too!

My daughter and I found this get away nice and relaxing. My only problem was that we brought our dogs which barked when we left them in our room, so we had to bring them everywhere with us. It might have been more relaxing if they were left at home. I thought the unit was coastal level from the picture of the room, but it was up on the 2nd floor and not as easy to get the dogs outside when they needed to go to the bathroom. But the coastal view was very nice and the view of the pool was quaint and the hotel was very clean. The staff was very helpful when I arrived expecting something different. All in all it was a very nice choice for a quick get a way.

Beautiful location with a cool 60’s beach vibe. Rooms were super clean, quiet and the most comfortable bed! Internet was spotty but that really is the only thing I can comment that was not perfect. I loved the idea of the evening wine and milk and cookies but we didn’t take advantage of it so I can’t comment on that. Small hotel which is perfect for me.

The hotel is in a great location. Walking distance to the beach, shopping and dining. The room was clean and well kept. We had a balcony with an ocean view. The staff were friendly and eager to please, with helpful information.

Great get away for good price when Laguna is packed with tourists in June-Sept.  Easy parking, walking distances from the shops, the boardwalk and the park.  Pets welcome!  Recommend the rooms with a balcony, they face away from the pool and may provide a view of the shore (it did for us - facing south).

Adorable beach themed decor, excellent location just steps to the beach and tide pools, shops and restaurants! Loved the complimentary items available for check out for our beach days: towels, chairs and umbrella. We ended each evening relaxing in the hot tub, followed by a chat at the fire pit while wrapped up in our comphy hotel robes. Service was warm and friendly too, offering my dog treats upon arrival! Tip: be sure to enjoy a meal and cocktail at the Cliff restaurant,  a quick 8 minute walk! We LOVED the raw scallops with fresh ginger and Wasabi cream sauce...oh my!!

Summary Heading: Beautiful view, great location, and friendly staff
Summary: Perfect location. Walkable to several restaurants and shops. Beach is very close and great views. Pool is salt water with lots of chairs. Clean and friendly. I would definitely stay here again. Great place

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay but beware of additional charges you may be unaware of
Summary: We had an additional $100 tacked onto our room bill for Champagne and Chocolates we did not order.  We thought it was a gift from the hotel.  They said we clicked on something after we booked the room.  There should be a follow up email to confirm this.

Summary Heading: Nice place for a good price
Summary: Place was clean overall. Friendly staff with wine and cookies in lobby. A nice lowkey vibe all around. Oceanside views aren’t fantastic but for the price it was a nice stay. Rooms were decorated well with multiple sinks. Couldn’t check in early unfortunately.

I really loved staying at Laguna Beach House. It was clean and the price was fair. Compared to other hotels in the area, Laguna Beach House is the best one. I will be coming back and staying at this place again.

I got to plan this years 34th anniversary get a way!  The pics online were accurate.  My husband's a surfer so I loved the thought that every room had a surfboard and awesome surf books.  He loved it! It was located in the heart of Laguna and we were able to leave the car and walk everywhere!  The staff was friendly and lobby was clean and decorated smartly!

This was my second stay at this property, and I had a top floor balcony room.  Excellent views, friendly staff, great location, and an overall charming experience are what will keep me coming back.  The rooms are clean, and the hotel feels small and private.

Laguna Beach House is a charming property.  Reminds me of the non-chain, beach motels of yesteryear but with all the modern amenities that are appreciated.  Easy walk to the beach, small but nice pool/hot tub, great staff who know the area.   It's on the north end of LB which makes it easy to access by car and less noisy than the central of the town.  Just a few minutes to walk to the center with shopping, restaurants.   Will definitely return here with the husband and dogs!

I visit with my family& we enjoyed everything the hotel offered; the pool, the fire pit & balcony off our room.  The location was perfect as it was walking distance to the beach & dining places. We will back!

Was charged hidden fees of $85 after checkout. Was not mentioned during check in or check out. Will never book a stay here again. Staff did not help with explaining the hidden fees. We did not order anything additional to just the room.

Not right on the beach, but in walking distance and had great views. Everything was very clean and the pool area is great. Wine in the evening and coffee in the morning was a bonus. The staff were very friendly and gave great recommendations. Would definitely stay here again :)

Great property. Very impressed with the value for the price. Lovely lobby (I'd love to buy that scent!), great outdoor space, and charming room décor. I really appreciated the ample, safe parking. Quite spot with a bit of a view of the water.

My mom and I took a little get away for my birthday and Mother's Day. The Laguna Beach House was the perfect spot to stay. We enjoyed a glass of wine during Happy Hour and a fresh warm cookie upon check in. The outdoor pool and spa area was very nice and clean. We did not have a chance to sit by the outdoor fire pit, but it looked super inviting. The staff was very polite and helpful. I would recommend this place to all my friends!

we arrived late, but had easy check in and parking availability. We stayed on the 2nd floor, had elevator access. Although our room was near the pool, we did not hear any noise and enjoyed the view. Since Covid, Breakfast is not offered, only Coffee. Staff was very nice, and we used a hotel beach towels for our visit to the Beach.

Summary Heading: Adorable property and a great value
Summary: This property is very Instagram worthy! Loved the surf vibe decor throughout. Room was spacious and clean, facing the inner courtyard pool/firepit area. Location was perfect--5 minutes to town and a block from Heisler park and the gorgeous coves in North Laguna. Staff was friendly and you can't find a better value in Laguna. Complimentary wine in the evening and coffee in the morning is a nice touch. HIghly recommend!

This is a perfect option if your looking for a smaller, boutique style hotel located within walking distance of all the great restaurants and shops in Laguna.  The rooms are updated, the facilities are clean and the staff is helpful and friendly.

Summary Heading: Great location, great hotel, pricey with extra fees
Summary: Hotel room was great, pool and jacuzzi seemed clean and I noticed the staff cleaned each morning thoroughly. Great location behind Heisler park, easy walk to park and beach. Restaurants are walking distance. The extra fees killed it for me- resort and parking is extra $40 per night. They do give free wine and cookies in the evening for that $40, so that’s nice.

I splurged on the king coastal view room and it was so worth it. Laguna Beach House checks off all the boxes- ambiance, hospitality, beach vibe, cleanliness, friendly staff, sustainability measures, amenities, and more. I didn't rent a car during my stay and I was able to walk to all the restaurants and shop I could dream of, and the beach and cliff walk of Hessler park is just a short walk down the side street next to LBH. Main Beach was just a short 5 minute walk also. The morning coffee, evening wine, and cookies were definitely icing on the cake. Also met a lot of amazing people around the fire pit at night. I am already planning my next stay here but will bring my teens along next time.

My boyfriend and I did a one night stay and enjoyed the location & value of the hotel. Check-in was easy, the staff was nice, the pool was warm, the firepit worked, the list goes on. We had hoped there was a time limit on the hot tub considering some people camped out all night, but other than that - very enjoyable stay!

Hotel is really well located and is cute. The AC of the room I think was a little bit old and was not working very well, and also the room lacked cleanliness. Behind the nightstands was very dusty, and floors were dirty too. My only complain is AC and cleanliness.

Summary Heading: Don't look any further! This is the place!!
Summary: First off, I have two toddlers. So being greeted with the glass of wine when checking in, perfect!!  Then freshed baked cookies for the little ones, even better.  This location was a mother's dream. Minutes from the beautiful beach, delicious restaurants & more! The beach water was a little too cold for my little ones so the heated pool was a huge plus! I was delighted by the customer service and experience of this hotel all together. I would definitely recommend to anyone. Looking forward to staying here again. THANK YOU!

Hidden gem on my favorite beach. The property was clean, quiet and homey. My pug had the time of her life! We loved that it was steps from the beach. It was exactly what we needed to unwind and relax.

Everything was clean and super pretty. The beds were so comfy!!! I will for sure stay here again and let my friends know to stay here. The staff were all helpful and they have a fun wine and cookie hour which is the cutest thing.

I felt discriminated, they didn't give me the service I paid for,  They blocked my card to enter the room before the check-out time, customer service very bad, I wanted to give to my daughter a great birthday but thanks to you I had to change my plans due to the bad attention and I do not recommend your hotel.

This is a great location and the staff is super friendly. The wine and cookies at night was a great touch. This property is so close to the ocean. I would suggest this place to any couples who are looking for a great location!

This hotel is wonderful.  My daughter, granddaughters and I came for a short girls trip.  From the moment we walked in the door, we felt at home.  The beachy vibe, clean bright rooms, pristine pool and surrounding area were all perfect! Wine for us and cookies for the kids each evening!   Quiet atmosphere, but very family friendly.  Each morning we'd pop down for a free coffee and then get ready for the day.  The beach is just moments away!  And, it's one of the prettiest beaches in Laguna.  Just keep walking and you find several small coves, tidal pools and clean water!  After the beach we hung at the pool for a few hours, then on to a multitude of restaurants - all within easy walking distance for even a 4 year old.  We really didn't want to leave.  I felt the price was very

We really enjoyed our time here. The hotel was very clean, accommodating and decorated very cute. Walking distance to anything you need. The pool was small and there is no view of the ocean, but a short walk and you're there! I hope we can return soon!

Great view nice hotel the pool area was amazing looking forward to revisiting this location again . The staff was great not to mention the location of the hotel was on walking distance to a lot of great places to eat and mind away from the beach

Terrific place to stay. Quetion is perfect the rooms are charming very laid-back and comfortable. The staff is very accommodating, just a great place to stay. And the location is perfect, this is my happy place.

I liked the hotel, staff, the staff's helpiness and the location, the neiborhood is great. (staff: Just check-out my comments on regards to the mini-fridge noise). the hotel made me feel I was in California with the surf vibe, and not somewhere else in the world... Loved the "early bird coffee". Thanks!!

The Laguna Beach House provided us a comfortable nights stay with only a few drawbacks. The room was spacious and clean and the bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was large also, clean and comfortable. Front desk customer service was very nice and responsive. I was called on my cell phone when my room was ready. Special kudos to Annette for being lovely at checkout time. I had no issue parking. Be mindful there is a $20 fee .  The only drawbacks were 1. The terrible smell that greeted us when we entered the room. Our room had a very bad odor, a musty smell. Fortunately I brought some Lysol Disinfectant  Spray with me , the crisp linen scent, and that got rid of the stench. Also, individual bottles if unopened shower gel , shampoo and conditioner were not provided. Large

Issues with early check-in, misc black hairs on white bedding and towels (def not mine!), ants in the bathroom, flooded patio that wasn't mopped up after requesting it, and especially the front desk staff who told me what I wanted to hear but didn't actually deliver or, as with woman at check out (Natalie?), was just rude.The hotel itself seemed clean and is very charming with a great location and I bought the parking package since it's a great location to walk everywhere, but the issues above really ruined my stay in the room itself.

I truly enjoyed my stay here. I am pleased with the value of money and location of this cute boutique hotel Super close to the beach. A 3 min walk to the beach. We def will be back!!! The staff was incredibly sweet, nice and informative for all your questions you may have.  Also Adonis Mediterrnean has yummy fast food in town. And the Reunion Kitchen has a great burger! We got it wrapped in lettuce!

Already wrote review on previous page as to the uncleanliness of the room. Please see previous page for details.  Phone in room was filthy, dusty and dirty.  I was too busy on my trip to go to the trouble of calling to have someone come back in so my plan was to call after I returned from trip to explain to a desk clerk.

Summary Heading: 2nd week this year and still amazing
Summary: Laguna beach house is a hidden gem of relaxation and chill. Details like coffee service, beach gear, wine hour, location to town and beach, pool vibe-make it the perfect spot to drop out of stress mode and relax. Can’t wait to come back!

Walking distance to everything nice clean and very friendly and knowledgeable staff..wife loved it so that sums it up :) and they have free wine in the evening perfect after a massage and sunset viewing at the sister property ;)

Sadly, the room wasn't clean. Walls are also paper thin. We wanted to love this place, but it wasn't what we were expecting unfortunately. I brought up the issues up with the staff member at the front desk. She was kind enough to discount a little bit off the bill, but the room wasn't clean at all. There was sand on the floor from previous guests.
Manager Response: Dear Kayla, Thank you so much for taking a time to review your recent stay at Laguna Beach House. I am so saddened to hear that you were disappointed with the cleanliness of the room, it is certainly not a reflection upon the exceptional standards we pride ourselves on. We really appreciate you bringing this to our attention, so we can make sure it never happens again. Hopefully you will give us another chance in future to make it right! Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Loved our stay- will be back!
Summary: Loved this new found spot so much! It was perfect for our little family getaway. My only complaint was that the hot tub really needed to be cleaned by the second day we were there it was full of that foamy top stuff with the brown in it. yuck. We asked the staff if they could skim it but they said the pool guy wouldn't be there till 1pm which is when we were checking out. I think it would be good if a staff member could skim it in the mornings for sure. Otherewise, the pool, hot tub, firepit area are adorable, and so enjoyable. Pool is small but was fine for us. Rooms were light, bright and clean. Location was great! walkable to so much!

On-line it seemed like a great place to stay. The Internet presentation portrayed a more upscale accommodation. It was comparable to a Holiday Inn or Motel 6. The property appeared outdated and not as nice as “The Inn” a few doors down.

The Laguna Beach House is a perfect location!  You can walk to everything!  The area is just beautiful.  The hotel is near, clean & always  smells great!  The pool area & fire pit were a wonderful treat!  The staff at the hotel were very welcoming, pleasant & helpful.  We will be sure to return & recommend to others!

Great staff , nice decor , great location. Nice and quiet. Bed and pillows a little soft for me. Easy walk to beach and restaurants. Clean pool. Ocean view from many rooms. Easy parking. Overall very good experience.

hotel is close to beach and shopping area. location is good and convenient. Pool is nice but small. Room size is good, not a lot of ocean view. Staff is friendly. Little pricey, parking charge extra and no breakfast.

Dirty, not a place for kids. Loud and not at all what it seems from online. You can find better hotels in Laguna for cheaper or same price. I would never recommend this hotel to anyone. Unless you don’t care about dirty towels and hair all over shower from previous guests.

This little gem is priced so well and appointed so beautifully!!! It is just the right size to feel comfortable for a night or two. I loved the Catalina tile accents, and the room was so clean and beautiful!

Spacious room, very close to the beach. Room could have been cleaner. Seemed worn out like it needed a deep clean and a paint job. Everything was a little bit dirty and needed to be wiped down, mopped and re-painted. Lobby smelled great. Parking was super close (lots of stairs as its under the building- FYI). So much is walkable for food, drinks and parks/ beach. Staff could have been more helpful and friendly. I would stay here again but its too bad they don't take care to make this place go from "pretty good" to "excellent!" For quick example- we were two adults there for a birthday long weekend and our room had one robe. We called and asked for a second robe and instead of saying "sure- no problem" or having one in the room to begin with they seemed annoyed and said "we'll

Very clean and beachy room.  Perfectly adequate, but keep in mind this is a Motel, and so sound carries from PCH and from the pool until everyone is sleeping. Amenities are NOT optional, so a $20 fee is added for a cookie, happy 1 hour, beach towel, a.m. coffee. Also parking is not included, add another $20.

Summary Heading: Cutest hotel in Laguna Beach!! Great location, friendly staff & affordable.
Summary: This adorable hotel located steps from the beach is the perfect hideaway for singles, couples or traveling friends. I recommend booking a room with an ocean view, enjoying complimentary coffee in the AM and wine in the PM. There are robes in the rooms, beds are heavenly and staff is so helpful and friendly. You're always greeted with a smile. Parking is convenient and rest easy your car is safe. Highly recommend staying here when in Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer P,  Thank you for your kind words about our gem! Our staff is committed to providing a memorable experience to all of our guests and I am pleased to see that we have succeeded and that you enjoyed the special touches at Laguna Beach House.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Great price and location! Friendly staff, nice and clean room, steps from the beach! Very happy with my stay and would recommend for anyone. Hope I will stay again soon at the Laguna Beach House! Love it
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  I am so pleased that you enjoyes our friendly staff and convenient location!  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: This place was in a great location, very clean and cute. The rooms very good size and the beds were very comfortable.The only issue we had was loud guest all 3 nights. 2-5 am. Other than that I highly recommend. Beautiful Beach was a 1 minute walk.
Manager Response: Dear SFRY,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: mediocre hospitality, clean rooms, cheap building, could hear walking upstairs and  very loud sounds through walls. bed was very comfortable clean rooms, nice location, staff not that helpful. laguna is beautiful,  the hotel lobby smelled great,
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Whetten,  Our goal is to ensure our guests' comfort and satisfaction, and I am sorry that you felt disappointed with your stay.  I apologize for the noise disruption that you experienced. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to regain your trust in the future.  Best Regards,  Michelle

Summary: My college aged daughters and I stayed at the Laguna Beach House for 3 nights in March.  It was the perfect place for girl time!  We were within walking distance of cafe's, shops and the beautiful beaches.  The hotel made for fun Instagram photos as well as a great real life experience. If we are in Laguna again, we will definitely stay here!

Nice little boutique hotel! Cute theme, friendly staff, nice pool/firepit. We chose it for pet friendliness.  The location is easy walking distance to food and beach.  Nice wine/cookie treats.  I would stay again!

A nightmare. I spent $234 for a noisy room where I can't even sleep in peace. A romantic weekend getaway becomes a traumatizing experience at the Laguna Beach House. I can hear EVERYTHING from the upstairs resident, which sounds like a Buffalo herd pounding through my ceiling. I went to front desk and made an complaint but only being told it was not quite hours -- So I have to suck it up. I did. But waking up 6AM on a Saturday from stomping and cracking sound is disruptive, and this is not WORTH a penny if a hotel can't offer decent environment for rest and leisure. I called front desk but was only given the option of earplugs. So if you want to stay in Laguna Beach House, be ready for restless noise and ear-plug weekend.   btw, my room was right by the stairway, which attracts

They have Lather products. And the property is clean and felt Covid safe. The rooms have outside access. It’s a cute surfer boho chic hotel. I just wish there was a bottle of water in the room. I didn’t enjoy the wine hour from 5 to 6 or the cookie at 6, but thought it was cool.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean rooms, friendly staff
Summary: I enjoyed my trip.   The rooms were the hotel and the rooms were nice and clean and it was very close to the beach.  Staff was very helpful and it was a good value for the money. I will definitely stay here again

Clean but feels like a motel instead of a hotel which is disappointing for the high price.  Noisy guests smoking pot in room next to us and when we told the front desk it wasn’t taken very seriously. Overall disappointed for the high price.

Summary Heading: All style, not frills. I get that. But there are limits
Summary: @LBHonPCH I love efficiency and LBH has it in spades: good decor and location, empty fridge that we're allowed to fill at the nearby Whole Foods. All of this is efficiency in action. But I just checked into room 112, one of their non-premium rooms & I'm not kidding when I say I'm sitting cross-legged on the floor as a I write this because the bed is currently occupied and there isn't a stick of furniture in here. Big gaping spaces where a chair and couch are supposed to be...but nope. Also received two emails from LBH today prompting me vote on their potential Travel & Leisure 2021 Best Awards. I think instead I'll email my friend who works at T&L and send her a few pix of a shockingly empty room.

We really enjoyed our stay. Thank you to the entire staff for working with us and being so accommodating. We originally planned to only stay one night but enjoyed our stay so much that we extended our stay. We will definitely be back!

Summary Heading: Great beginnings, but charged unnecessary extra $20 amenities per night!
Summary: Great beginnings, but charged unnecessary extra $20 amenities per night! No empathy from the front desk and unfriendly person at closing. i asked they be more transparent with what the $20 amenities should cover and they said its i the fine print! Basically 2ghz wifi (which drops frequently), cookies and coffee? They only had cookies......paid an extra $50 for 2 nights because of wifi and cookies!!LOL!!

Summary Heading: Beautiful small hotel in prime location.
Summary: This place is perfect for weekend getaway, perfect location & cozy room decorations.  Beach walking distance and safe parking. The only cons is that rooms so close to each other and small that they can hear you talking and even complain that you are noisy. Walking distance to Urth cafe our favorite place.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon! I apologize for the noise issues that you experienced during your stay. I am pleased that you enjoyed our convenient location and proximity to the ever-popular Urth cafe.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary Heading: Great little getaway near the beach!!
Summary: Adorable little find.  Simple parking and check-in experience.  Awesome decor and amenities.  Rooms are light and bright with neat little styling touches. Great location to beach access, few blocks from downtown, restaurants and grocery store.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon! I am so delighted that you enjoyed the convenient location of Laguna Beach House and appreciated the unique touches throughout our special property.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Nicely decorated lobby and rooms . Spacious room, fun decor . Minus : overlooking the parking lot and its noise in the morning of cars and guests departing . Well located. Nothing else to Write but this review has to be 200 characters . Why ?
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  I am so delighted that you enjoyed our decor and proximity.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. We loved the s'mores kit the hotel provides, it was a cute idea. We had a balcony ocean view room, which I would highly recommend. However, it sits right on PCH so if you are seeking quiet then a room facing the courtyard would be best. The staff was amazing. The front desk was friendly and courteous. We ordered drinks from  the bar and food from  the restaurant it was easy and convenient. This is a super dog friendly hotel, we didn't mind at all but it seemed like every guest brought there dog. Only downfall to the property is there is no swimming pool, $35 a day extra for valet parking,and no free WIFI.

I took my son and nephew for my sons birthday we stayed two nights and it was absolutely amazing. We were swimming and relaxing in the Hot tub most the time and when we weren’t we were down at the beach since it’s only about a one minute walk.🙌 it was an amazing time and the staff was so friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Garmon, I am so pleased that you enjoyed your getaway birthday celebration at Laguna Beach House. Thank you for the review and your compliments. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House again soon! Kind Regards, Michelle

Summary: I’ve stayed here before and couldn’t imagine staying anywhere else in laguna beach. It’s a minute walk to the beach and the sunset is beautiful. Even from the balcony! They also do complimentary wine and cookies in the evening. I’ve never used the pool and hot tub but it looks beautiful. 10/10 recommend for anyone traveling in the area.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your kind words about our gem! Our staff is committed to providing a memorable experience to all of our guests and I am pleased to see that we have succeeded. I am so delighted that you were able to enjoy our nightly wine and cookie service. We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House again soon.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: The rooms are cute, the sinks are beautiful, and it is steps from the beach.  The rooms are not equipped with microwave ovens, and there is no Fitness center.  My sister's room had ants, otherwise, it was a nice location at a very nice price!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  I am so pleased that your found Laguna Beach House to be a nice location and value.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary Heading: The property was nice, but my experience was poor
Summary: I booked a room on their website, a room with a private patio because I wanted a peaceful place to write over the New Year.  When I arrived at the room, I didn't have a private patio or a table to write at.  The room was comfortable, but it didn't meet my needs or was it what I reserved.  The front desk said they had no record of my request even though I chose the private patio room option on their webpage.  I even found bugs in my room.  I was very disappointed in my experience.
Manager Response: Dear Doreen,   I am embarrassed by the conditions you had encountered during your visit and have communicated your notes to our team to resolve immediately. I also apologize for the service you received and given another chance, I am confident that we can deliver a better experience. I want to thank you for bringing this to my attention so we may correct course. I hope you reconsider us for a future visit.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Nice and cozy room! They provide a good amount of room space, absolutely love the bathroom and how they have a balcony. I loved how the little amenities are better than just mass produced products like the moisturizer, shampoo and lather.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon! Thank you for the feedback, so pleased to hear that you liked our bathroom products.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: We had a horrible stay.  The ceiling creaks and thin walls. People above us and on the side of us were VERY loud, till about 3:00am!!!  Front desk was called twice and nothing was done.  Won't be staying there again!
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for taking a time to review your recent stay at Laguna Beach House. I am so sorry to hear that your stay was less than enjoyable. I apologize that our staff couldn't take care of the noise issue, we have very strict noise complain policy and I will definitely talk to employees to remind them about the policy. It is very important that all the guests can have relaxing stay. I hoped with giving you 50% refund on your one night stay, it would make up for the inconveniences you experienced at our property. Our apologies again and we hope you might be able to give us another chance in the future.     Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Would give better review but can’t.
Summary: Very clean. Beautiful view! But it’s was filled with unattended children running about yelling!  2 nights in a row. Phone broken so can’t call staff. Asked about it and not I ‘twas done. Staff was nice but didn’t seem to care much. Or it was out of there hands . Not sure.
Manager Response: Dear Jami,  Thank you for taking a time to review your recent stay at Laguna Beach House. I'm glad to hear that your were satisfied with the cleanliness of the hotel. We are children friendly hotel and some children may play around during the day, but of course, we always want to make sure they are under parents watch, please let us know next time, so we'll make sure their parents are present. I apologize that the phone in your room was not working and I will check with our staff why it wasn't fixed. Usually our maintenance fix any issues in the rooms right away. Thank you for letting us know. Hopefully you will consider staying with us on your next trip to Laguna Beach!  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: My husband and I came for a little getaway. We’ve been going through a lot of grief this year and needed an escape. This hotel made it so easy to relax. It had comfortable beds, rooms were clean, and great location!

This place is such a little gem. It’s more like a bed and breakfast than a hotel. Just an intimate feel, fresh baked cookies, friendly staff, You couldn’t really ask for a better location. It’s super clean and we felt very safe. We wouldn’t go anywhere else. Helpful Hint: Bring your own drinks. There is no drink machine. Other than a microwave, which would have been nice. You will not want for anything else. It’s a whole vive and you will love it!

Laguna Beach House was just exactly what my daughter and I needed to relax and have a comfortable and safe getaway during Covid. We were totally able to relax, and do a lot of self care. Internet worked great and we were able to access our streaming apps.

Summary Heading: Great location and friendly staff but HIGH amenity fees ($40 per night total)
Summary: Great location and friendly staff. The hotel would be best for couples, friends, or a solo trip since the main beach and downtown are walking distance.   We paid around $220 a night +$40 a night amenity/parking fees.  Amenity fees were high so keep that in mind. $20 for parking + $20 amenity fee so $40 a day total. This included water down coffee in the morning, happy hour at 5pm where they serve glasses of local wine ( it’s about $10 a bottle so if you are a wine drinker this may or may not benefit you), a cookie at 6pm  and limited access to amenities due to COVID.

We loved this hotel!! Great rooms for a great price right next to the beach. Amazing views, comfortable beds, great amenities. They even have a free happy hour of wine in the evenings :)  Will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for your compliments as we strive for guest satisfaction on all occasions. Your feedback is important for us to ensure that every guest has a great experience. We are glad that you will be planning another stay with us and look forward to your return.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary Heading: A must stay while visiting Laguna Beach
Summary: This is a perfect place to stay on vacation or staycation. They had it decorated for the holidays and the rooms were extremely clean. There are quite a few places to walk for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Plus the beach is less than 10min away!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Amazing value. Excellent location and very clean and spacious rooms. I don’t think you can find a better deal in Laguna. Similar hotels in this price range aren’t nearly as nice. Staff was very friendly and accommodating. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Malagise,  Thank you for your kind words about our gem! Our staff is committed to providing a memorable experience to all of our guests and I am pleased to see that we have succeeded.   Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Great hotel. The rooms were very clean and the beds were comfy. Walking distance to restaurants and beach. Coastal room does not really have a view of the coast you have to go outside of your room to see the beach. I would stay here again.

What a great oasis to come to after Thanksgiving! This trip was short, but enjoyed every minute of it at the Laguna Beach House. The staff was friendly, catering, and made you feel like you were VIP! I will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for your compliments to our team, as we thrive for 100% guest satisfaction on all occasions. Your feedback is important for us to ensure that every guest has a great experience. We are glad that you will be planning another stay with us and look forward to your return.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Such a cute hotel! We came for a mom's weekend getaway and our expectations were well met! Super close to the beach, cute pool, hot tub, and fire pit area. We enjoyed the comfy bed and robes as well. The front desk was friendly and helpful. We are so grateful for finding this gem!

This hotel felt 75% boutique and 25% corporate and I loved it! It is stylish and current without being trendy and loud. It is also very well located -- my husband and I didn't use our car from Friday afternoon to Sunday afternoon. We walked to 4 different restaurants, shopping in downtown, a hike, Heisler Park, and Crescent Bay beach.   It accomplishes the two requirements of a hotel: clean and comfortable. Cleanliness: every corner, every floorboard, every linen, every surface, every hallway, every parking spot was clean! Comfort: the beds were medium firm, the sheets were cool, there were soft and firm pillows, the decor is classy yet bright, the light fixtures and shutters/windows provided adequate light at all times, and sitting area with two chairs and a table were
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for your compliments to our team, as we thrive for 100% guest satisfaction on all occasions. Your feedback is important for us to ensure that every guest has a great experience. We hope that you will be planning another stay with us and look forward to your return.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary Heading: Boujie on a Budget Beach Vibes!
Summary: I felt like I was staying somewhere upscale, but very chill. I love how relaxing and quiet it was, but close to everything. The interior is definitely my type of style. Very clean lines. And I love that the pool was by the fire for a cozy vibe. Will definitely be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: We live in Venice Beach and love coming down to Laguna. We stayed here for the first time during COVID because we wanted to have a staycation at a place with a hot tub. The place was clean and they take covid seriously. The pool has a nice firepit as well. We enjoyed the evening wine hour and the morning coffee. You will pay $20 as a "resort" fee upon arrival so just make sure you take advantage of the wine/coffee since that is essentially what you're paying for.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  I am pleased that you enjoyed relaxing in our hot tub and firepit area.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Great hotel for couples trying to relax and get away for a few days. The decorations were lovely and the small motel vibe was cute and the front service was very helpful. Short walk from the beach, parking was pretty easy to find close to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Overall our stay was okay. I’m not sure I would return to this location, however. The common areas were great and kept clean. We enjoyed the pool area, especially the fire pit. The location to local amenities and the beach was also a plus. Upon check in, we were told we’d have additional costs that were not made aware to us prior to check-in. Our room was okay and worked for what we needed as we spent most of our day out and about. However, cleanliness could be improved. There were makeup/mysterious smudges in the bathroom and on the furniture. The chair cushions were stained and throw pillow was ripped. The tray by the sink was dingy and stained, along with crusted toothpaste. It’s right off the main highway so traffic noise was loud at times. We heard the guest in the room

Great location, friendly staff, beachy rooms, awesome pool, and in walking distance to town. I  highly recommend this place for a vacation. It has a fun retro feel which fits right in with funky Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon!  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: My wife and I stayed here, last Saturday night, 11/7 in room 117. After breakfast and a morning walk before check out, I went up to the room to get my leftovers from a birthday dinner the night before at Mozambique, an amazing local restaurant! I walked in and Housekeeping was in the room already...strange since we hadn't checked out yet. I said, "excuse me, I'm just back here for our leftovers."  Nothing was in the mini-fridge. The housekeeper gave me a sheepish look and then watched while I looked in the trash and found my EMPTY to-go box;. my food had been eaten, only a tissue left on top of a couple crumbs.  In the 30 mins we had been out of the room, before check out, housekeeping had eaten my leftovers! NO apology! It wasn't yet 11:00 and we hadn't even checked out! I

The hotel feels exactly what you would imagine a Laguna Beach House to be. very nice décor and style and perfect customer service. nice touches like surfing photography art books, and mexican talavera sinks were unique and lovely.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appreciate your review, and I hope you have a chance to visit again soon! Thank you for the feedback regarding our decor and special touches here at Laguna Beach House  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: For the price we paid there was hardly any amenities they didn't offer much to do and the hotel room wasn't as clean I don't think was on covid-19 standards would I recommend this to a friend or family member probably not the view was great but the hotel room itself wasn't so great.
Manager Response: Dear D. Castenada,   I am apologize for the conditions you had encountered during your visit and have communicated your notes to our team to resolve immediately. I also apologize for the service you received and given another chance, I am confident that we can deliver a better experience. I want to thank you for bringing this to my attention so we may correct course. I hope you reconsider us for a future visit.  Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel.   Professional staff.. clean and updated rooms!  Great location walkable to the beach and local restaurants.  The hotel must have been recently renovated, rooms have a beach them and are well maintained.   Pool and Jacuzzi too!
Manager Response: Dear Randall T, Greetings! Thank you for posting your review following your recent stay with us. All of us at Laguna Beach House are here to make sure your vacation is fun and memorable. I am excited to hear about your fantastic experience and look forward to welcoming you back soon. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: The location was great to be able to explore Laguna Beach.  The room was very clean and the furnishings were top of the line.  All areas of the hotel were very clean and during the Covid episode this is very important.  The hotel staff went out of their way to be friendly and helpful, with awesome suggestions for dining and exploring.  I would recommend this place for anyone wanting to visit Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear ecastanon7, Thank you for the kind review. We are always thrilled to read about our guests experience during their stay. I am pleased to note that you were satisfied with the level of service provided by our staff and that you enjoyed our Hotel in the heart of Laguna Beach. Our goal is to ensure our guests leave with an exceptional experience and we are glad we met your expectations. Enhancing our guests amenities are a top priority and we appreciate all feedback. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing Laguna Beach House and look forward to your next visit. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: I stumbled across LBH while on a 100-mi drive mourning the loss of one of my oldest friends. The staff here were wonderful. I felt well cared for and looked after, despite a one day stay. Thank you for your kindness.
Manager Response: Dear hilaryhaselton, Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are glad you enjoyed our setting, friendly staff and had a wonderful experience. Our central location is among our guests favorite and happy to know you enjoyed it. On your next visit to Laguna Beach we look forward to accommodating you. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Lovely quaint hotel. we had to request a room change because someone above us felt the need to pace back and forth from 11:00pm until 1:00am ... unfortunate for us :( bad night’s sleep. Wood floors, so you can hear people moving on the floor above you.  We recommend requesting the top floor if staying here. Location is awesome, walking distance to restaurants, beach, park. Enjoyed the jacuzzi, great powerful jets!
Manager Response: Dear karmenfuninthesun, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy you enjoyed our convenient location and amenities. I apologize for the noise issue from the room above you. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing Laguna Beach House and look forward to welcoming you back. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: An awesomely decorated, cool spot right off of Heisler Park. Just a short walk from all of the main spots in town, this hotel was perfect for our couples getaway. The staff was very nice and attentive and the rooms were in great shape. We will be returning.

Summary Heading: great hotel near Heisler Park Laguna Beach
Summary: This hotel was exactly what I was looking for. Perfect loacation, parked the car and walked to all the wonderful sights, sounds and meals in Laguna. The extra amenities were very personal and so convent to get chairs, beah towels and umbrellas provided. wine cookies, sure decor and books I loved it

A very pleasant boutique hotel. Friendly, helpful staff and great central location. Quiet and relaxed. We would definitely stay there again. The king room was a good size and the bed was very comfortable.

Summary Heading: Nice boutique motel, located near beach and shops
Summary: Loved the decoration and the smell in the lobby. This motel is very well located and offer a good option for families who want to enjoy easy beach and restaurant access. Rooms are cleaned. Bathroom and aircon might need a little update. Nice stay overall.

Laguna Beach Hotel was a great choose for us!   I looked at hotels for several weeks before booking a room here.    The rooms were clean and the bed was very comfortable.   They thought of everything from the lobby air freshener (the best!) to the toiletries in the room.   The hotel is close to beach access and a lot of great restaurants.   The staff was so friendly!   Thanks for everything!  We'll be back!

I highly recommend Laguna Beach House. It is the perfect conjunction of a beautiful small hotel, extremely well situated and very very clean. The staff is very attentive and nice, the decoration superb, and you are a block away from the beach, the park and  few blocks from the stores. The rooms are impecable and there are various common areas with tables and chairs where you can rest or have your lunch in the open. I loved the rooms with a balcony! This was my second stay, and I hope to be back soon!

My husband, baby and I stayed at the Laguna Beach House for the Weekend for our 2 year Wedding anniversary. We booked the 1 king bed coastal room. I thought coastal as in a private balcony, but it meant room closest to the coast, but we got some great views and pics from the front public balcony. This place is a quaint, simple, boho, surf and chic hotel. Perfect stay for our little family. Enjoyed the heated bathroom and decor of the room. The tv cable guide didn't match up on the tv but that was the least of our worries. The mood string-lights throughout the hotel at night made this place really special. The hotel is minutes walk to Heislar Park and the beach. We also are walking distance to the Pavilions and Urth Caffe.

Summary Heading: one night family get away to the beach
Summary: We enjoyed our stay.  Everything was very clean.  The location was great for walking to the beach, restaurants, and shops.  It was nice to be able to park the car and walk to everything. We enjoyed the cookies in the evening and the coffee in the morning.  The kids enjoyed the pool and hot tub.  It was a very quiet and relaxing place to stay.

We really enjoyed our stay here. All the staff we encountered were amazingly friendly and hospitable and willing to help with whatever we needed. The pool are is a bit small, but spotless and comfortable. I couldn’t help but notice a complete lack of kids running amuck, which was awesome. I don’t think it was worth the extra cost for an ocean view or a balcony. The balconies are a small patio off the back of the room that face the parking lot next door and the backs of other buildings. The ocean view is over other rooftops and so is not all that impressive. The best views are actually from the public walkways facing the pool. The room was large, comfortable, and had a nice beach decor. There were a few cleaning items that were missed, but nothing gross or worth complaining

We stayed 3 nights. Our room was clean and comfortable and had the added bonus of a private outdoor balcony. Did not frequent the pool as it was smaller than expected but the beach was walking distance away. So was the downtown area. We were looking for a getaway with COVID safety rules in effect and this property fit the bill!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad that our Covid protocols met your expectations and that you enjoyed your stay at Laguna Beach House. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon. Best Regards, Michelle

Summary: Location was fabulous! The beach is literally about a 3 minute walk. The cute beach decor really made it feel like vacation. The rooms had floor instead of carpet which was a huge plus. As an added touch they offer a wine hour for the adults and a cookies & milk hour for the children. The pool area is small but nice and relaxing. The downside and why I only gave 4 stars is because there is no pool food or bar service as there is not a restaurant or bar on the property. The women at the front desk were not the most accommodating,however the maintenance man and the male at the front desk were both helpful. Something to keep in mind when booking this hotel, are the walls are extremely thin , I could hear the TV in the room nextdoor along with a couple talking and having very loud
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We appreciate you taking time to provide details of the issues you experienced during your stay. We are glad that you enjoyed our decor and convenient location. We have noted the issues you mentioned and will do our best to address them. We hope to have an opportunity to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House again soon. Kind Regards, Michelle

Summary: Loved the Laguna Beach House. The decor was chic, clean and crisp. Small and cozy, the hotel was the perfect beach hideaway. Right around the corner from a few great beaches, hikes, restaurants and shops. Beds were comfy! Great am coffee service and wine in the evenings. Pool area is small but comfy and a fire pit as well. Highly recommend as a getaway for anyone; couples, families or solo.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We appreciate your feedback. It looks like you enjoyed the amenities at Laguna Beach and our proximity to local activities as well. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Laguna Beach House does make you feel as if you are at your very own beach house escape.  This is an older motel/lodge style building that has been completely renovated and it's beautiful and fun.  The rooms are not your typical hotel rectangle, they are each different in layout but consistent in decor with a fresh coastal theme with a southwest twist.  The pool and spa area is small and does not have an ocean view.  However, the area is beautifully done and well maintained with a nice fire pit at night.  Attention to detail is not lacking in this property with beautiful plants and landscaping and water features strategically placed.  Keep in mind that if you book a balcony room, the balcony is at the back of your room accessed by a regular type door - not a slider so you cant
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a thorough, detailed review of Laguna Beach House. It's great to hear that you enjoyed our decor and facilities. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Such a cute hotel so close to the beach
Summary: We were pleasantly surprised with our stay at this hotel. The staff was very friendly and the beds are very comfy. The hotel and rooms are decorated in a costal bohemian decor. The rooms are all around the pool making the pool/jacuzzi/firepit a fun place to hang out. The hotel is in a fantastic location that's close to the beach and a short walk into town. There's a nightly wine hour with fresh baked cookies that follow. Such a nice little surprise. We will definately be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a thorough review. We are glad that you enjoyed our convenient location and the amenities that we provide for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary Heading: Great value right by the beach!
Summary: The Laguna Beach House was the perfect getaway for my wife's birthday. We enjoyed a peaceful and charming stay right by the beach and within walking distance to the restaurants and shops in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay at Laguna Beach house. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The staff member who checked us in was cold and did nothing to make us feel welcome, including providing no explanation about amenities and any recommendatiions.  The room was poorly insulated for sound between floors and the person above us paced and moved furniture all night long. Even with earplugs it was so loud we could not sleep because the sound was so loud. We called to the front desk to speak with the person, but the person above only stopped for a short period and continued the heavy pacing.   We we told the manager the next day she acted as if it was normal and said that other people have issues with music or other noise that they can not control. It felt very dismissive to the point of almost being rude.  The staff person in the morning was the only staff person who
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  We are disappointed to learn of your recent guest experience as what you have described is certainly not a reflection upon the exceptional standards we pride ourselves on. We assure you the service in which was exuded to yourself is not typical nor tolerated of our hotel. We apologize for the noise issue. We monitor noise issues very closely to make sure that all our guests can have relaxing stay, playing loud music on the property is not allowed and we have particular procedure on place that we follow in case of one guest disturbing other guests. I hoped waiving your parking and amenity fee at check out would help to apologize for inconveniences. Thank you for taking the time to bring your experience to our attention as it is appreciated.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: definitely  loved the hotel and the staff you cant beat the location  its right by the beach short walk from local shops and even from restaurants  wonderful  rooms very clean and nice comfortable  feel the pool was great the hotel  was very affordable  and I would give a 5 stars        🌟  🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We appreciate the detailed feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary: Fun and lovely place to visit. room are spacious and amenities are a perk. Short walks to the beautiful beach and good eats too. My family and I will be coming back to this location in the near future!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review. We are pleased that you enjoyed our amenities and proximity to the beach and restaurants. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House again soon!

Summary Heading: ONLY STAY HERE IF YOU CAN BOOK ON THE TOP FLOOR.
Summary: Let's begin from the good:  *This hotel is well located, near restaurants and a few steps from the beach. Laguna Beach is gorgeous with lovely sunsets.  *The beach decoration is tasteful throughout the entire hotel, bedrooms and bathrooms. *Bath robes and very good quality toiletries are provided. *The staff is friendly. *They serve wine from 4:00 to 6:00 pm and cookies in the evening, a nice little perk.  To work on: *Housekeeping needs to step up a notch. I always remove my shoes to enter homes/hotel bedrooms and at this hotel, I had to wash my feet before going to bed. There was also a box with sandwich from the previous guest in the refrigerator. These are not big deal, but we are in the middle of a pandemic and I would hope that cleaning is very thorough. The food inside
Manager Response: Dear Allyne,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at Laguna Beach House. We are glad you enjoyed our setting, friendly staff and convenient location. I would like to apologize for the floor cleanliness issue, I assure you it is certainly not a reflection upon the exceptional standards we pride ourselves on. And I am so sorry about the noise issue from the room above, our Front Desk agent called the guest in the room above right away. Our apologies again and we hope you might be able to give us another chance in the future.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: everything you see on the pics are true
Summary: Spent 1 night here and wish we could have stayed longer. Everything you see online is true, it's just that cute.  So well decorated and designed, and VERY LAGUNA chic.  The location is perfect, not in the busy main beach area, so it's pleasant and quiet.  Super short walk behind the property to Heisler park and the walking trails around it is just beautiful as always.    Pros: - location is perfect - parking is easy and super safe - decor is adorable and chic all throughout the property - the wifi is pretty good, love their social hours (wine hour, cookies at night, coffee in the morning)  - you can borrow beach towels, lounge chair and umbrella to take to the beach, which is easy and convenient/ - bathroom is spacious and the bath products are fantastic, smells so good. -
Manager Response: Thank you for the very thorough review. We appreciate all of the feedback that you provided. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Laguna Beach House again soon.

Summary: Many issue with this hotel! Once I walked in I noticed the floors were sandy and dirty! Light bulbs were out and two sinks didn’t drain properly! But by far the biggest issue was the ants everywhere and I mean a lot of them! Service for them was slow and non existent only regular cleaner for them all..
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay did not go as expected. We strive to maintain a very clean, well run property and are sorry that was not your experience. We will do our best to address the issues that you describe. We hope you will give Laguna Beach Hose another chance in the future.

Summary: LBH is a lovely hotel, and because I wanted to give my daughter and son in law a nice get away and some “couple time”  for her birthday and before their first child is born, I chose to book with them as their reviews were great. Unfortunately, they never got the chance to enjoy the experience because on arrival they were told that apparently there was a “glitch” in the system and their reservation couldn’t be found...EVEN though we booked DIRECTLY with the hotel, HAD a confirmation number, CALLED the night before TO CONFIRM that it was possible to have flowers /a birthday cake delivered and placed in the room AND CALLED AGAIN the day of to confirm that these items had been delivered. EVERY time we called, we were told it was “no problem”...they even accepted the deliveries...and
Manager Response: Dear N2040OAmichelep,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am so sorry that happened to your daughter and son in law. On behalf of our entire team I would like to apologize for reservation integration issue, is it definitely not the level of service that we provide at our hotel. Hopefully you will give us another chance in future!  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Brady Bunte - the Laguna Beach House is a great boutique hotel and you get a real feeling of a cool local Laguna Beach  setting.  It is beach themed and very clean.  I refer most of our friends that drop into Laguna for a day or two. Brady Bunte
Manager Response: Dear Brady Bunte,  Thank you so much for your great review! We look forward to welcoming you and your friends in the near future.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: Charged $20 for Amenities Not Fully Available
Summary: The pool and hot tub were not available which is why I picked this hotel over others. I was charged $20 for hotel amenities that were not fully available and after I was fully charged to stay there upon departure, I was then charged $7 that appeared days later on my bank statement. The cost charged for amenities should be taken off if people can’t use the full amenities. I was told towel use for the beach were also included in the amenities fee but no one used them because it was too cold. People were in sweaters and pants. No one was laying out at the beach or in the ocean. I am disappointed and feel taken advantage of.
Manager Response: Dear Curlycel1rn,  Thank you for sharing your review. I am saddened to hear about the amenity fee charge misunderstanding. The amenity fee includes fresh water and oranges during the day, tea, coffee and yogurt with granola to start your day, complimentary wine hour, fresh baked cookies and milk before bed time, all kinds of beach amenities such as beach towels, chairs, umbrellas, body boards, kids toys and volleyballs. I apologize again if you feel that you shouldn't been charged the amenity fee and about the pool closure, please contact me directly at slukina@thelagunabeachhouse.com to discuss any farther. I hope that you might be able to give us another chance in the future.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Staff was amazingly nice and very helpful. The room had a beach themed decor, was very clean. Because the hotel is on busy PCH 1/Coast HWT, some  reviews say that the traffic made it hard to sleep but, it’s really not that bad. Location is great and you can practically walk to everything from the main beach to all the shops.
Manager Response: Dear vtamayo,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: We stayed at this sister property of the Inn at Laguna Beach because we added one day to our trip.  This property is super cute and just a block or so back from the ocean but very easy to walk too.  The surrounding area is very nice with great restaurants and breathtaking views.  The bed was very comfortable and the shower hot.  Loved that they had parking facilities but we bought the park and play package.  We recommend this property and will come back at another time.
Manager Response: Dear Tcampa,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: Wonderfully renovated with a very friendly helpful staff.
Summary: Haven't been to So. Cal or here in 4-5 years.  The place has been renovated & looks great.  The rooms were comfortable & very clean. We love the location & like to walk on the beach pathway, especially at sunset...Spectacular views. The property has a beach ambience & gives you lots of perks.  Wine in the evening followed by cookies & milk. In the morning they serve yogurt & granola with delicious coffee.  The best part tho is the staff!!  They are genuinely friendly & want your stay to be special.  They always have suggestion for things to do & places to dine.   Special THANKS to them!!
Manager Response: Dear Traveller711,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are glad you enjoyed our setting, friendly staff and had a wonderful experience. Our central location is among our guests favorite and happy to know you enjoyed it. On your next visit to Laguna Beach we look forward to accommodating you.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: Such a cute spot, steps away from Heisler Park
Summary: Super adorable hotel. Unfortunately the pool was under construction while we were there so we had to use the Laguna Inn, not the end of the world just slightly inconvenient. Definitely would recommend staying here! The lobby even smells heavenly!
Manager Response: Dear ckemps2020,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We apologize for the pool deck being under renovation, we look forward to welcoming you back soon, so you can enjoy our new renovated pool. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Lovely little hotel with a great pool and fire pit area.  The rooms were nicely decorated and sparkling clean.  The beds were super comfortable.  The location was great with easy access to shopping and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear NashvilleGal615,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy you enjoyed our convenient location and amenities. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing Laguna Beach House and look forward to welcoming you back.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Me and my wife stayed here early February. Great hotel, very clean. The parking was perfect. Staff very friendly. Location is superb, 5 minute walk to a walkway that goes along the beach to the centre of Laguna. Great fire pit and pool. Would recommend it!
Manager Response: Dear garybW8519PH,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are glad you enjoyed our setting, friendly staff and had a wonderful experience. Our central location is among our guests favorite and happy to know you enjoyed it. On your next visit to Laguna Beach we look forward to accommodating you.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Very cute, clean hotel. Staff is very friendly and helpful. It's walking distance to shops, restaurants and beach. It's very peaceful, and the area is extremely safe. I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear thesausagequeen,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your escape to the Beach House. Located minutes from Main Beach and right behind historic Heisler Park, the Beach House had everything travelers need for a quick getaway. We are glad your stay was enjoyable and hopefully we can welcome you back for another great stay. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Great location, helpful staff (let me check in early), pleasing updated beach decor and safe.  No hassles, easy and so close to Heisler Park.  Park your car, and walk downtown or use shuttle. I will go back!
Manager Response: Dear mangini12,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy you enjoyed our convenient location. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing Laguna Beach House and look forward to welcoming you back.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: 10++ Everything about this trip was magical! The location was fabulous the room was immaculate and beautifully appointed! The staff was incredibly warm and caring both on the phone prior to our arrival and throughout our stay. Annette at the front desk and on the phone was warm & caring. We can't wait for our next visit.Very memorable birthday experience.
Manager Response: Dear WindyRae,  Thank you for the kind review. We are always thrilled to read about our guests experience during their stay. I am pleased to note that you were satisfied with the level of service provided by our staff and that you enjoyed our Hotel in the heart of Laguna Beach. Our goal is to ensure our guests leave with an exceptional experience and we are glad we met your expectations. Enhancing our guests amenities are a top priority and we appreciate all feedback. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing Laguna Beach House and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: I needed an overnight spot near town that fell within the price range f my employer & I'm so glad I found The Beach House.  It's nicely redone.  I enjoyed my room a lot.  I will certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear dominiquecanostocco,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Laguna Beach House. Our property is perfect for travelers looking for a little escape while on business. We look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay. Thank you again.  Beat regards, Sofya

Summary: We just enjoyed a week at thsi gem of a hotel.  It is well kept,, and the staff are wonderful.  Rooms are spacious, with very comfy beds, safes, plenty of plugs, and mini-fridges.  You are not right on the ocean, but it is across the street.  If you want an ocean view, get a room on the top floor.  Great location, close to several restaurants and a supermarket.  Free wine at 5, zand cookies at 6.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Jays911,  Greetings from Sunny Laguna Beach and thank you for the grand review. It's a pleasure to know you enjoyed your stay with us. Our amenities combined with our exceptional staff make our hotel unique and I'm glad you thought so too. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing Laguna Beach House and look forward to welcoming you back.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: We love Laguna Beach, one of the main reasons is the Laguna Beach House. It is a very nice property and has all the outstanding qualities expected of such a property. The distinguishing factor is location, location, location. We park the car, never get back in. It is very close to the ocean and beaches. We walk to all the best eateries, and we enjoy an outstanding view of the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear jimpeterson44,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your escape to the Beach House. Located minutes from Main Beach and right behind historic Heisler Park, the Beach House had everything travelers need for a quick getaway. We are glad your stay was enjoyable and hopefully we can welcome you back for another great stay. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: The hotel is very cute, great staff, comfortable beds, covered parking and good location in Laguna Beach.  It's walking distance to the beach, shops and restaurants.  Restaurants close to the hotel are The Hawaiian Grill, Las Brisas restaurant and Earth Café.  Also, close to a few art museums, Plant nursery and boutiques.
Manager Response: Dear AngelCuti3,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at our unique boutique property. Our convenient location puts our guests walking distance to some of Laguna's best beaches, shops and restaurants. The Beach House also provides towels, chairs, umbrellas and other beach amenities for all our guests to take to the beach with them. Thank you again for sharing your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Took a couple days in Laguna Beach between work appointments.  This Boutique Hotel is tops.  Very comfortable, very warm and friendly.  Rooms are super comfortable and certainly fit into Laguna Beach.  Steps away from the ocean.  Sometime the it’s the smallest details.  Coffee and yoghurt in the morning.  Complimentary wine at 5.  And scrumptious freshly baked cookies (with milk) in the evening.  Lovin this place.  Be back every time when I’m in the area.  Definitively recommend!
Manager Response: Dear 65simonj,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are glad you enjoyed our setting, friendly staff and had a wonderful experience. Our central location is among our guests favorite and happy to know you enjoyed it. On your next visit to Laguna Beach we look forward to accommodating you.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: This is my second stay and, again, it did not disappoint.  Friendly and helpful staff, nice, comfortable, safe rooms, thoughtful amenities and great location!  Met great people watching the sunset off the deck at cocktail time.  Can't wait to go back again!
Manager Response: Dear TrudyB231,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy you enjoyed our convenient location, friendly staff and amenities. On behalf of our entire team we thank you for choosing Laguna Beach House and look forward to welcoming you back.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: What a lovely find for the final night of our California new year trip! Measured up to the photos from the booking. Excellent welcome, fab room and extra little touches which we hadn’t expected! We’ve stayed in many hotels around this area over the years and this is the only one we will definitely be returning to. Loved everything. Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear  _WILKINSON_1969,  Greetings! Thank you for posting your review following your recent stay with us. All of us at Laguna Beach House are here to make sure your vacation is fun and memorable. I am excited to hear about your fantastic experience and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: If you are looking for a really cool, beach cottage looking hotel with amazing value, stay there! The pool and jacuzzi are an oasis, steps to the most beautiful beach path in SoCal... It’s Hawaii and Surfer Dream in one!
Manager Response: Dear wanderlustmom2020,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: I thought the room was very nice, - would have liked a couch or more comfortable chair but overall was great.  The room and the bathroom were spacious.  I thought the staff were amazing.  The pool was a little on the cool side.
Manager Response: Dear Rick,  Greetings! Thank you for posting your review following your recent stay with us. All of us at Laguna Beach House are here to make sure your vacation is fun and memorable. We have some rooms with sofa, please ask for a room with a sofa on your next visit and we will be glad to accommodate your request! I am excited to hear about your fantastic experience and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Had a great experience here. Friendly staff, clean rooms. Loved the fire pit downstairs on the cold night. And who can forget the wonderful cookies ... yum. We got a corner room. Grabbed wine from downstairs lobby and watched the sun set in the Pacific... very peaceful. The location is easily walkable from the main beach and shops/restaurants. The Lb trolley also makes it every easy. The hotel concierge was helpful in explaining all the neat things around. Highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear foodee24,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are glad you enjoyed our setting, friendly staff and had a wonderful experience. Our central location is among our guests favorite and happy to know you enjoyed it. On your next visit to Laguna Beach we look forward to accommodating you.

Summary: Decor is clean and bright - warm, friendly and helpful staff - small hotel which we prefer over resorts. Just a block from enjoying walk on the CA Coastal Trail and 2 blocks from enjoying breakfast at Urth Cafe. We only wish there was a frig and microwave.
Manager Response: Dear D7599RTmaryc,  Thank you for sharing your review. We could not agree more, there is so much to see and do in Laguna and the Beach House is the perfect hotel to put you close to it all. We are walking distance to plenty of wonderful shops, delicious restaurants and beautiful beaches. We have mini-bar in every room and, if guest would like to use it as a fridge, we can remove all the mini-bar items. Also we have microwave in the kitchen and we are glad to heat a food for our guests. Hopefully you will use this services during your next stay! Thank you again for sharing your review.

Summary: The hotel was beautiful, clean and a great location.  When we arrived we were unable to check in early, and ended up being able to check in after 4:00.  The staff was friendly, helpful and easy to interact with. The room was beautiful and the view from our balcony was spectacular.  I can't wait to stay here again :)
Manager Response: Dear deananun,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your escape to the Beach House. Located minutes from Main Beach and right behind historic Heisler Park, the Beach House had everything travelers need for a quick getaway. Our standard check in time is 4 pm, but if we have some available rooms earlier, we are glad to accommodate our guests as ear;y as possible. We are glad your stay was enjoyable and hopefully we can welcome you back for another great stay. Thank you again.

Summary: We loved our stay here. The hotel is walking distance to the beach, shopping and restaurants.  Staff is friendly, knowledgeable and helpful.  They even serve up a glass of wine between 5-6 p.m., as well as a small breakfast of yogert, granola, milk and coffee.  The rooms are super clean and comfortable.  We even had a view of the ocean,
