Manager Response: Dear Adrienne,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House! Our coastal level rooms have a breathtaking view of the Laguna coastline and our convenient location puts our guests in walking distance to some of the best beaches, shops and restaurants Laguna has to offer. Thank you again. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: The Team and this location is great, the rooms were adorable and very clean. I love the close proximity to dining and nightlife. The views from the room are also nice. I look forward to coming back to this property again.
Manager Response: Dear tamekamccullough,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at our unique boutique property. Our convenient location puts our guests walking distance to some of Laguna's best beaches, shops and restaurants. The Beach House also provides towels, chairs, umbrellas and other beach amenities for all our guests to take to the beach with them. Thank you again for sharing your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The name has changed since our last stay but this is still an enjoyable and relatively inexpensive spot in Laguna Beach.  Many good upgrades since last time even if the beach/surf theme is a bit over the top!  Coastal room views (2nd floor) are definitely worth the extra.  As mentioned by others the amenity fee is bit nervy as it covers things that are included at most hotels.  So the view of the ocean makes it a resort?  Don't let that stop you staying here - this is a great spot.
Manager Response: Dear ontheroad2006,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. I wish you had a chance to try all our amenities included in the amenity fee. The amenity fee includes fresh water and oranges during the day, tea, coffee and yogurt with granola to start your day, complimentary wine hour, fresh baked cookies and milk before bed time, all kinds of beach amenities such as beach towels, chairs, umbrellas, body boards, kids toys and volleyballs. We hope to welcome you back soon. Thank you.

Summary: Awesome location and the place was very clean. Great decor. Comfy bed! Fast elevator. We’ll be back! We Highly recommend this hotel. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Lovely fire pit That we wanted to sit around but it was always full. Obviously everyone enjoyed it.
Manager Response: Dear Climber734437,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at our property. The Beach House has a newly renovated pool deck featuring a fire pit and hot tub overlooking the breathtaking Laguna coastline. Our convenient location places our guests walking distance to the heart of town including the best bars, shops and restaurants. We look forward to meeting you again at Laguna Beach!  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: You can walk to everything!  Pool was nice especially the fire pit in the evenings!  It’s nice that they offer wine at sunset.  I booked a block of rooms here in August for my daughters wedding.  Our guests loved the quaintness of the hotel.  They enjoyed the amenities like the hot tub, pool and happy hour.
Manager Response: Dear wandakthompson,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at our unique boutique property. Our convenient location puts our guests walking distance to some of Laguna's best beaches, shops and restaurants. The Beach House also provides towels, chairs, umbrellas and other beach amenities for all our guests to take to the beach with them. Thank you again for sharing your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: This hotel is an excellent location - walking distance to pretty much everything.  The hotel itself is nice, but I thought it was a little overpriced for what it was.  The pool area would be better if towels were provided.  Overall, worth it for the location.
Manager Response: Dear sydren1993,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We provide pool towels, they are located on the towel rack next to the pool entrance and at the Front Desk. Also we provide beach amenities such as beach chairs, umbrellas and towels. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: A lovely hotel in a beautiful location close to the ocean and close to town. Walking paths along the ocean a block from the hotel! Àttentive and friendly staff, a great pool and jacuzzi, + comfortable rooms all add up to a wonderful hotel.
Manager Response: Dear saracoe256,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your escape to the Beach House. Located minutes from Main Beach and right behind historic Heisler Park, the Beach House had everything travelers need for a quick getaway. We are glad your stay was enjoyable and hopefully we can welcome you back for another great stay. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: No sound insulation at all on the first level. You'll hear the neighbors above you having sex, walking around, people having conversations outside, the sound of vehicles traveling down HWY 1, and the mini fridge makes an awful noise late at night. For all you have to deal with, the hotel should be $80 a night instead of $200 a night.
Manager Response: Dear dperlich,  Thank you for sharing your review. We value all feedback as it gives us an opportunity to reflect and improve guest experience. With that said, I am saddened to hear your stay with us was not as you expected and for that, I apologize. I hope that you might be able to give us another chance in the future. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: I am so conflicted about this review. The room itself was truly excellent. It was large, comfortable, equipped with an amazing bed, and functional. Also, very cute. If based on the room, this would be a four star review. So - why only two stars?  What was wrong?  What’s wrong is that they have unscrupulous business practices. The price of the room isn’t the price of the room. If you drive, add $40 per night. They charge $20 for parking (which doesn’t bother me except they don’t disclose it). They also charge $20 per night for “amenities.”  Yes, I asked “what amenities?”  For $20 added to your room price, you get wi-fi, a beach chair, bath robes, wine in the evening in the lobby, and coffee in the morning in the lobby. In other words, pretty much everything every discount motel
Manager Response: Dear sidrichison,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our spacious, comfortable rooms. I am saddened to hear about the rate misunderstanding. The amenity and parking fee information are posted on each web site, where you can book a room at Laguna Beach House, to make sure our guests have right rate information. The amenity fee includes fresh water and oranges during the day, tea, coffee and yogurt with granola to start your day, complimentary wine hour, fresh baked cookies and milk before bed time, all kinds of beach amenities such as beach towels, chairs, umbrellas, body boards, kids toys and volleyballs. I apologize again if you didn't know about the fee, I will make sure all the front desk employees remind guests about it during check-in. I hope that you might be able to give us another chance in the future.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: The spa and pool were super nice and clean. Beds were really comfy and staff were friendly and helpful. Rooms were modern, cool and spotlessly clean! Milk and cookies at the counter on check in - cute touch. Great location!  10 min walk to the main area if that.  Parking was super easy and plentiful.
Manager Response: Dear Huseermsed23,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at our property. The Beach House has a newly renovated pool deck featuring a fire pit and hot tub overlooking the breathtaking Laguna coastline. Our convenient location places our guests walking distance to the heart of town including the best bars, shops and restaurants.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: Nice spot for beach and downtown access
Summary: Found a two night special on-line and saw that this little boutique hotel was near the beach.  A pool-side room just means a room on the same level as the pool.  The nights were pretty noisy due to inconsiderate guests who were there for a wedding coming back drunk every night.  We were surrounded by the group on both sides and above so there was no escape!  This is not in control of the hotel though so I do not factor that in my rating.  I rated "very good" because of price value.  I would rather have paid less for a top floor room which would be quieter.  Annette was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Rick,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. I apologize for the noise issues. We hope to welcome you back soon. Thank you.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: This was our first trip to southern California. We loved everything about it. Laguna Beach House was a wonderful location for beautiful views. Very friendly staff, clean and comfortable rooms. We would come back to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 892ed,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Love the property.   I would definitely come back again.  The Laguna Beach House is a great location, has friendly staff, and some fun amenities.  Close to several restaurants and walking paths. Weather has always been great and Laguna Beach is a cute town
Manager Response: Dear LoveTravel724072, Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at our unique boutique property. Our convenient location puts our guests walking distance to some of Laguna's best beaches, shops and restaurants. The Beach House also provides towels, chairs, umbrellas and other beach amenities for all our guests to take to the beach with them. Thank you again for sharing your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Best regards, Sofya

Summary Heading: Get the value for the price you pay
Summary: The hotel was really clean. Room was awesomely spotless and had everything you would need. Temperature was perfect. Nice view. We enjoyed the morning coffee provided by the hotel, evening wine hour and cookies all day.
Manager Response: Dear vanitaj68, Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House and we look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay. Thank you. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights after a trip to Maui and it was a really lovely place to stay. There are hotels directly on the beach whereas this was set back a bit but it didn't detract from the visit at all. It's pretty quiet, a short walk into town and has some bars/cafes nearby. The pool was nice, plenty of beds, towels and umbrellas. The decor was really cool and tasteful and the whole upkeep of the property was excellent.  We enjoyed the wine and cookies each evening and found the staff to be very kind and helpful.  The room was clean, bright, a great bed and altogether just a really good place to stay.  I hope to get back there one day.
Manager Response: Dear SearchingForit, Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your beach retreat at our property. The Laguna Beach House has beach amenities including towels, chairs, umbrella's and sand toys that all our guests are welcome to use. Our helpful staff is ready to assist with any requests you may have during your stay as well as provide recommendations and make reservations. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to your next stay with us. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Attended a conference in Laguna recently and our company occupied three hotels on the water. This one was the most updated and had a very nice laid back appeal to it. The housekeeping seemed a little lazy and did not complete what would be considered daily tasks such as cleaning the tub and replenishing coffee and toiletries. Apart from that everything about my stay was enjoyable and I would recommend. I stay in hotels very often and this was up to my standards.
Manager Response: Dear jennaconquergood, Thank you for sharing your review. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Laguna Beach House. Our property is perfect for travelers looking for a little escape while on business. I apologize that our housekeeping service did not meet your standards and I appreciate that you brought it to my attention, so we will make sure we do not have this kind of issues in future. We look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay. Thank you again. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: This place is so cute! From the moment you walk into the lobby with the surf themed nostalgia you instantly feel happy. The rooms are well appointed and beds super comfy. The staff was super accommodating and friendly. They will give you beach chairs, towels and umbrellas for the beach which is steps away. They have a happy hour and cookies and milk hour😀 The pool is heated and clean and there’s a nice inviting jacuzzi and a fire pit! I highly recommend!!
Manager Response: Dear Kir s, Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House and had a chance to use our beach amenities including towels, chairs, umbrella's. Our helpful staff is ready to assist with any requests you may have during your stay as well as provide recommendations and make reservations. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to your next stay with us. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Had a cute corner room which was very clean and bright.  Pleasant staff and nice little extras like a wine happy hour and cookies and milk.  Note beach access is not direct...you need to go around the corner and down the block (which is not clear from the pictures on the website), but it's close enough and a short walk to town and the main beach.  Reasonable price compared to other places in the area.  Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear drrad666, Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House and had a chance to try the amenities we offer like our wine hour and cookies and milk. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Great property.  Clean, friendly and great décor.  If Inn at Laguna Beach (sister property) is too rich for your budget then this is the property for you.  Bonus, you can enjoy the wine reception at the Inn on their rooftop bar!
Manager Response: Dear Andrew E, Thank you for sharing your review. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Laguna Beach House. We look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay. Thank you again. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: This hotel is so cute and is a great place to stay if you want that beach experience. The staff was great, the facilities are clean and comfortable and there is a great view of the beach! Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear LauraS13706, Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again. Best regards, Sofya

Summary: Laguna Beach House is an older property but clean and the staff is friendly.   Pool is small but if you get there early enough you can find a place.   Staff is very friendly.  Small continental breakfast in the am and cookies in the evening    Easy to walk into town.
Manager Response: Dear Ric K,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House and we look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay. Thank you.  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary Heading: Cute but over priced lack of service
Summary: This hotel was cute with its beach feel, however it was over priced and lacked meeting expectations  Rooms were not as relaxing as they could have been due to lack of maid service and how noisy it was.  Thinking the person I. Room above was coming through ceiling
Manager Response: Dear StacieS128,  Our goal is to ensure our guests' comfort and satisfaction, and I am sorry that you felt disappointed with your stay. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to regain your trust in the future.  Best Regards,  Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Very nice hotel and friendly helpful staff, nice room and pool area. The addition of yoghurt and granola and coffee for breakfast and evening wine in reception was a plus. Beach towels, beach chairs and umbrellas were an added bonus.
Manager Response: Dear bobmcclaskey,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House and had a chance to try the amenities we offer like our wine hour and yogurt with coffee for breakfast. We are glad your stay was enjoyable and hopefully we can welcome you back for another great stay. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: We loved it here. I just wished i had stayed longer, we initially looked at the surf and Sand however i decided to go with a smaller more traditional accommodation and i am so glad we did. It is really quite small, but this adds to the quirkiness of the place. The firepit is a lovely little feature.  If you are looking for somewhere with a large pool this may not be for you, it suited our needs. We arrived back in the afternoons and chilled out by the pool. I loved the Californian beach interior. The location is great, the service is great too. Cant wait to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear jamesna2017,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: near town, coastal highway was busy and loud at times, good location near good restaurants, laguna beach is very picturesque and very cozy.  good walking town - enjoyed our meals at different restaurants
Manager Response: Dear Sadesign2019,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House! Our convenient location puts our guests in walking distance to some of the best beaches, shops and restaurants Laguna has to offer. Thank you again. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Laguna Beach House is a great hotel. Clean, comfortable, stylish, and in a convenient location, you can't beat it. The staff are very friendly and helpful. It has a cute little pool and hot tub area. You can even play chess in the lobby. There is a free sunscreen dispenser by the pool and abundant towels for use poolside or on the beach. We never had problems with parking and the property is well-maintained. I would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Trail24510410733,  Thank you for your kind words about our gem! Our staff is committed to providing a memorable experience to all of our guests and I am pleased to see that we have succeeded.   Best Regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: The power went out three times during our two day stay. The tv was broken in our room. Had to move rooms at 1030 at night. One of the staff members (a blonde woman running the front desk) was super rude and unhelpful during the power outages. Made for a bummer but tried to make the most of it.
Manager Response: Dear erinnoellerose,  Thank you for sharing your review. We value all feedback as it gives us an opportunity to reflect and improve guest experience. With that said, I am saddened to hear your stay with us was not as you expected and for that, I apologize. I hope that you might be able to give us another chance in the future. Thank you again.  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: After paying $580 for my one night stay for my Anniversary.  Not only would I not recommend this hotel, I will make sure to never stay here again.  The carpeting in my room was disgusting.  Filthy.  My wife and I's feet were black, and there was an odor.  When charging 400+ for a room, it should be clean.  At the least.
Manager Response: Dear SassSaffari,  I see that you were very disappointed with your stay and I am sorry for that, but looks like you stayed at some other hotel, not Laguna Beach House, we do not have any carpeting in our rooms. Please reach out to us at 949-497-6645 if you believe that you stayed with us, so we can discuss it farther.  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: We stayed at this lovely place in August.  My sister searched extensively looking for a double queen with ocean view as she is from Texas and it would be a treat to celebrated our birthdays together.  We arrived at our room and the only way to see the ocean was to crick your next to the left edge corner of the room.  They were gracious and credited parking and resort fee, but in chatting they said none of the double queen beds had that view and it was a generic picture.  It is very easy to change a photo and description....just saying.  They also charged us $75. for minibar, which I had to get credited as we didn't even open the mimi-bar. The accommodations are very convenient and personnel super nice.
Manager Response: Dear Beth C,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. I apologize for the wrong room type picture, posted on the web site, we will fix the issue, but we do not advertise Ocean View rooms, we offer Coastal Level rooms only. And I would like to apologize for the mini-bar charge, I am glad our Front Desk Agent was able to give you a credit back right away. I hope that you might be able to give us another chance in the future. Thank you again.

Summary: It was great to be back!  Laguna Beach House is my choice to stay every time I come to Orange County.  Once I walk in, I'm at home!  The rooms are fresh and light in appearance and cleanliness; the staff is always accommodating (Annette, it was awesome seeing you again!).  I just cannot say enough about it!  Oh, and did I mention the morning coffee/yogurt, the early evening wine and especially the milk and freshly baked cookies!  Home away from home....doesn't get any better than this!
Manager Response: Dear diannalynnphoto,  Thank you for your kind words, it is our pleasure to make sure that you feel home away from home. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House and had a chance to try the amenities we offer like our wine hour and cookies and milk. We look forward to meeting you here again!  Best regards, Sofya Lukina Area Rooms Division Manager

Summary: Really great location, friendly and helpful staff, lovely decor. The milk and cookies in the afternoon, and the wine in the evening was a lovely touch. Huge rooms, would definitely go back, loved the area.

Loved the place! Loved the location!! Really nice decorated rooms with wonderful staff. Would definitely stay there again and recommend to others, Loved that you could walk to the beach, restaurants, shops and galleries.

Laguna Beach hotel is a 10 minute walk to the main beach and a 10-15 minute walk to most restaurants and bars which means it’s perfectly located.  The room we stayed in was on the second floor and was large, clean and modern with a sea view from the front window. There isn’t a private balcony but chairs dotted around for shared use.  Hotel facilities include a pool, fire pit, wine hour, cookies and milk, yoghurt and granola for breakfast and use of beach chairs. Sadly these are not included in the price of your room and charged at $20 amenity charge. Parking costs are also additional. It would be perfect if these extra costs were waived as guests may not always benefit from them and room costs can be quite high anyway.

This is a really unique property with a beach and surf theme. Small but very enjoyable pool,great rooms and an ocean view from the 2nd story. Sitting by the fire out by the pool at night was a highlight and a treat. We will be back

Summary Heading: Great Place in an Expensive City
Summary: The Inn and Laguna Beach was full on Labor Day Weekend, but we landed a great room at the Inn's sister property, the Laguna Beach House, just two blocks away. Both places are in easy walking distance of Pageant of the Masters. I loved everything about the hotel except the price. Then again, most everything in Laguna is pricey. I didn't like the added taxes that don't show up front, so our $350 per night room came to $520 a night. There were two occupancy taxes, an amenity fee, a parking fee, and another tax. It's the price you pay if you want to get away. Still, I wish it were more affordable. Maybe it is during off-season.

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel, Very clean, Great Customer Service
Summary: Lovely hotel. And great customer service. Be aware that "Coastal View" is basically just on the second floor and you can see a bit of the ocean if you stand in just the right spot. But, the manager was gracious to let us move to a first floor "pool view" which was less expensive. The hotel is a great value if you stick with the "pool view."

I was pleased to find that Laguna Beach House wasn't just a great location.  A few steps from the beach, a short walk to restaurants and shopping, the room was nice too... clean, comfortable, well appointed, with a small balcony and a lovely view.  It wasn't at all fancy, but it was certainly everything we needed for the enjoyment of our time.  Praise for the staff too.  They were friendly, polite and helpful.  My only gripe is the $20 per night charge for parking your car, but that's all over California and not peculiar to this establishment.

This was a really nice place. It is on PCH with ocean views in some of the rooms. The room was very clean and bright. The property has a very nice beachy vibe and the front desk staff were very friendly and accommodating. The morning coffee served in the lobby was very good, and they have a happy hour where you can get a glass of wine. It is a few blocks from the main part of town, so you are away from the heavy traffic there. You can still walk to town. I will definitely stay there again. Loved it.

Such a great little place! Beautiful rooms and hotel, nice amenities (pool, etc.). Love the fun extras like wine and warm cookies in the evening and coffee as well as yogurt and granola in the afternoon. Plus, you get free drink tickets for a lounge that overlooks the water at the sister hotel, which is basically on your way to the main streets in Laguna. Great location! Just far enough away from the main streets so you don’t hear the notice, but still an easy and enjoyable walk...and it is close to the water! I’d highly recommend. I’m planning to go back!

I feel like they are constantly trying to nickel and dime you.  $20 amenity fee pays for what many hotels offer and a complimentary basis. I felt completely insulted with the basket of food for sale in the room, and the Pop Chips (the size you receive as a snack on an airplane) were $8 and the Famous Amos cookies were $6. Gouging or hoping you are dumb enough to open them out of complete hunger. Also, trying to sell towels and snorkel gear in the room is a bit much.  They took Marketing 101 to an extreme where it became obnoxious. Rooms are ok, and the pool is small, but nice. I would not return.

Loved this place to stay in Laguna Beach. We stayed here after attending Pageant of the Masters. It was an easy walk to and from the venue. The rooms have recently been renovated and are spacious, clean, will appointed and very comfortable! Will definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: When You Come Back You Know It's Good!
Summary: Second time we've stayed at Laguna Beach House, and we plan to come back, next year, too! Great accommodations, walking distance to the beach and to the Pageant of the Masters, and reasonably-priced covered parking. Free happy hour wine in the lobby, followed by home-baked cookies! Life's good!

My wife & I are on another California road trip and the first destination is Laguna Beach. This is our second visit to Orange County but our first in Laguna Beach. The hotel is just minutes from the downtown area by free trolley. This transportation is a god-send if you want to travel to the many beaches along the coast. We spent three nights at this hotel and really enjoyed our stay. The staff were friendly and welcoming and were able to help us with every question we had. Our room was spacious and the bed was large and very comfortable. Our coffee machine was faulty and was replaced with a new one. I highly recommend staying at this hotel, it is by no means cheap but nothing is in this part of the world.

We stayed here for three nightw. Great location.. Ten mins walk to downtown. Swimming pool onsite. Huge room .  Coffee machine fridge safe. Lovely and clean. Staff super friendly. Parking space too. Just by beach too

This is a nice, quiet hotel with a very helpful staff.  There is parking off-street, and not only a happy hour glass of wine is available, but milk and cookies, too!  The rooms are all very spacious and the furniture is well placed - nothing to squeeze around.  You'll need to venture out for breakfast, if you want more than a yogurt parfait, but there is a lovely French restaurant with coffee and pastries less than ½ mile away on the beach side of the street.

We spent ten days in this hotel. Wonderful location close to the beachs  and the city center. Many restaurants also close. Staff very kindly. Rooms very comfortable and clean. Available breakfast and wine and cookies in the afternoon.

Wonderful property! Has a mix between modern and campy 60’s California. So many nice touches...cookies and milk, coffee and yogert in the am and a wine hour. Rooms are very clean and decorated in decor that is beautiful and relaxing. Perfect location! Just one block from the beach and a few blocks from downtown Laguna. Loved this place!

Cookies and wine were amazing! Rooms were great too - very clean and comfortable. I would only request they provide yoga mats in the rooms since they are hardwood floors so difficult to do yoga without a mat.

Summary Heading: Great location, Friendly Staff, Nice Property
Summary: I've stayed and The Laguna Beach House several times and I have never been disappointed. The location is perfect for the beach (a few steps away) and many restaurants (a short walk). I especially like the hotel's proximity to Heiser Park, since I travel with my little dog and it is lovely to walk along the beach in the park. The staff members have always been friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean. The extra touches, such as yogurt, coffee, & tea in the morning and wine & cookies in the evening are a nice added touch.

sorry but it just won’t do ! I will refrain from giving it naught but only gets away with it because of its location nothing else-this a remodelled motel that’s wants to be ‘boutique’ on shoe string budget. Everything is cheap from the swimming pool to the terrible bed all the way to the soaps/shampoos + $15 extra for wine + cookies in the evening a/o skippy granola in the morning is a gimmick. Laguna Beach is splendide little town but The Laguna Beach H does not do it justice ! High time for a complete revamp cause the completion is not waiting on the sidelines...  Surf boards on the bedroom wall (and @ the reception) gives it an allure of cool Boho chic but it’s false pretence of wanna be surf lodge which amounts to ‘neither here nor there’.

This is a tastefully remodeled motel with a tiny pool priced like a luxury hotel.   Outrageous mini bar prices.  I was absolutely shocked to see 25oz water was $12 (msrp 2.50) and a 79 cent very small bag of chips for $8. Mexican coke $8!  Don’t support this rip off. We paid $400 for one night in a motel. Never again.

Great location for a visit to the  Pagent of The Masters, and Laguna Art Festival (park once, walk everywhere).  The property is of high quality with a nice beach vibe. The staff is friendly and helpful.  The rooms are very nicely appointed and very clean.  We loved the bed, slept quite well.    Loved it.

I enjoyed my stay at the Laguna Beach House! Great location to beach, park, restaurants and downtown. Room was clean and roomy. Bed was very comfortable. I plan to stay in this hotel when I come to visit Laguna Beach again.

Summary Heading: Nearly perfect place to stay in Laguna
Summary: We have stayed in every one of the top tier hotels in Laguna / So, Laguna (except the Montage as I will not stay in slick, charmless, corporate hotels) but are now priced out of them as we refuse to pay more than $500 a night for any hotel with the exception of historical European hotels on occasion.    Since it was under $500 and the reviews and location were so good, we decided to give LBH a try but only for two nights as we were skeptical.  We found it is lovely, very well appointed and of course clean - actually in like-new condition.  The rooms are not large but good use was made of their space and they are white, and importantly to us, they are decorated with great beachy style. GORGEOUS flooring. Very comfortable beds.  Only one block+ to the lovely Earth cafe.  The only

Great location!  We were able to walk to great shops, beach and dining!  Parked our car at arrival and didn’t use it again until our departure.  Nice amenities. I would stay at this location again.  Friendly staff.

We loved the Laguna Beach House! Very friendly staff, superb room & great vibe.  It was reasonably good value.  The rooms were extremely clean. We found the pool good fun of an early morning or evening & it was super close to the beach. Highly recommended! Thank you for a wonderful stay.

I stayed at the Laguna Beach House this past month with a couple friends to celebrate my girlfriend’s birthday and this was one of the most beautiful and relaxing stays I’ve ever had. I am so happy that we chose to stay at this hotel because it was literally next to the beach and the vibe of the hotel is very welcoming and peaceful.  I was checked in by a front desk agent named Karl, who was very knowledgeable about the area. Upon coming back from our birthday dinner, Karl notified us that we came back just in time for fresh baked cookies! WOW!!!! Milk and warm cookies before getting ready for bed was such a great treat! It definitely felt like a home away from home and I can’t wait to come back with other loved ones and show off the property & great service!

Haven’t seen my friends in California for years and chose to meet and sleep at the Beach House! We had a room on the top floor with a little view of the ocean and it was lovely. The gentleman Karl at the front desk later in the night was kind enough to pour us a glass of wine because we missed it earlier in the day. Coming back on our next reunion!

I went into this establishment while I was walking around town. There was something about this place that turned me onto it with its gentle and warm ambiance. I was greeted by a friendly desk man by the name of Karl and immediately fell in love with this place. Although the place was a bit out of my range I was told about future offers that would be more accompanying to my finances. I hope to visit this place soon and know that I will be treated with kindness. Nice staff!

Very warm greeting and very helpful in answering all our questions about the area.  To have the  use of chairs and umbrellas was added bonus as we did not have to travel with the bulk in our car. :))  Cookies and milk where a hit with my girls even though they are in there late teens. HaHa Thanks for a great weekend.

We had a girls night. Spent time at the pool, which was lovely, but a little small, but nice lounge chairs. The room was nice and clean. The towels were soft. The bed was amazing! Covered parking. The staff was friendly. The hotel is local to everything and easy to walk.

Laguna beach is a wonderful beach to go with your family, you can play Soccer, Beach volley, frisbee, all kind of sport cause there is plenty of room to do whatever you like, the only issue for us was the ocean water, is to cold, you can barely go in. The hotel we stay is beautiful, very cozy and friendly. Highly recommended

We really enjoyed our stay at Laguna Beach House. Carl was awesome-cared about giving us the best recommendations about snorkeling. We loved the location, a short walk into town or a walk along the cliffs to other beach coves!! Loved the hot tub after a day on the beach and coming back to a clean, tidy, beautiful room! We also enjoyed staying in a smaller boutique hotel. The courtyard at night with the lights, pool, and fire was such a treat. Thank you for such a great stay and welcoming unique property!

Nice place overall. Bright, cute lobby and rooms. However, the pool was very small (looked much bigger in the photos), the bed was very squeaky and we could hear our upstairs neighbors every foot step (we stayed pool level) so we were up at 7 am when all I wanted to do was sleep in on vacation.

We had a fabulous stay. Perfect location and hotel provided sun beds parasol and towels for the beach. Perfect stay! Parents enjoys wine hour whilst children loved the cookies and milk. We will he returning soon.

We enjoy coming back to The Laguna House every time we come back to Laguna for a visit. The staff is friendly, the rooms are very nice, the pool area is relaxing and the location is close to the beach. It’s a very nice place to stay.

Such a cute place to stay in the city! I was able to bring my little pup with me too, only a one time charge to the room. All I wanted was to have a lowkey getaway and this place was happy to serve. Lobby employee, Karl was very accommodating at check-in and shared his favorite parts of beach along the park just around the corner from the hotel. Best part of my stay was the fire by the pool with a glass of wine.

This was one of our stops on a tour of Southern California. It was our favorite of the four places we stayed. The staff were friendly, professional and informative. We liked that we were able to get chairs, an umbrella and towels from their sister location which is right on the main beach so we didn't have to walk to and from the hotel while carrying these things. The parking and resort fees are very reasonable and as we were checking out we were told that we could feel free to still utilize their parking lot for the rest of the day, which is really nice. Of course the wine and cookies are great too! The room was adorable, they really have perfected  capturing the charming laid back feel of Laguna Beach without compromising one bit of cleanliness, professionalism or luxury. Our

My stay was as delicious as the smell of the homemade cookies the kind and friendly staff bake for happy hour.  The property has been beautifully remodeled and the view is spectacular.  We highly recommend staying here

Very cute quaint beach hotel on the ocean side close to the beach. Very clean, nicely appointed, some ocean view rooms. Comfy beds. Nice stroll to the beach or downtown for the numerous shops and dining.

Really delighted with everything about Laguna Beach House. Friendly desk staff. The room was spotless; housekeeping was able to accommodate our request for unscented cleaning, not an easy thing to do. Love the surf decor, comfy bed, and interesting books in our room. Easy walk to just about everywhere you'd want to go in town. We can't wait to come back for a longer stay.

This Sunday my wife and I along with another couple went to the Cliff House in Laguna Ca. and sat right by the glass windbreak with a great ocean view. This time of year (Feb) you should at least BRING a jacked, because under an umbrella with shade it can get a little cool. I had the cobb salad loaded with eggs, beacon, etc. was big enough to feed half the Ugandan population! I should have just got that for both of us, she had the shirmp Louie which was also very good. All in all its a great outside eatery with great service, for a nice sunny am brunch with a great ocean view.

No complaints. Staff was friendly and helpful and room was clean and comfortable. Location was excellent and within easy walking distance to main part of town. Small breakfast available, but no other meals are served and no room service. Good parking area was available.

Front the moment we checked in to when we left the sfaff was amazing.  Our room I would have to say is the nicest part of the Motel. The room was completely remodeled and well decorated.  My only suggestion would be for them to update the pool area.

Facility was clean and up-to-date, with nice amenities: evening wine, cookies and milk, breakfast snack and coffee, nice pool and spa, including a gas fire pit. Certainly a big step up from many of the beach hotels.

Please note that they charge 15$ per night for resort fees!! And while it says on the website of the hotel that the rooms have refrigerator, they don’t, they only have a minibar full of beverages that you have to pay. The room was nicely decorated. The staff are not very helpful.

Summary Heading: Cute Place with a Welcoming Staff
Summary: Stayed here as a little "staycation" in Laguna Beach (we're from North OC). The location was the perfect distance from downtown. Best part was the staff and how accommodating they were, especially Karl. He helped in anyway he could and really went the extra mile for me and my kids. Will be back!

We stayed 6 nights at this property and had a great experience. The hotel is within walking distance to everything Laguna Beach has to offer. Having worked in the hospitality industry for many years I understand the most important thing is the bed. Ours was very comfortable and relaxing. The property is very clean and daily maid service was quick and efficient. We watched the July 4th fireworks from the seating area outside our room and greatly appreciated the show. The Pageant of Masters was amazing. Make sure to walk through Heisler Park located behind the property on the coast.

I had searched hotels ring to find one that was near the beach, yet convenient to the Pageant of the Masters, while wanting to bring our little yorkie. We were pleasantly surprised with LB House! I loved the room, very roomy, comfortable bed. Pool area is great, this definitely a hotel we will return to!!!

We spent a night at the Laguna Beach House so we could go to Pageant of the Masters.  Although it's old, the place is impeccably clean and has all types of whimsical knick knacks.  The beach is a quick block away and the pool is on the back side, allowing for quiet time.  Super friendly staff who were happy to make recommendations on where to eat and what to see.  We'd recommend it.

A good experience. Coffee could be better. Nice ambience. Great location and parking facility. We would stay there again. Instant hot water in the shower was a plus. Insulation worked: We couldn't hear the PCH. Enjoyed the smell of cookies in the evening.  Would be curious about any special off-season rates.

Had a great time at the Laguna Beach House thanks to Karl and his amazing customer service. Was going above and beyond to make us feel comfortable and at ease! The wine and cookies were a great touch as well :)
Manager Response: Dear Hollisterzoe,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you had a great time at the Beach House. Karl is an excellent member of our front desk team and I am glad he went above and beyond to ensure your stay was a success. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to your next stay.   Best,  Shayan

Summary: We enjoyed our 5 night stay over the 4th of July.  Paid a premium price because of the holiday.  Not sure it was worth the extra but the room and location did suit our needs.   Room, pool area and lobby were nice and clean.  They did miss cleaning our room one day and we had to go to the front desk and ask for fresh towels, etc.  Kind of annoying at that price. We were in a "coastal king balcony" room.  Not sure I'd call it "coastal".  You have a peek-a-boo view of the water from the front window and you do have a somewhat nice view south down the coastline from your very small private balcony.  With a wall around the balcony you have to stand to see the view.  It wasn't a place I would have spent a lot of time at and I don't think it was worth the extra money.  The lobby
Manager Response: Dear TishCalifornia,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you enjoyed your 4th of July stay at the Beach House.   I apologize your room was not serviced one of the days during your stay. Our staff strives to achieve all our guests expectations and I saddened to hear we fell short on that. Our Coastal rooms are located on the second level of our property and feature views of the Laguna coastline.  Thank you again for sharing your review, we sincerely appreciate the feedback and will use it to make improvements. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Clean room & very nice staff made our stay enjoyable in Laguna over the 4th of July holiday. Wine hour then milk & cookies later are always a hit in the lobby. Beach chairs & towels are available for guests to use as well as toys for kids. Our A/C unit was a bit loud & they said that would get taken care of. Very well taken care of property. About a 5-10 min walk to Main Beach. 1 block from Heisler Park.

Laguna Beach House is perfectly located by Hiesler Park for beautiful beach view walks, just minutes’ walks to yummy restaurants, and beaches to enjoy the water. This charming hotel is super clean with a pool area that was perfect to watch the fireworks show. The staff was so nice and made us feel comfortable.

We loved it here!  Easy parking and friendly lobby staff.  The room was super clean and comfortable.  There was a fireplace at the pool area at night that was lovely.  My kids loved the pool and hot tub.  A walk along Laguna Beach is just behind the hotel and easy to access. We will stay longer next time!
Manager Response: Dear NewYorkT,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. Our property is located just behind Heisler park, allowing for easy beach access for all our guests. Our Jacuzzi and fire pit overlook the beautiful Laguna coastline which makes it the perfect place to relax after a day at the beach.   Thank you for sharing your review. We look forward to your next stay.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Nice walking distance from everything.  Nice, clean, kept up well.  Friendly front desk.  Our second summer there. Beaches are beautiful, lots of pubs and places to eat, lots of stores, & even a market within walking distance.  One can drive into Newport area or Dana Point, but plenty to do without leaving town.  Close to free shuttle.

Room was super cute. Bed was large and soft. Staff was awesome and very courteous. A little more offered for the "Breakfast " would be nice. The container with the yogurt seemed very large for the amount of yogurt that was actually inside. Maybe add some muffins?

Really enjoyed LBH - great location a short walk to downtown and a lot of nice restaurants nearby, a block from beach, nice little balcony, stayed next to pool.  Firepit at night was great for keeping warm and talking with other guests. Parking is very convenient. Lobby is quiet and relaxing nothing fancy no drama.
Manager Response: Dear Tas M,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at our property. The Beach House is located in walking distance to the heart of Laguna Beach and nestled right behind beautiful Heisler Park. Our pool deck features a fire pit and Jacuzzi that stays open till 11pm. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to your next stay.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We had a great stay at the Beach House. The location is a little north of much of the happenings in Laguna Beach, but the mile walk or so was great exercise. Loved the convenience of the pool and the closeness of a big super market.
Manager Response: Dear Robert D,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. Located just North of the heart of town, the Beach House is in walking distances to restaurants and shops, including a Pavillions grocery store. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Karl at the front desk made our experience so nice. It was our first time there and Karl was our go to. We were even over charged at the time of check in by the lady with blonde hair whom I believe to be a supervisor or manager for incidentals and while Karl was not able to release the charges for reasons he explained to us, he did, however take care of us by offering other means to compensate for the error. The Laguna Beach House itself is very cozy, quaint and clean. Housekeeping also stayed on top of it as well as the groundskeeper. We were poolside and you can see the beach from your balcony. The view from the pool is priceless. We were within walking distance from the beach and downtown. If you don't want to walk you can catch the free trolley. The firepit was a highlight
Manager Response: Dear ERJ333,  Thank you for sharing your review. I am saddened to hear your stay at the Beach House did not begin as it should have but I am thrilled Karl was able to turn it around for you. Karl is an excellent member of our front desk team and I am happy he was able to assist you throughout your stay.   Our newly renovated pool deck boasts beautiful view of Heisler Park and the Laguna coastline and, includes a fire pit and Jacuzzi for all our guests to enjoy. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back for another relaxing stay.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Well located near Laguna Free Trolley stop for easy transit to downtown. Great walking area along the coast & main beach. Reciprocal privileges at the Inn At Laguna Beach. Continental breakfast was very basic (yogurt and granola in a common cup) very clean and accommodating staff. Would stay again
Manager Response: Dear Companion20337941169,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you enjoyed your recent stay with us. The Beach House is located in walking distance to the heart of Laguna Beach as well as Main Beach. Guests can also enjoy the local trolley that runs up and down Laguna and stops near the hotel entrance. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to your next stay.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Excellent little hotel in Laguna Beach. It's a short walk to the main beach and shopping. The staff was very helpful with recommendations since it was our first time in Laguna Beach. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Curiosity64954623955,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our friendly staff and convenient location make the Beach House the perfect hotel for any summer vacation. Thank you again. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Best little beach hotel for the money!
Summary: We loved Laguna Beach House. The staff was very accommodating. Everything that you need for a great beach get away is there for you including beach chairs to take down to the beach which is only steps away. In the evening they have a wine happy hour and after that they serve warm cookies and milk. They also serve coffee and yogurt with granola in the am. The rooms are decorated with cute surf decor and the beds are super comfy. It is also just a walk to all of the great restaurants in town. We are already planning a trip to come back in October with our friends.
Manager Response: Dear Roam67594011728,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. We could not agree more, our property is the perfect hotel for a beach getaway. We offer beach amenities like towels, chairs and umbrellas and beach access is only a few steps away. After a successful beach day, guests can enjoy our wine hour from 5pm-6pm followed by fresh baked cookies and milk that start at 6pm.   Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in October!  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: This is the second time I've stayed at Laguna Beach House. My daughter and I loved it the first time and decided to stay again. I really like the location, convenient to shopping and great restaurants. The rooms have a fun beach vibe, are clean and the beds are comfy! Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear Wanderer13738062483,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our property is conveniently located which allows our guests to be in walking distance to Laguna's best beaches, shops and restaurants.  Thank you again for sharing your review. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: The hotel is an easy walk to galleries, Heisler Park, Main Beach and restaurants. Comfortable, clean room. The staff was friendly and helpful. The property was quiet. We heard very little noise from PCH. Would stay there again without hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear Sightsee34813984959,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House including our clean and comfortable rooms along with our helpful staff. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Wonderful visit! Very charming hotel in an unbeatable locations. The staff was very accommodating and I definitely appreciate the home-y touches like milk and cookies and wine hour. Would definitely recommend!

Summary Heading: Cozy, clean, quaint property close to beach. Hospitable and friendly staff. Highly Recommend!
Summary: Excellent customer service and hospitality offered by friendly staff. Rooms were cheerful, comfortable, and clean. Property is quaint. Felt like home away from home. Staff was accommodating and went out of there way to make our stay pleasurable and more comfortable.  The property loans boogie boards, umbrellas, and other beach essentials during your stay. There are a few beaches a short walk away. Heisler Park and beach is beautiful. Highly recommend.  Property also offers wine hour from 5-6 pm and cookies at milk at 6 pm. Can’t say enough great things about the property. Plan to definitely stay at this property again.

Probably one of the best hotels I have stayed at, hands down. The staff was very friendly and communication was at an all time high. Our room could have used a cleaning in the mornings, but we’re very clean people and it was not that big of an issue. We have already started to plan our next trip to Laguna and this is where we will be staying

Great hotel in Laguna Beach! After roadtripping around the west coast in the US. We had this hotel as our last location to relax a few nights. We had a room on the 2nd level with a balcony. The balcony is on the backside of the hotel and has an ocean view which was nice. On the front we had a window to the swimming pool area and ocean view as well. With little kids and family gatherings around, other guests can be quite noisy and overwhelming. This is a small boutique experience. Not all guests realized this.. Which is unfortunate but not the hotel to blame.   Rooms were super clean and the beds were like heaven. Decoration of rooms and all other places was super nicely done. Really enjoyed our stay and would recommend my friends to go there!

This is a gem of a hotel.  Within walking distance to a very cool beach that my son spent hours body surfing at.  Small, clean and laid back. Great customer service and easy in and out.   Would stay again.

Loved this beach house.  Everything from the lobby, rooms,  to pool area is super charming and comfortable.  Great location just a block and half from secluded beach and walking distance to all the shops and restaurants.  Staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  My new favorite.

My husband and I loved staying at this hotel! We stayed for 6 nights. We wish our vacation was longer so we could have stayed more nights. The room was very clean, the bed super comfy, and the decor has a fun, classic California-beach vibe. The hotel location was great, just blocks from several beaches and the downtown shops/restaurants. They provide wine (4 pm - 6 pm) and homemade cookies (6 pm - 8 pm), which added to the fun. The amenities (beach chairs, umbrellas, towels, etc.) came in handy. We didn't have a car this time, but the parking was located on the premises (for a $15/night fee) - we live in NYC, so this fee seems reasonable. And we loved the friendly, helpful staff! Especially Michelle. She helped us out in a pinch, as we were originally booked at another hotel
Manager Response: Dear KristanBaker,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful review! We are thrilled you had a fantastic stay at the Beach House. Our spacious and comfortable rooms are decorated with unique California aesthetics that help create a California beach vibe through the entire property. We are delighted you enjoyed our amenities like wine hour, cookies and milk and breakfast offerings in the morning. I will make sure to pass along your kind comments to Michelle, a strong member of our team. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Enjoyed our stay at the Laguna Beach House. The hotel is quaint, the front desk staff was very nice. It's located walking distance to shops and restaurants. The pretty beach is a few minute walk from the hotel. I would recommend this property when visiting Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear gec1003,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location along with our easy access to Laguna's best beaches makes the Beach House the perfect location for every beach getaway. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Beds are comfy, walking distance to just about everything.  Wine hour and cookie hour are great!  Could be a bit cleaner for the price.  We kept running low on towels in our room and by the pool.  That was a little bothersome.
Manager Response: Dear Kay S,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoy your stay at the Beach House, including the amenities we offer like our wine hour and cookies and milk. I apologize for the delay in restocking towels, as summer approaches, we begin to go through towels more quickly but we will ensure the area is stocked at all times. Apologies again. We hope to welcome you back soon. Thank you.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Old but very clean and charming!  I will  definitely go back next time I am in the area.  I travel for business and it was very nice to stay someplace other than the normal hotel chain property.  Pricing was good, staff friendly and I felt welcome and safe.
Manager Response: Dear karennN3479FC,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Laguna Beach House. Our property is perfect for travelers looking for a little escape while on business. We look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: This hotel is just north of the heart of laguna. Fun beach vibe! We had a coastal view room and it was very clean and nice. Love the free wine hour from 5-6. Onsite parking. We had a great time in laguna!
Manager Response: Dear Caseycoil,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House! Our coastal level rooms have a breathtaking view of the Laguna coastline and our convenient location puts our guests in walking distance to some of the best beaches, shops and restaurants Laguna has to offer. Thank you again. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Very happy with Laguna Beach House. Staff were friendly and attentive, they had chairs and beach towels for us to use, were accommodative of requests, and the property is quite nice. Small, quiet hotel with exceptional service. Thank you for a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Guide49333064756,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your beach retreat at our property. The Laguna Beach House has beach amenities including towels, chairs, umbrella's and sand toys that all our guests are welcome to use. Our helpful staff is ready to assist with any requests you may have during your stay as well as provide recommendations and make reservations. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to your next stay with us.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: We were unable to obtain a third consecutive night at our preferred hotel, which referred us to the Laguna Beach House nearby. It is situated on Coast Highway just north of central Laguna Beach and a reasonable walk down to the beach. We were in Room 204, spacious and quiet, with a comfortable king-size bed. Despite being, in my judgment, expensive (as is much of Laguna Beach), the hotel charges $15 a night to park in the garage and offers as breakfast a plastic container of white yogurt with spoonsful of granola, and coffee or tea. This in addition to the weighty taxes, four of them, atop the room rate. Also, the cancellation policy, while publicized, seemed excessively punitive. We will not return.
Manager Response: Dear Gorco,  Thank you for sharing your review. We value all feedback as it gives us an opportunity to reflect and improve guest experience. With that said, I am saddened to hear your stay with us was not as you expected and for that, I apologize. I hope that you might be able to give us another chance in the future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Room is a good size, bed is very comfortable. My only complaint is some of the towels had blood splatter on them which is a first for me. A little better attention to detail on the clean towels would go a long way. Thankfully the room was well stocked with towels so I just used others.

Summary Heading: Wonderful accommodation close to the town and beach in delightful Laguna Beach
Summary: Really enjoyed our stay at Laguna Beach House. Fantastic rooms, beautifully furnished. The pool, fire pit and hot tub were great additions. The place is in a perfect location, just 2 mins walk to the cliff top and 5 mins down to the beach. Ideal for walking to all the bars, shops and restaurants in the town, only 8 min walk. There is a supermarket just 1 block away too which was great. Parking on-site made it easy. Laguna beach itself is a wonderful upmarket beach resort, I honestly can say my favourite California spot and have travelled extensively in CA.  Perfect for relaxing couples break.
Manager Response: Dear KatrineBournemouth,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at our property. The Beach House has a newly renovated pool deck featuring a fire pit and hot tub overlooking the breathtaking Laguna coastline. Our convenient location places our guests walking distance to the heart of town including the best bars, shops and restaurants.   We are looking forward to your next stay! Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Welcoming staff.  Helpful.  Detailed attention to room.  Great effort to drive revenue.  Great views.  Covered parking was exceptional.  More communication needed regarding fees for parking.  Added touch in rooms.  Weather couldn't be helped.
Manager Response: Dear TracyS2799,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House and we look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay. Thank you.  Best,  Shayan

Summary Heading: Perfect beach house! Did not want to leave!
Summary: We generally stay at hotel chains like Hilton but decided to take a chance on this hotel because of how great the hotel looked and how close it was to the water and as soon as we got there we realized we made a great decision. You can see the ocean from the pool it’s only a 10 min walk. The hotel is near the downtown area so you do not have to drive anywhere. The rooms were perfect and comfortable. We loved the free wine from 4-6 and milk and cookie hours from 6-8. The hotel provides its guest with so many   Amenities such as being able to rent chairs and towel to go to the beach. The decor is a relaxed beach vibe which is perfect for the area! Book this place!! You won’t be sorry
Manager Response: Dear Wander01360662921,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at our unique boutique property. Our convenient location puts our guests walking distance to some of Laguna's best beaches, shops and restaurants. The Beach House also provides towels, chairs, umbrellas and other beach amenities for all our guests to take to the beach with them. Thank you again for sharing your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Great hotel, with a Beachy feel.  Off the Beach and close to everything.  I think the rooms have been recently remodeled, they are modern and very clean.  We had a great time at our beach house away from home.  Would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler65816226333,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you enjoyed you recent stay at the Beach House. Our recently renovated rooms are spacious and clean, accommodating for all our guests. We are thrilled you consider the Beach House your home away from home and we look forward to welcoming you back for another amazing stay. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: I found this hotel when visiting my sister when she moved down to Main Beach and have stayed there every visit. Always nice guests at the hotel being social by the pool and the staff there is always great. The rooms are comfortable and casual. I've staying in a various room types there and they are all comfortable and roomy. The King rooms have a nice seating area. If you are traveling with others who are staying there are plan to have people over, consider the room with the private patio. Has it's own exit to the street (locks for security so no one can come in unless you let them in). Great price and great location!
Manager Response: Dear NewYorkActorDavid,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. One of our popular room types is our Pool King with a Private Patio which includes its own exit to the street and private outdoor seating area. Those rooms are located on the same level as our newly renovated pool deck and fire pit area which is at the heart of our hotel. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to your next stay.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Laguna Beach House.  Our room was nicely updated and very comfortable.  The staff is excellent and they go out of their way to make sure everything is more than satisfactory.
Manager Response: Dear GrandTour22444176228,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us, including our newly updated and comfortable rooms. Our helpful staff make themselves accessible to our guests for help with recommendations, reservations and anything they might need during their stay. Thank you again. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan

Summary Heading: Comfy and close to all of the great gems in Laguna.
Summary: We enjoyed the location, wine, cookies and milk at night and coffee/tea w/ a breakfast snack in the morning. Walked to the beach and all of our favorite places. The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Freedom607322,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House including our wonderful amenities like wine hour, cookies and milk and our breakfast options in the morning. Our hotel is walking distance to some of the best shops, restaurants and beaches Laguna has to offer. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Intimate, friendly and comfortable hotel right near the beach and a short walk to town. The staff were beyond amazing and would come back just for that! The MInibar was surprisingly well-stocked. Don't forget about the afternoon wine hour!

We were in Laguna for a family party. We really liked this place for our short Memorial Day holiday. Really nice room, amenities, and the people there took care to make sure we had extra coffee, etc. Comfortable bed, easy climate control and plenty of towels.  We would definitely stay here again! Also, no problem parking.

If you want the perfect Laguna Beach vacation - this is the place! Very peaceful, convenient hotel. Beautifully decorated and immaculate. The friendliest staff you could ask for and nice special touches, like wine in the evening. Beautiful cliff walk behind hotel and very convenient to walk to shops and restaurants in town. I'll definitely return.

We stayed at Laguna Beach for the last day of our road tour around California - it is well located and we loved the decor - in particular the staff were really friendly and made us feel welcome - we had a nice drink at the fire pit by the pool - the hotel is also well located for a walk to the beach or to nearby hotels

Stayed here with friends on road trip from San Francisco . Lovely hotel in great location . Bedroom was fabulous with lots of space and really comfy bed . Pool and jacuzzi were lovely and warm and the fire pit was great . Weather was bit mixed so enabled us to sit out . Staff couldn’t do enough to help and were so friendly
Manager Response: Dear Jet53325234114,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay with us including our fabulous and spacious rooms, newly renovated pool deck and our helpful staff. Located right off historic Pacific Coast Highway, the Beach House is the perfect hotel for a road trip along the coast. Thank you again. We look forward to your next stay.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Great location close to beach walk. Very friendly staff   Quiet and small facility. Nice rooms with fun beachy decor. We were very pleased with this gem we found at the last minute. Walked into town easily.
Manager Response: Dear Coastal02661210895,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our uniquely decorated rooms and friendly staff all add to what makes the Beach House the perfect hotel for a trip to Laguna Beach. Thank you again and we look forward to your next stay with us.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Awesome hotel, super soft comfy bed, nice jacuzzi area outside. Room 103 has its own private patio with fountain, very private! Would I stay there again? YES but I’d have to save my pennies up. You get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Dear walttikitiki,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House. Our newly renovated pool deck features our outdoor Jacuzzi overlooking the beautiful California coastline. Room 103 is one of two private patio rooms which includes its own private entrance, a large patio featuring a fountain and table and chairs. We are delighted you enjoyed the room and we look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: A lovely medium sized hotel, perfectly located in Laguna. Everything in walking distance, restaurants, Cafés, beaches, shops; great personell, like staying with friends 😊 very enjoyable, thank you for a great experience
Manager Response: Dear Getaway25055112422,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location puts our guests in the heart of Laguna Beach, close to beautiful beaches, unique shops and incredible restaurants. We look forward to your next stay. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: The hotel has such a relaxing comfortable vibe it made us feel very at home.  The rooms were clean and hotel just had the cutest decor.  Staff was extremely helpful and will to do what it took to make our stay great.
Manager Response: Dear Carol M,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our relaxing and comfortable vibe at the Beach House. Our property along with our staff aims to create a home away from home feeling with all our guests. We are thrilled your stay was relaxing and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: After staying at the Laguna Beach house 3 or 4 times a year over the last couple of decades, I’m sad to say I truly must down grade the star level I have given to it in the past.   Our stay was booked (months in advance) for April 28, 2019, checking out May 1, 2019 (we never made it to May 1, 2019). Upon check in, we were told that our room wasn’t ready at this time but they would be more then willing to call when it is. We left to enjoy the sites only to be called and tell us our room was ready about 15 minutes after our initial inquiry (1st failure to communicate).   We checked in and settled down, we unpacked and got ready for our long-awaited vacation in room 201. We stayed in that room many times before and have always been satisfied (although the shower has a slanted
Manager Response: Dear nativecal,  Thank you for sharing your review. I am saddened to hear your stay was less than enjoyable. I hoped with giving you a full refund on your one night stay, it would make up for the inconveniences you experienced at our property. Our apologies again and we hope you might be able to give us another chance in the future.   Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We stayed at the hotell for one night and it was a pleasure!  Clean and comfortable room (perhaps a little too many furniture in it) and a nice balcony with sea view. No breakfast other than coffee and yoghurt, but that was all what we wanted anyway! Very good parking under the hotel (street level).  Very nice and friendly staff made our stay very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Elisabeth W,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. Our comfortable rooms with breathtaking coastal views located right off historic Pacific Coast Highway put our guests in walking distance to some of the best features Laguna Beach has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Thank you.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We stayed at this hotel on our Pacific Highway trip.  It is simply so relaxing and in walking distance to both Laguna centre and the beach .  Rooms are well appointed and the pool is everything you need to chill.  Staff are exceptional and offer so much knowledge of the local area . Breakfast , wine hour and cookies and milk are a lovely added touch.  We stayed 2 nights and then returned and the end of our holiday . If you are planning a visit to Southern California then Laguna and the Laguna Beach is a must .
Manager Response: Dear homaleese,   Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you had a relaxing stay at the Beach House and enjoyed all our amenities including wine hour, cookies and milk, and coffee, tea, yogurt and granola in the morning. Our staff is always happy to provide recommendations on local events, restaurants and favorite spots to visit. We are delighted your stay was everything you hoped for and more. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Can't Wait To Stay Here Again!! Perfect Location! Excellent Service!
Summary: We stayed here for my daughters wedding. Just a block from the beach and with a wonderful walking trail. To get to the heart of town it is a mile or so walk but beautiful scenery. The hotel staff is amazing and the rooms are cute and extremely clean. Very glad we chose this small boutique hotel. Quiet, clean, and well priced.
Manager Response: Dear Darla J,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your time at the Beach House. Our helpful staff, clean rooms and location all add to what makes the Beach House the perfect hotel for any occasion. Thank you again. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: What a great escape from the freeway battles!  We planned an overnight at Laguna Beach and guessed that the Laguna Beach House would be our haven.  We were spot on. Laguna Beach House is perfectly located above the public beach areas and convenient walking distance to the active restaurant district and art galleries.  The room was great: second floor, beach windows on both sides.  The room was well furnished and immaculate. Not a sandy motel !
Manager Response: Dear Virginia O,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your escape to the Beach House. Located minutes from Main Beach and right behind historic Heisler Park, the Beach House had everything travelers need for a quick getaway. We are glad your stay was enjoyable and hopefully we can welcome you back for another great stay. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We had another great quick couple of nights at Laguna Beach house which is a lovely place to stay by the beach. It’s a Perfect location close to town and all the good restaurants and shops and by the beach 🏖 Lots to see and do in Laguna
Manager Response: Dear Jill F,  Thank you for sharing your review. We could not agree more, there is so much to see and do in Laguna and the Beach House is the perfect hotel to put you close to it all. We are walking distance to plenty of wonderful shops, delicious restaurants and beautiful beaches. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back for another successful stay.   Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Laguna Beach House was just our style.  Obviously a renovated older property.  It was nice,bright, clean and comfortable.  The bed made us want to buy a new mattress for our home. Karl was super helpful and friendly at the reception.  All of the staff were friendly as well.  It felt very welcoming with fresh oranges and icy water, wine in the early evening, followed by cookies, they provided yogurt & granola for breakfast.  Our room had a nice ocean view.  It was 1 block to the boardwalk and beach access and in a few minutes we had access to more fabulous restaurants than our short stay allowed.
