We loved the vibe, amenities, and location! Perfect for a couple wanting to get away for some relaxation. The front desk was always very helpful, and they made up for any problems that came up as well as they could. We walked to town along the beach path multiple times a day. The room was perfect  and comfortable. The wine and cookies at night were very welcomed! Use of the sister hotel was a nice perk! I would highly recommend this place!

We have stayed at Laguna Beach House several times. We have never been disappointed and it is our go to location. Rooms are large and nicely appointed and we are always comfortable there. We love the outdoor fire pit and finished each evening there. We can walk to all our favorite restaurants easily and Heisler Park beach is immediately around the corner.

This is the perfect spot to stay at. The staff was super friendly. Walking distance to the beach & downtown Laguna, where there’s  many shops and restaurants. My room was beautiful & nicely decorated. The lobby decor is beautiful. Being pet friendly is a big plus!
Manager Response: Dear Jet32943396636,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House including our friendly staff, convenient location and beautiful rooms. Our dog friendly policy allows our guests to bring their furry friends with them any time they visit too. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Stayed in a double queen room by the pool.  The property is so adorable and the rooms comfortable.  Staff was lovely as well.  We enjoyed the pool, hot tub and fire pit so much!  My husband and I were actually able to sit in the hot tub while kids played in the pool.  A first!  You won’t be disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear Dreamer07531897345,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our adorable property. The pool level rooms are located near the pool entrance which allows for easy access to the pool area. Our newly renovated pool deck has a pool and Jacuzzi along with a fire pit that guests can utilize. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to the Beach House soon. Thank you.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: friendly staff, very nice rooms with good beds, nice swimming pool with jacuzzi, sufficient parking spaces under the hotel, wine at the reception around 5 pm, coffee and yogurt in the morning and fresh cookies in the afternoon
Manager Response: Dear Wander03537173224,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House including our friendly staff, nice rooms and swimming pool and Jacuzzi. Our wine reception is a favorite among our guests as well the fresh baked cookies that follow. We hope to welcome you back for another wonderful stay at the Beach House. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: I’ve stayed at The Inn (sister property) and now this hotel. They, especially Peter, made my stay very homey. Very clean, safe and accommodating. I probably will be booking with either of the properties every time I visit Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Isabel A,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you have enjoyed both the Beach House and our sister property The Inn. I am happy to hear Peter made your stay enjoyable as well. We look forward to welcoming you back to both properties in the near future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Went to the LBH for a last minute stay.  The hotel is a great little spot right on PCH that has a warm and friendly vibe.  Front desk was awesome.  Karl esp deserves a huge shout out as he saved us from going back to a competitor that was awful.  Karl should give lessons in customer service. The hotel itself is very charming with a great little pool and all of the extras you could want..or not even know you want.  For example they bag ice up in the cooler, so you can just grab a bag and open it in your ice bucky no mess.  Never seen it, but really clever. in all, was a great spot..and they price match. thanks Karl for saving our weekend.
Manager Response: Dear Hobiz2,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at the Beach House and that Karl was so helpful. The Beach House is a charming coastal property right off PCH with a staff that aims to exceed the expectations of all our guests and I am glad Karl was able to do that for you. We are glad your weekend was saved and we hope to welcome you back soon for another wonderful weekend. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: This location was perfect to enjoy the beach.  We especially enjoyed happy hour with complimentary wine at their sister resort which had rooftop terrace to enjoy ocean view!  We can’t wait to go back to this little gem!
Manager Response: Dear Monica R,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted to hear your stay at the Beach House was enjoyable. We are glad you were able to attend wine hour at our sister property, The Inn at Laguna Beach. All Beach House guests are welcome to use the amenities at the Inn, including their terrace and terrace bar. We cannot wait to welcome you back to our property. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: The hotel was in a good location. An easy 5 minute walk to the beach. An easy 8 minute walk to restaurants and boutique shops. The accommodation was great, rooms were ready as early as 2:00 PM. Front desk staff were all very courteous and approachable. The milk and cookies at 6:30 PM was a hit with my 2 kids. There was never a long wait at the elevator. On site parking was very convenient and you could easily go back and forth from and to your room and your parked vehicle. It’s situated in a very safe neighborhood. Highly recommended for a weekend couple or family getaway. I like how the sink is located outside of the bathroom. Room was spacious for a family of 4. No complains during our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Daydream20481377984,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you and your family enjoyed your time at the Beach House. Our convenient and safe location puts the Beach House in walking distance to some of the best features of Laguna while maintaining a homey and safe feel. Along with our friendly staff, spacious rooms and hotel amenities, the Beach House is the perfect hotel for any vacation. Thank you again. We look forward to your next stay.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Room was huge, staff was super friendly, and it was so close to the beach, food, and shopping. I was there with 4 kids and it was fantastic to be able to walk everywhere we needed to go. I couldn't have asked for a better place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Connector23313121920,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location and friendly staff all add to what makes the Beach House a unique coastal property. We look forward to welcoming you back for another fabulous stay. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We stayed here for two nights in April and I really liked it. We didn't take full advantage of all it had to offer, but our room was very nice and clean, the staff was very friendly and helpful with our questions and the location was great. I would recommend this hotel for sure. Only downside is you have to pay for parking:(
Manager Response: Dear Departure318630,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your two nights at the Laguna Beach House and we hope to welcome you back for an even longer stay so you can take advantage of all our amazing amenities like cookies and milk, wine hour and more. Our hotel is just a few steps away from some of the best features of Laguna Beach and our helpful staff can guide you on where to go. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Great surprise to stay at this contemporary "retro" hotel that was well maintained, service was helpful and friendly and had the fun feel of the old roadside surf motels of the '60''. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Mike L,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed our contemporary retro hotel off historic Pacific Coast Highway. We have unique elements that set our property apart from others and a friendly and helpful staff that make the Beach House the perfect coastal hotel. Thank you again, we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: 2nd time we have stayed here and will always stay here in the future.  Love this place, it is ADORABLE!  The rooms are immaculate and well presented.  The staff cannot be more helpful.  Wine at 5 and milk and cookies at 6. I can't get enough of this place.  The huge Fire pit and a glass of wine in the evening is a wonderful way to end a day in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear paulacurd2012,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed another stay with us at the Beach House. Our newly renovated pool deck and fire pit are the perfect way to end a day in Laguna Beach. Our unique rooms and helpful staff all help set the Beach House apart from other coastal hotels. We look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay at the Beach House. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Great place with wonderful staff, updated rooms, and great location.  All the little things the hotel does to make your stay more enjoyable are really exceptional and add to the enjoyment of the stay at LBH
Manager Response: Dear Adventure65928734638,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us including the little things like wine hour and cookies and milk along with our wonderful staff and updated rooms. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay at the Beach House.   Best,  Shayan

Summary: Our visit was for a wedding and we wanted a good value hotel somewhat out of the fray. Laguna Beach House filled the bill. Our room was bright, clean and quiet. The grounds were tidy and there was good parking. Loved the low key vibe, too.
Manager Response: Dear cruzindjaj,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House including our bright, clean and quiet rooms and low key vibe. We look forward to your next stay with us. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Amazing Location for Spring Break Beach Vacation
Summary: This was a girls trip- 2 moms and 2 little girls (under 5) and this hotel was perfect for us! It's walking distance to everything and just a block from the beach for easy access, although it was hard to pull the little girls away from the pool! The pool was the perfect size for them and they bounced back and forth from pool to hot tub and we were able to relax in the lounges and enjoy the day! The pool deck gets a lot of sun, so it was much warmer than the beach- We enjoyed it at night too with the fire pit! The staff was very helpful and kind and the rooms were clean and comfortable. We had a nice little patio and were pool level which was great for the kids. We didn't want to leave! Great restaurants just down the road- Reunion Kitchen and Urth Cafe were favorites!
Manager Response: Dear Shannon A,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your girls trip to Laguna Beach and your stay at the Beach House. Our convenient location, newly renovated pool area and fire pit and helpful staff make the Beach House the perfect hotel for a spring break vacation. We hope to welcome you and your family back to the Beach House soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Cute quaint hotel. Can’t explain the loud vibrating noise!
Summary: The hotel was very cute. Nice, clean room. Great, friendly staff. However, there was a very loud noise from maybe 7-11am. Sounded like a generator. Maybe it’s because my room was right next to the pool.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip637020,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you enjoyed our nice, clean rooms and friendly staff. I do apologize that you experienced loud noises during your stay. We will make sure to address this to avoid future occurrences. We do hope that you will visit our property again soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Overall, it was a great experience!  The location was perfect, great amenities, nice staff, and bright, modern rooms.  Only negative was the noise from people walking around in the room above us.  The insulation in the floors must not be great. Maybe some rugs would help?  The staff was very accommodating to us when we told them about the situation.   We'll be back :)!
Manager Response: Dear Maps65662087459,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your spring break in Laguna Beach. I apologize you experienced noise issues during your stay but I am happy our staff was able to assist you. Our amenities, modern rooms and accommodating staff all add to what makes the Beach House a unique property along the coast. Thank you again. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay. Great ocean view and felt like a private beach house. Wine happy hour was awesome. I look forward to returning. A great value for Laguna and close to great restaurants, parks and beaches.
Manager Response: Dear Michael H,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House. Our beach vibes, cozy atmosphere and coastal views all add to the feel of private beach house in Laguna. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: We absolutely loved staying here - the location was perfect, the staff wonderful and the site was just what we were looking for - plus, the fresh coffee and yogurt in the mornings and cookies and milk in the evening really kept us going - thanks for a great trip!
Manager Response: Dear Departure39306389097,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at the Beach House including our helpful staff, breakfast options and cookies and milk in the evening. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another great trip soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Hotel was clean and did feel like a beach house. They have wine hour and cookies and milk in the evening, wished cookies were gluten free though...  Loved that the keys are made with recyclable Burch and not plastic. Such a great touch to being eco-friendly!
Manager Response: Dear Daydream26522825853,  Than you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at The Beach House. Our hotel aims to be a friend to the environment which includes eco-friendly initiatives like recyclable keys and water conservation methods. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary Heading: Great spot - but ruined by guest noise.
Summary: This place is great with one terrible flaw. Location is awesome. Decor is really cool. Rooms are totally comfy. Staff is totally attentive and professional. But - we were in a downstairs room and the noise of foot traffic from above was unbearable. Like a dance party on our heads. Construction is too thin and sound travels hugely. Make sure to get an upstairs room to avoid that. We moved rooms but then got awakend by screaming children in the adjacent room.  If you are easy-going, a night owl and early rise, don't worry about it. If you need your beauty rest, this may not be the place for you.
Manager Response: Dear Colin D,  Thank you for sharing your review. I am disappointed our property did not meet your expectations. I understand how frustrating it is to experience constant noise and I truly apologize. I hope that you may allow us the opportunity to show you how enjoyable our property can be. We hope we may have a chance to show you how truly relaxing our property can be. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan

Summary: Amazing quaint hotel that is close by to everything. The decor is amazing and the rooms are perfect. The staff is always really friendly and accommodating. Shout out to Peter at the front desk who always is super friendly and helpful with everything. Will be back ASAP!
Manager Response: Dear Trip22500621119,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. I am especially happy to hear our staff, including Peter, was friendly and helpful. Our unique design and convenient location makes the Laguna Beach House the perfect stop on any trip. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Not as good as expected in terms of service
Summary: Pros: I stayed here for just under two weeks, as a visitor to the area 2-4 times a year. The rooms were lovely and parking very convenient. Yogurt and coffee in the morning is great, putting the wine in glass cups rather than plastic would be a nice touch. The bed and bed linen were comfortable and good quality. Can’t best the location.   Cons: The pool area was out of service my entire stay but I didn’t mind as the weather was cool. 3 times during my stay,I had to request shower gel as housekeeping didn’t leave any out.  My last day they didn’t clean my room and the front desk claimed there was a note that housekeeping saw a do not disturb sign. There was not, I’d left at 6am and the front desk the next day confirmed my room had been marked down as for cleaning.  I sent a
Manager Response: Dear Neev321,  Thank you for sharing your review. I sincerely apologize our housekeeping team did not perform as expected during your stay. This is very unlike our staff and we will make sure this is addressed immediately. Furthermore, I apologize that no one reached out to follow up on your experience at our hotel. Please contact me directly at svahdati@theinnatlagunabeach.com to discuss your stay. Again, I apologize that the Beach House failed to exceed your expectations. Please allow us the opportunity to make up for it. Thank you.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: A wonderful place to stay, very close to the beach, reasonably priced, with staff who go out of their way to accommodate the needs of guests.   Check-in was easy and we were pleasantly surprised when the front desk staff allowed us to check in early, as the room had been cleaned.   The place is well-maintained, thoughtfully decorated in a retro-SoCal-surf style.   And all the extra touches--warm cookies and milk in the evening!!  Who does that?!!!   We had an incredible time!   We'd stay there again anytime!
Manager Response: Dear Relax09842192791,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are thrilled you were able to check-in early and begin enjoying our hotel amenities. Anytime we can get our guests in early, we certainly try too. Our style is unique and combined with our convenient location, helpful staff and clean rooms, the Beach House is the perfect destination for Laguna Beach visitors. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Wonderful spring break visit with our kids who had never been to the west coast! Laguna was the perfect beach town to relax and have some fun yet still had shops and restaurants to enjoy. We would highly recommend this perfect location!
Manager Response: Dear Adventure11484084095,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted you and your family enjoyed your trip to the West Coast and to our hotel. We agree, Laguna is the perfect beach town. It has shops, restaurants, entertainment and of course, beautiful beaches. Thank you for making the Beach House a part of your Spring break trip. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: This hotel was among the properties recommended for a friend's wedding. I have been to Laguna many times, but never stayed at this property. I had a wonderful experience. The staff was excellent, the grounds were well kept and the rooms clean. There was a great manager's reception with wine and fresh baked COOKIES! I would highly recommend this property for a family getaway or romantic retreat. Within walking distance (right around the corner) to a beautiful park and beach access.
Manager Response: Dear Nicole H,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled to learn you had a wonderful experience at the Beach House. Our wine reception followed by cookies and milk are a favorite among our guests and we are happy you enjoyed them. Our convenient location puts our guests steps away from all the beautiful features of Laguna Beach, including gorgeous beaches that are just around the corner from our property. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: The Laguna Beach House was awesome. My family had a great time. The rooms were clean and nice. The staff were friendly and helpful. The beach towels and chairs were a huge plus. We look forward to our next visit
Manager Response: Dear Climber56590282249,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. Our friendly staff, clean rooms and beach amenities all add up to the perfect spring break trip. We are looking forward to welcoming you and your family back to the Beach House for another memorable trip. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Loved that coffee and yogurt were available in the mornings. Great location and value! Very clean nice rooms, and a nice layout. I would say the hotel is located about a few blocks or a two minute walk to the water.
Manager Response: Dear Safari46242544660,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, especially the coffee, yogurt and granola in the morning. Though we are not directly on the water, we are right behind Heisler Park which has beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean and pathways down to the water. Thank you again, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Beach House soon.   Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Becoming Our Favorite Return Destination Property
Summary: This charming hotel anchored our first visit to Laguna Beach a few years ago and so successfully set the stage for that trip that we were thrilled to return on this most recent weeklong visit.  The retro surf ambience is true Laguna and harkened to my Southern California childhood, bathing me in sweet nostalgia.  There's a sophisticated but low-key vibe here that is welcoming and engaging, most evident in an outstanding front desk staff.  The location is ideal, just off beautiful Heisler Park and in easy walking distance of the town center.  The little extras, from morning coffee and yogurt parfaits, towel service, to the evening wine hour, make for a warm and gracious feel.  Rooms are well appointed with quality toiletries, plush linens, extremely comfortable beds, and great
Manager Response: Dear PrairiePaddler,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are always delighted to welcome back return guests to the property. We are glad our front desk was welcoming and our hotel amenities were able to make your stay enjoyable. Our property, nestled behind Heisler Park, boasts breathtaking coastal views where guests can still hear the waves from our pool deck and fire pit. Thank you for enthusiastically recommending us, we look forward to welcoming your friends to the Beach House and we hope they enjoy their time here as much as you have. Thank you for providing the bonus tips as well, we will make sure to pass those along to our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you.  Best,   Shayan V

Summary Heading: Great stay, but unaware of all the amenities
Summary: We had a great stay at Laguna Beach House. The staff was friendly, the rooms were clean and the property was quiet. Upon checkout we were charged a $15/day amenities fee which we were unaware of, it was then we were told about all the amenities we had just paid for. Would have been great to have heard about them at check-in.
Manager Response: Dear Coastal01781063042,  Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us. I apologize we did not inform you at check-in about the lovely amenities our property offers like wine hour, cookies and milk and coffee, tea, granola and yogurt in the morning. We truly hope to welcome you back to the Beach House soon so you can enjoy those amenities and many more fantastic features of the property. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Wrapped in a ‘70s surfer vibe, Laguna Beach House fits the bill for a relaxing vacation, from the hotel’s close proximity to amenities, to the extremely comfortable beds. The staff were friendly and accomodating. Our king-size room was spacious and inviting. A special thanks to front-desk clerk Carl who, after being informed of my nut allergies, made me a fresh batch of cookies on the spot. Yes, there’s a cookie hour every night, preceded by a wine hour - all complimentary. Also, the fruit-infused water was very refreshing. Thanks for a relaxing stay in Laguna. We’ll definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at the Beach House and that our front desk agent was able to assist you during your stay. Our wine hour, cookies and milk, spacious rooms and convenient location all add to what makes the Beach House the perfect hotel for a relaxing vacation. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Very quaint hotel, great location within walking distance to downtown Laguna. Staff was helpful and friendly.  Nice touch with nightly wine hour followed by milk and cookies. Bring your own K-cups, there's a Keurig in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House.  Our property is located minutes away from Laguna's city center and scenic beaches. We are glad you enjoyed the wine hour, cookies and milk and the coffee makers in the room. Though we provide K-cups in the rooms, guests are definitely welcome to bring their own to use as well. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We had a great time at this property.  The rooms were clean and welcoming.  The staff was great and the property was close to several beaches.  Unfortunately, the pool was being fixed but we were able to use their sister properties facility just up the street.  Beach towels, chairs, umbrella, and boogie boards were all provided at no additional charge.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your time at the Beach House and were able to use the beach amenities offered at the front desk. We apologize about the pool but we appreciate your patience and understanding during our time of improvement. We look forward to welcoming you back to the property now that our new pool deck is completed. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Hip hotel is the best deal in Laguna.
Summary: This hotel has it all; location, style, comfort, cleanliness and great customer service!  The rooms are stocked with goodies to choose from and cozy robes to lounge in.  The ocean view is lovely with the shades open during the day.  Short walk to shops, beach and good food.  I can’t wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you agree our hotel has it all: convenient location, unique style, comfortable and clean rooms along with a helpful staff. We are glad you enjoyed the mini bar in the rooms which are filled with delicious snacks and an assortment of drinks. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Beach House to enjoy our coastal views in the near future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: I rarely stay at small independent hotels but this property is adorable. Clean, comfortable, affordable. Way more than one would expect. The bed was on par with the beds at Marriott and Hilton properties.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed our small, independant property with clean rooms and comfortable beds. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Great location and friendly staff and good price
Summary: I went back and forth between average and very good for review. On the very good side - the location is great. The rooms are clean and have that beach house feel with nice robes and Lather bath products (I regularly purchase Lather products). The staff is very friendly and helpful. Parking is easy and close to the rooms. I almost selected average for the following reasons: I selected a coastal view room and was excited to be able to just sit and enjoy the view. The rooms do not have private balconies or patios so that was a bit disappointing. It was just a view from the window. The pool area was closed for remodeling, which I was not aware of when I booked, so we didn't have that option to just sit and relax. They did offer their sister property for those who wanted to use the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. Our central location accompanied by our spacious rooms with coastal views and helpful staff make the Beach House the ideal hotel in Laguna Beach. We are glad you enjoyed our bath products including Lather soaps, shampoos, and conditioners along with our comfortable robes. We apologize for not letting you know in advance about the pool but appreciate your patience and understanding during our time of improvement. We hope to welcome you back in the near future to enjoy our new pool area. Thank you again for sharing your review.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: It was a cute little hotel, loved being able to walk to all the shops and restaurants in the area. Lot's of choices and the beach is right there. We liked our room, bed and pillows were comfortable and even though we didn't use any I loved how the room was stocked with drinks and snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are so glad you enjoyed your mini honeymoon with us! Our stocked mini bar along with spacious and comfortable rooms combined with our convenient location make the Beach House the best hotel for any trip. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Best,  Shayan

Summary: Beautiful location and beautiful accommodations. Quiet get away for great value. Friendly staff, continental breakfast which sufficient for us, & covered parking.  Walking distance to town and beach.  Would definitely go back
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We love that you loved your stay at the Beach House. Our location, amenities and staff all add to the qualities that set the Beach House apart from other hotels. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We have stayed here twice in February. We really like it. The staff is great and the hotel is central. I love the room layout. It is very comfortable and within walking distance to the beach and restaurants. The weather wasn’t great on either stay but we still enjoyed our time in this quaint beach town.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time at the Beach House. The comfortable rooms located walking distance from shops, restaurants and the beach make our hotel the perfect destination in Laguna. Hopefully the next time we welcome you back, you will be greeted with better weather too. We are looking forward to your next stay. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Nice beding, nice situation but closed swimming pool and noisy if on the road side
Summary: the rooms were very nice and clean, the bedding were perfect. The morning drinks and muesli was nice even if you have nowhere but the sofa in the entrance to sit down. The downside is that the swimming pool was under construction but no one warned us on the website nor on the phone. The person at reception was very nice and proposed to use the other hotel few blocks away that had a nice swimming pool which we did. But i would have liked a warning. I dont understand why we have to pay an extra 15$ for the parking. Everyone comes by car this should be included in the room rate. Also, the room on the street side was a bit noisy. But overall the place is well located. I would prefer to find something more convenient for kids next time with an open swimming pool, maybe a full
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed the coffee and tea service in the morning and our comfortable rooms. We apologize sincerely that our pool was not available during your visit and we appreciate your understanding. We hope that we may welcome you back once the renovation is complete so you can enjoy our new and updated pool area. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: I love this hotel! The location is central to everything, they are dog friendly the rooms are large and airy and they create a comfortable and homey atmosphere. I love the breakfast bar in the morning and wine and milk and cookies in the evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us. I am thrilled you enjoyed our spacious and airy rooms along with our amenities like wine hour and cookies and milk in the evening and coffee, tea, granola and yogurt in the morning. We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: This is an old hotel/motel that has been nicely renovated, but still small rooms, old style bath. Very little counter space. For the money, should at least include a decent breakfast besides yogurt & cereal.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. I am saddened to hear our hotel did not meet your expectations. We appreciate all feedback given and will make sure to address your concerns. We hope that you may give us another chance in the future to show you our improvements. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Beautiful spacious rooms! Comfortable beds and sheets, I loved it. This hotel is a STEAL. They could probably charge twice the amount that I paid, (If the the amenities like wine and cookies were more sophisticated or a crafted specialties). I'd prefer a good deal of course.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Thank you again!  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: The value and room was very nice.  The staff "Peter" in particular was very helpful and pleasant.  Some things are just out of the front desks control.  I did pay the $15 for parking when I was told I wouldn't have to.  The sheets and pillow cases were clean BUT they had a very strong smell of bleach.  Southern California doesn't get much rain normally but because the pool was being worked on...they had plastic over the entire area.  The sound of the rain on that all night and the blowing from the wind sounded as if we were in a constant hurricane all night.   We would have driven home that night just 10 miles down the road to San Clemente but the roads were flooded and the kids were already tucked in with the babysitter for the night
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. I am glad Peter was able to assist you during your stay with us. I will make sure to pass along your kind comments. I apologize that the tarp was causing issues during your stay. We sincerely appreciate your patience and understanding during our time of improvement. Since you are local residents, hopefully we can make it up to you when our renovation process is complete. We truly hope to welcome you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We had a wonderful stay from the moment we arrived to check in until we checked out. Very pleasant staff, our room was spotless clean, simple but very nice, a comfortable bed, soft towels, and we even had a view. It was an easy walk into downtown Laguna. The price was reasonable. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House from check-in to check-out. We are thrilled you enjoyed our convenient location, reasonable prices and comfortable rooms. We look forward to your next visit. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Beachy atmosphere with very friendly staff; made to feel welcome and wanted. Short walking distance to town and coast. A little shop worn but fits with beach motif. Only disappointment was the booking procedure. The entire pool area and some roof work was occurring during our stay. This was not mentioned on the website, from which I booked.  But to their credit I was adequately compensated with no hassle.  I would go back when all is shipshape.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House despite experiencing some troubles with the booking procedure. We thank you for your understanding during our time of improvement and we hope to welcome you back to our updated property. Thank you again for sharing your review. We look forward to your next stay.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: The staff was so welcoming. Peter went out of his way to help us out. Could not have asked for anything better. Highly recommend the Laguna Beach House. Clean room and beautiful views. Thank you. Ilene
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind review. We are thrilled you enjoyed our property and Peter was able to help you. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: It rained all weekend but we still enjoyed the solitude. The sound of the surf, the rain drops, a stocked minibar, and super comfy mattress had us relaxed almost immediately. Would highly recommend for anyone looking to unplug. Even if it’s only 36 hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House even while it was raining. Our comfortable mattresses and stocked mini bar make our property the perfect place to relax. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: What a great property! Booked this on a whim and I am so happy that I did! I raved about it to my friends and family and can’t wait to go back. I live in the next city over but it was such a nice little getaway. My room was large, clean and bright. Perfect stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House, including our large, clean and bright rooms. Thank you for sharing your great experience with your family and friends, we hope to welcome them to the property soon. Thank you again for sharing your review and we look forward to your next stay.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We stayed one night in a King balcony room. The room was large, clean and well appointed. the bed was very comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of Fisherman's Cove and Laguna Main Beach. The staff members, including the manager, were very friendly and helpful. The hotel has been completely renovated and is beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our spacious rooms and comfortable beds while being walking distance to some of the highlights of Laguna Beach. I am glad our welcoming staff was friendly and helpful during your stay. We are looking forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Good breakfast though very basic (yogurt and granola.  Cookies and milk were lovely.  Would have enjoyed the wine hour if we'd been there on time.  Helpful staff.  It is really annoying that I have to write 200 characters to submit this review.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and our amenities like cookies and milk in the evening and coffee, tea, yogurt and granola for breakfast. We hope to welcome you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: I’m glad to have decided to book my one-night stay at this hotel. Upon entering the property, I was gleeful to see how well-decorated the lobby was. I was greeted and assisted by Karl at the reception desk. Karl was professional, warming, and very articulate about what the hotel has to offer. Although I had no intention on using neither the pool or hot tub, Karl explained that the pool area was under construction, but I had the choice to go to their sister property, Inn at Laguna Beach, to utilize their pool and hot tub, if I wanted. Karl also informed me about their wine hour, and milk and cookies hours. Overall, the check-in process was fast and efficient. My room was clean, well lit, and decorated neatly. I like how there’s a basket of water and snacks, should you choose to
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us, including our clean and spacious rooms with beyond comfortable beds. I am thrilled to hear Karl was helpful and welcoming upon check-in as well. We are just as excited to welcome you back for another relaxing stay at the Beach House. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: The claims and photos online do not match the experience at the hotel. The deluxe King room with "ocean view" and a balcony, was tiny, with an awkward "balcony" that opened onto the apartment buildings next door. The ocean view was obtained by craning out your front door to see the ocean in the distance. The pool and spa were under construction and we were not notified in advance, for we would have cancelled the reservation had we known. The place was very clean and nicely decorated. The management were gracious.  Just disappointing not to have the experience we were hoping for in Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. I am saddened to hear our hotel did not meet your expectations. We apologize for not notifying you in advance that our pool would be under construction. Unfortunately, renovation lasted longer than anticipated but our guests are more than welcome to use the pool and jacuzzi at our sister property, The Inn at Laguna Beach. I sincerely hope you will give us another chance to showcase the amazing coastal views and amenities our property has to offer. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: If you want the Southern Cali vibe close to the beach, shops, galleries, bars, happy hour, and nightly cookies and milk stay here!We loved our two days in Laguna because of this property. They even had beach chairs and towels ready for us. Nothing was missed and the robes were a nice add to make us feel at home. I will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. The Beach House is just minutes away from some of the best beaches, shops, galleries and bars in Laguna Beach. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time in Laguna and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.   Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Nice Non-Chain Hotel with a great location
Summary: This is a non-chain hotel. Clean, well maintained, comfortable beds, and everything works perfectly.  It is a short walk to Heisler Park, The Laguna Art Museum, and Main Beach Park.  Food is also within walking distance or in some cases a short Uber ride..
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our location is convenient since we are close to restaurants, art galleries, shops and of course, beautiful Laguna beaches. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Beach House soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Just had a two night stay here on our trip through California. We were greeted by Michelle who was very helpful helping us with ideas for restaurants which proved perfect.  The room we had was very nice all newly refurbished we did have a small problem with the lovely sink but got by during our stay without it being fixed. The King room was spacious and well laid out.  The pool area is undergoing refurbishment so can’t be used but it wasn’t warm enough to use it. We did a day trip to San Diego from here.  Wine is served between 5-6pm a nice touch and cookies if you wish to have them afterwards. Breakfast is hot drinks and yoghurt granola something just to get you up & moving but them are many restaurants all around the B&B.  We enjoyed our two night stay here and would recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our property and the amenities we offer like wine hour, cookies and milk and breakfast in the morning. I am thrilled Michelle was able to provide recommendations that you enjoyed during your stay. I will make sure to pass along your kind words. Thank you again for sharing your review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: I couldn’t wAit to leave a review! The website and pictures don’t do this boutique hotel justice. The minute we walked in the lobby we were in love. The staff is so kind and even more to our family who met us during our stay and didn’t stay over. They include them in the wine hour and cookies! The room was adorable and we had a coastal king balcony facing south (207)-it as perfect for morning coffee and leaving door open for a cross breeze like a real beach house. The room was bright and airy  and tons of space. Morning coffee was a great touch and even though no breakfast the yogurt and granola were a great start. Walking distance to everything and trolley just a block or 2 away. We stopped at the sister property during their wine hour for views of the pacific and they were
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful review! We are so glad you enjoyed our property. The staff, location, amenities and spacious rooms all combine to create a unique experience for every guest. We are thrilled you had a chance to visit our sister property, The Inn at Laguna Beach, as well and enjoy the gorgeous views from their terrace. Thank you again for taking the time to write your review, we appreciate it. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Very gratifying vacation.Helpful personnel. Loved the wine and  cookies served daily.Convenient to restaurants and the beach.Rooms are very clean and comfortable.Convenient parking facility.Close to downtown Laguna Beach
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope our amenities and convenient location will bring you back to the Laguna Beach House soon. Thank you again. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Although our room was spacious and had some nice features, the bed was a little too soft and the room was too cold at night. The pool and jacuzzi area was closed down during our stay. We were also kept awake until around 3:15 am because of noisy drunken neighbors in an adjacent room.

We loved this hotel! Very clean, beachy vibe. Easy parking. Staff was very nice and gave great tips on the local eating and drinking. You can also visit their sister hotel for wine/drinks during their happy hour times on the rooftop (just 2 blocks away and a beautiful walk down the beach front).. A lot of yummy restaurants in walking distance so you don't have to keep ordering Ubers or worry about driving from place to place. We are looking forward to making this our regular "go to" get away spot!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad to hear you loved our hotel and its beachy vibe. Our central location accompanied by our caring staff make it the perfect "go to" getaway spot. We are always excited to welcome back our return guests and we look forward to your next stay. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: The front desk staff was absolutely awesome Peter and Annette? (Not sure of her name). I dropped off some birthday decorations and they decorated the room for me as we were celebrating my wife's birthday. They truly could not have been more helpful and welcoming. Can't wait to go back.....
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are delighted that you decided to celebrate your wife's birthday at the Beach House. I'm glad Peter and Annette were able to assist you with decorations and I'll make sure to pass along your kind comments to them. I hope your wife enjoyed her special day and we look forwarding to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Perfect balance of location, price, staff, room
Summary: King, ocean view room.  Spacious room, spotless, functional. Think classic California coastal motel, but redone and refreshed -- not gutted and turned into a boutique hotel. Still has the old vibe, but cleaned up.  Excellent location, short walk into the bustle of downtown but far enough away to avoid the noise and crowds.  Room had plenty of light and a private balcony off the back.  Plenty of storage.  Free wine in the evening, free milk/cookies at night, free continental breakfast in the morning -- all nice extras we didn't realize from the website.  Peter at the front desk was fantastic. Knowledgeable about Laguna Beach, super helpful with restaurant recs, welcoming, just plain great.  He set the tone for our stay.  Issues: Resort fee of $15 kind of silly given the

The room at the Beach House was wonderful, bright, and cheery.  However the $15 parking fee on top of all of the tees loaded on top of the bill kind of gave us a shock.  Also, the booking website seemed to imply that there was more of an ocean view.  There was if you were looking out the back window.  It really did not meet our expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are saddened to hear our coastal views did not meet your expectations. We sincerely hope you can give us another chance to showcase our breathtaking views of the coastline and city accompanied by our lovely hotel amenities. We hope to welcome you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: I grew up in LB and I’m always looking for a great place to stay when visiting. This place is very cute and has a very central location to the beach and downtown. We’ve stayed here a couple of times and always enjoyed it!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. Our central location is ideal for anyone looking to visit the highlights of Laguna, including beautiful beaches and the lively downtown area. We are always thrilled to welcome back our return guests and we look forward to your next stay. Thank you again.   Best,  Shayan V

Summary: $15 for Wifi another $15 to park. You can park half a block north of PCH on the street for free. Pool/Jacuzzi was closed, with no mention of this on their reservation website. You are over paying to be in Laguna Beach which is a beautiful area. Room was nice.

We were in Laguna Beach on business and the company that hired us put us up here.  This is a smaller, older property undergoing renovation (almost finished) that is on the beach side of the Pacific Coast Hwy (but not quite "on the beach").  There's a beach-side "surfer" decor, with lots of whites and light pastels, and surfing decorations (we found it pleasant, though we did note some minor "cutting corners" with the new furnishings).  We had a 2nd floor "coastal view" room which did offer views of the ocean, though there were some buildings directly behind the property.  Our room was pretty quiet, with little road or property noise (a pleasant surprise).  Water pressure was adequate, temperature excellent (shower water could get positively toasty if I wanted it that way),
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We appreciate your understanding during our time of renovation and we are glad you were still able to enjoy our hotel and the amenities we offer. Since we are walking distance to plenty of shops and restaurants, our spacious and covered parking lot is the best place to leave your car during your stay. Once again, we appreciate your understanding and thank you for your feedback. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Short stay with my husband, the hotel was clean, check in was welcoming and even offered us wine. The room was comfortable, and the partial ocean view was awesome. We definitely plan on returning hopefully for a longer stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, especially the room and beautiful coastal view. We are looking forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: A gem of a hotel, will definitely come back!
Summary: I wanted to visit Laguna Beach so fired up Google to look for hotels. This place was picked on price and proximity to the beach and little else. It turned out to be the best random decision I've made on a trip in a long time!  Parking in the car park under the hotel was easy. The reception staff were fantastic - super friendly, helpful, and informative. I'm so grateful, it makes such a difference to get a warm welcome like this. I was given a complimentary glass of wine too - gets things off on the right step.  The room was lovely... set back from the pool, fire pit and hot tub area, it was bright and spacious. A comfortable table and seating area by the door, a lovely big comfortable bed, modern TV and cable, bathroom, and a lovely basin in a wash area.  The beach is just 5-10
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience at the Beach House. I agree that our wine hour, cookies and milk, spacious beach themed rooms and convenient location all add to the Laguna experience. We aim to create memorable experiences for all our guests and we are thrilled you enjoyed your stay at the Beach House and your visit to Laguna Beach. We are delighted that we were able to be a part of your trip to the states and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Thank you again.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: A perfect little self-enclosed hideaway in Laguna Beach.  Steps from the stunning Heisler park and beaches, and a short 5 to 10 minute walk down the hill into town.  Rooms spacious and contemporary, very nice and accommodating staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed your time exploring Laguna Beach while staying at the Beach House. With beach chairs, towels, and umbrellas available at the front desk and the beach just minutes away, we encourage all our guests to enjoy the beach year round. Thank you again for sharing your review and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: I surprise my future wife w/a get-a-way birthday trip to Laguna Beach House and she love it there!! She even love the fact that we can see the ocean from our patio view. Also love the wine complimentary.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. Our breathtaking coastal views pair nicely with a glass of wine, available during our wine hour. We are glad you and your future wife loved the Beach House and we look forward to celebrating with you again. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Awesome hotel with large rooms decorated with a So Cal vibe. Pool and hot tub are nice before heading out on the town. Lobby has wine hour and nice small breakfast in the morning. Close walk to galleries restaurants and beach. Real cool place.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad you enjoyed our awesome hotel, including the wine hour, breakfast, pool and hot tub. We try our best to create a SoCal vibe throughout the hotel, from the rooms to the lobby, we try to make the hotel into a true Beach House. Thank you again for sharing your review and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: Overall we had a nice stay. The rooms were comfortable (the beds and pillows are fantastic) and the staff very nice. We used the pool and jacuzzi which were great. The coffee in the lobby in the morning was a nice touch and the munchies in the room were healthy and good quality.

We really enjoyed this hotel.  The surroundings and rooms were very clean.  There is a small heated pool, jacuzzi and fire pit. The location is perfect to the promenade and beach accesses and they provide you with chairs and umbrellas.  You can walk to town or on week-end take a free trolley nearby.   The only thing I could comment is that they offer breakfast that consist of yogurt with granola, coffee or tea which was fine by me but if you prefer a more complete breakfast, you would have to go out.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities of our property and that you were able to take advantage of our convenient location. Our granola and yogurt accompanied by coffee and tea are a great breakfast option but, as you mentioned, if you are craving more, we are walking distance to great restaurants and cafes. Thank you again for sharing your kind review. We hope to welcome you back very soon.   Best,   Shayan V

Summary: We had a great time here. Most hotels fail in comparison to their online photos, Laguna Beach house is the exception. Awesome room, amenities and staff! Will definitely be coming back to this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are glad to hear our online photos accurately represent the Beach House and the amenities we have to offer. We are delighted you enjoyed our rooms, amenities and staff while staying with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best, Shayan V

Summary: One of the reasons for booking this was it said breakfast included. All that was there was coffee,tea,and a few bites of yogurt. Quite disappointed with that. They did have wine hour every day. All the items in the room were for sale so you were confused with what you could use. The refrigerator was totally full of their items so you couldn't get your stuff in there. People were nice. Beds were good.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are saddened to hear that our breakfast options and our set up of the mini bar items were disappointing. We appreciate all feedback and we strive to make improvements based on guest experiences. We hope that you will give us another chance to exceed your expectations in the future.   Best, Shayan V

Summary: I loved the Laguna Beach House.  It has that boutique hotel feel with a high personal touch.  The staff were very engaging and friendly.  They were eager to please us during the entire two night visit.  I loved the decor of the lobby and guest rooms.  Also, they provided wine & cookies in the evening and coffee and granola & yogurt for breakfast.  The view was spectacular too!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Laguna Beach House. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We pride ourselves on providing personalized service to each guest and ensuring that every guest has a unique and memorable experience. Thank you for sharing your review. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: I loved the room and the little balcony where I could see the ocean.  The pool, the gas fire feature, and the entire ambiance of this hotel were great! And they have free warm cookies and milk!  And proximity to the beach was just what I wanted, coming from the cold north!But the best thing about this place was the service.  There was a mixup (woeful lack of communication) from management that messed up my booking and Peter and Michelle at the front desk were really helpful in fixing the problem.  I loved this hotel and will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and we will make sure to share your kind words with Peter and Michelle. Our excellent customer service accompanied by the ambiance of the hotel and it's proximity to the beach make the Beach House the perfect destination for all travelers. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best, Shayan V

Summary: Stayed a couple of nights here.  It's a suitable choice.   Close rather than on the beach.  Parking is extra.  They charge a further $15 resort fee per night, which is a shameful way of extracting more money out of guests.  How they can claim to provide breakfast is beyond me. A handful of cereal and yoghurt and absolutely no choice.   Staying here won't be the highlight of any trip but will keep the rain off.  Would not go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. I am sorry to hear you were disappointed with the breakfast options. We appreciate the feedback and will take it into careful consideration. I do hope that you will allow us another chance to exceed your expectations. We truly hope to welcome you back.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary Heading: Nice place, right by the beach!
Summary: Great location, room was nice and big, love the spanish beach theme.  Wife and I had a great time!  We'd definitely come back, booked a 1 night stay on hotels tonight and was well worth it, thanks again!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review. We are so happy to hear you were fond of our hotel and we cannot wait to welcome you back soon.  Best,  Shayan V

Summary: We loved this hotel. Had a great homely beach vibe to it. Close enough to the beach and access to a fabulous coastal path that you may not notice if staying at other hotels. We had a lovely room with partial ocean view. Had everything you could want. They have a free glass of wine and snacks at around 5pm in the lobby and cookies (and milk if you want) when you return in the evening. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Pool area was perfect. Comfortable loungers and pool and jacuzzi are small but perfect for a small hotel. Bit of a walk in to the main town area but not a problem as felt very safe and the walk via the coastal path was tremendous. Lovely place away from the corporate style norm.

Laid back feel good  California vibe hotel really enjoyed our stay the staff are so friendly and helpful so informative made us feel so welcomed and nothing was to much trouble can't wait to return Laguna is amazing

Extremely Clean rooms. Great views from the front room. Was surprised that the breakfast was rather meager and that there were no microwaves in the room. The bathrobes were a nice touch. Very atttentive front desk staff.

Have been coming here for over 10 years and the Laguna Beach House just gets better and better each year.  Especially appreciate the very friendly and most helpful staff.  I like the location just a short walk to town, Heisler Park and the beaches.

Laguna Beach house is a great hotel in a great location. The rooms are updated, clean and charming. The bed is very comfy. We enjoyed the hot tub and pool. The walkway along the coast is only a block away and  must do! The only disappointment was the ocean view which really was a view of the parking lot with a sliver of the ocean viewable over the building in front of us. If the view was as expected this would be a five star review

The location of this hotel was excellent, and so was the friendly staff.  Unfortunately our room was near the highway and not the sea, so we heard lots of cars all day and some of the night.  We could, however, see the ocean from our beds.  The walk to town through beautiful Heisler Park was only 5 minutes.As seniors, we felt the room could have added some features such as grab bars in the shower.  Also, more than one towel rack, esp. by the sink would have been helpful. and a hook behind the bathroom door.The room was beautifully furnished and spacious.  There is an elevator.We appreciated the added touch of tea and coffee in the morning in the lobby with little containers of yogurt and granola.Altogether, it was a good experience.

I spent lots of time reading reviews and price checking hotels in Laguna after we booked our flights to CA and I was very pleased with my decision to book Laguna Beach House! We booked direct with the hotel with a special park and play rate. We were welcomed upon arival by the  aroma of fresh baked cookies and a very friendly young man at reception. The hotel is small and quaint like you’d expect to find in a beach town. A casual, friendly surfer chic vibe. Our room, 209 was located on the 2nd (top) floor across from the elevator. I was worried about the noise but it wasn’t an issue. The ocean is about two blocks behind the hotel but you could see the ocean from our room. The bed was super comfy and is within walking distance to numerous restaurants, a grocery store and the

We were in town for a wedding. Loved the vibe. Enjoyed hanging around the pool and the fite pit w friends. The location was fabulous. Walked to shopping, lunch and dinner.  The town has a great beach. We walked to get coffe in the mornings and sat and watched the sun come up. There are many gr at shops and boutiques.  Be sure to take in all of the fabulous art and galleries.

Had a fantastic time at LBH. Room was clean and well appointed. Pool area was a little small but had everything we needed or wanted. There is no food service on site but a short walk offers all kinds of great take out to bring back pool side. The staff was incredibly friendly. Each night offering a wine down happy hour, and cookies and milk later in the evening. Mornings offered coffee and yogurt with granola that we took to Hespler Park (just behind the hotel) each morning to enjoy. We would not hesitate coming back as a couple or with kids.

Fantastic location near the beach, shopping and dining. Really comfortable beds and very clean rooms.!!!!!!! Love wine hour and yogurt and  coffee  in the morning  was a nice touch! Will go back again soon!

Although the room had no view as the stair wall was opposite the room was lovely. Conveniently the ice box was right outside the room. Fantastic position and reception ladies lovely. Well worth the stay for 2 nights. Beach was great and nearby supermarket was good.

The staff are incredibly helpful and accommodating. The decor is perfect for the surfer / Laguna beach vibe. Pool are is small but why hang around a pool when you have such a beautiful beach. The rooms are really clean and they promote eco-friendly vibe. The only criticism is that they have a mini-bar on the floor (?) full of alcohol and really that is a bit old-school. I'd prefer a fridge so I can put my own water and things in the fridge. And why on the floor where I have to get on my knees. Other than that I'll always go back.

Stayed in September in a King Balcony room. Room was nice had trouble with the room lock the first day. They fixed this but left door ajar for a few hours as we were out. I advised the manager and they gave us half off the room and some items from the mini bar. We also had 2 free drinks at the sister hotel Laguna Beach Inn just a 5 minute walk down the road. You can also enjoy the wine hour over there. Really great location right in front of Heisler Park and short walk to the beach , museums, bars and restaurants. The 5 stars is for the very friendly staff who were very helpful and took care of the situation with the room lock. I would stay there again!

Summary Heading: Clean room, fun staff, great location
Summary: This was our  2nd trip to this hotel and I love the quaintness of this hotel. Kid friendly, free use of beach items, outgoing staff, nightly wine tastings, free breakfast (yogurt and granola), hot tub and pool.

We arrived in Laguna Beach for a long weekend.  The Laguna Beach House is very cute and the details in the decorating made the ambiance of this quaint hotel.  Check in was a breeze.  We booked a king room with balcony.  The balcony faced the north with a view of another building, really not worth the upgrade.The Laguna Beach House is walking distance to a variety of restaurants, shopping and art galleries.  In addition, prime access to the beach!  Enjoy the beautiful sunsets from Heisler Park.

Sometimes it’s nice to go somewhere that is practically “in your backyard”. When travellers consider hitting the road, planning a trip to a nearby destination is not always high on their list. For our Family Labor Day Weekend Get-Away, we chose a jaunt down to Laguna Beach, an easy hour plus drive away, and stayed at the Laguna Beach House. The hotel, conveniently situated on the PCH [aptly dubbed Coastal Highway in the oceanside hamlet] is a reasonable walk away from the hub of Laguna Beach [one could drive to the town center, of course, but then you’d have to put up with traffic and find parking], not to mention its distance from downtown Laguna Beach offers some peace and quiet from the busy city center.  The rooms [we had two] were ample and comfortable. The mini bar and

Summary Heading: Great local place to stay made metter by the "little things"
Summary: This is a great place to stay, close to the beach, close to the walking trail park and all of the other reasons you go to Laguna Beach.   Rather than shuffle you away after check-in, there is a free Wine hour followed later by a free cookies and milk hour, all of which we fabulous.  The grounds are clean and clutter-free, covered underground parking is plentiful, and the rooms are spacious and comfortable.  Overall a great place to stay.

This is an older but cute hotel.  I think it was more expensive than it was worth.  Watch out for the extras.  After you pay for your stay, they charge another $112 for “incidentals” which they refund, or reverse the charge when you check out as long as you haven’t purchased any of their stupidly priced easily available items (like a small $65 beach towel).  They have an individual coffee maker in each room for which they provide decaf coffee pods.  If however we wanted caffeinated we had to purchase on of the $4 per cup pods from their “goodie” basket.  Then, if you use their provided coffee maker or any other of their “provided with room” items, you are charged $12!!!   To park in their parking lot, they charge you $15 per day!  The traffic right outside the hotel is

Summary Heading: Perfect Place for a Beach Getaway
Summary: Our stay at Laguna Beach House was just the very best! The staff was amazing and so welcoming. Troy, Pete, Michelle and Annette are fantastic! Troy gave us restaurant recommendations and his suggestions were amazing and on point. The housekeeping team was extremely friendly and they took very good care of us and our room.  The proximity of this property to downtown Laguna Beach, shopping and the beach could not be any better.  We are definitely looking forward to returning in the very near future!

First I would like to thank the staff at reception...they were v friendly and in particular Dennis really helped us out.  The hotel is a little on the pricey side but this IS Laguna Beach and afterall the location is great as it is just a few mins walk away from the beach, Heisler park and town centre.  Rooms are well appointed and a nice little pool, hot tub and gas fire area in the courtyard.  They provide a small breakfast of granola and fruit and in the evening they lay on wine and doughnuts.  The only real negative was that we could hear the people in the room upstairs walking around.  Overall, we loved out stay.  It was the perfect spot to recuperate after our flight from Hong Kong before we headed off for the rest of our holiday.  As long as the price was not too high

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay. Great Location. Excellent Staff. Incredible Ambience. Thoughtful Amenities.
Summary: My wife and I just returned from a 4 night stay in this amazing boutique hotel. Cannot say enough good things about our stay. We absolutely love the location (  a short walk south to the main village, just a block from Hiesler Park Promenade, and surrounded by many excellent restaurant options). The rooms are spacious and very well appointed. The "beach house theme" is faithfully rendered, and no details are overlooked. The entire staff are exemplary. A big shout out to Peter, who always greeted us with a smile. His indepth knowledge of the area and spot on dining recommendations greatly enhanced our experience. We stayed in a coastal King room with a lovely view of the village and coastline from our private patio. Great wines complementary at Happy Hour, fresh homemade cookies

The hotel is great! The decór of the hotel and the rooms are very stylish, surfing culture themed, beautiful big rooms. The service was great too, every person at reception was outstanding in their hospitality.  There were little extras which added to the experience, for example for a couple of hours in the afternoon their serve free wine and in the evening free milk and cookies :) The location is perfect - just a few minutes walk from the beach and downtown with lots of shopping, cafes, bars and restaurants.  Some people commented about loud AC, it is true, the AC in our room looked old and was very noisy (had to turn it off at night), but this could not spoil our overall experience. Totally recommended!
Manager Response: Hi O_Ksu_Dubai, Thank you so much for the kind review! We appreciate it! We really love our staff here and we all try hard to make everyone's stay an exemplary one. I'm so glad you had a good experience. We hope to see you again very soon.  Thanks, -Steven

Summary: This was very basic but really cute. All the details separated it from your average run on the mill motel. The bathroom was nice as was the decor. Staff was friendly! Hot tub was way to small but we met some nice people waiting for our turn to take a dip.

This hotel has everything you imagine a beach hotel to be. The view was amazing. Staff was so professional, very helpful and accommodating. Beach access is right around the corner. Room was beautiful and coastal decor gave it that beach house feel. Coffee, tea and parfaits for breakfast in the lobby. Awesome mini bar also. We can’t wait to book a longer stay next summer.

This beach themed hotel is rated high for a reason. It is in a great location very close to the beach. We were in 201 and had a direct view of the ocean. The rooms are clean and spacious. The staff are incredibly friendly and provided terrific advise on restaurants. Free happy hour and warm cookies, breakfast coffee and granola/yogurt are provided every day. We we offered beach towels, chairs and an umbrella to use free of charge which were priceless in the hot afternoon sun. The pool is small however we never used it with the ocean so close. The fire pit was very inviting.

Went to this beach in late August with husband and two children and fell in love with it. Beautiful clear water, some waves (a few were rough), but so relaxing with breathtaking views to the right and left as well as restaurants close by. Great OC beach!

We absolutely loved this hotel! The location is perfect - just a block from Heisler Park, and short walk to the main beach. The hotel decor is perfect, and the room and bed were very comfortable. Nice amenities of yogurt/granola in the AM, wine hour in the PM (but really you should go over to their sister property for great seating with a fabulous view for this), then milk & cookies later PM. Plenty of beach chairs & umbrellas for the beach. The pool is a bit small, but we only like to dip and the hot tub was great. We plan to stay here again!
Manager Response: Hi CE1962, Thank you so much for the kind review! We're so glad you enjoyed the hotel décor and comfort of our beds. The amenities are also a nice touch to share with our guests. We're also glad you'd like to stay with us again...we'd be happy to have you! -Steven

Summary Heading: Nice but too expensive for a bad sleep in season
Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 2 night in August. The hotel is very nicely decorated. The room are also nice, large and clean. The staff is very friendly. The small pool is ok and there is a fire pit. The location is close to the center and the beach. The wi-fi did not really work very well.However, the main purpose in an hotel should be to have a nice sleep in our opinion. Unfortunately this is not guaranteed as the system of air conditioning was so loud, we couldn't let it work during the night as it was really so loud. So we had to turn it off and consequently didn't sleep well, because was getting way too warm in the room. All in all this hotel was ok, but still a bit too expensive for what you get, especially in high season.

This place was perfect.  cute close to everything and the staff were beyond friendly.  Yes, you can notice that it is an older property that has been updated... I personally think that it added to the charm.  The beds were super comfy and we had everything we needed.  Don't forget their 'fancier' sister property has complimentary sunset happy hour that you can crash when you stay here!  Cant beat Free Cookies & Happy Hour

We really liked this hotel. Stayed here for two nights as a family of four. The room was large with seating out front as well as a small balcony. There is a nice pool which although on the small side, we enjoyed as well as a hot tub, sun loungers and fire pit.  The hotel offers wine at 5pm and cookies at 6pm which were enjoyed and appreciated. Easy enough to walk to the beach, shops and restaurants or you can hop on the trolley. We had a picnic overlooking the beach and spotted dolphins. It was wonderful.  The room was clean and nicely decorated, with lots of space. The staff were friendly and helpful.

We were able to check in early. When we got to the room, the first thing we noticed was the cleanliness of the room. I always choose hotels that used white beddings, that way you can spot right away how clean it is. Hotel Staff are very accommodating and friendly.

We were there for the festivals.  We were able to walk everywhere- even to the Sawdust festival.  We ate dinner a block away at Las Brisas.  There was a rowdy group spending the afternoon drinking outside our room, but it was not too bad.

You will pay $15 for parking and $15 for "resort" fees but it is worth it. The staff goes far and beyond to make you comfortable and provides towels, wine and cookies. The location is perfect. Will visit again.

Loved this friendly hotel for it’s beachy feel and amenities.  Especially want to thank Annette, peter, and Troy for giving us such help and assistance.  It’s just 2 blocks to las Brisas restaurant for a great lunch or dinner experience and one block to the walking trail along the cliff face.  We will return!

Really nice hotel, conveniently located just a couple of blocks from the beach.  Nice rooms, well maintained.  I absolutely hate review sites that have a minimum character count for their reviews, did I say how much I hate minimum character requirements.....

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Great Stay, Perfect Beach Hotel
Summary: Needed a place for 1 night, i like new and modern and clean and white, this hotel was perfect. beautiful, new beachy rooms....we had 2 queens, pool level, and it was a huge room with a little balcony. they serve wine at 5 pm in lobby and cookies and milk at 6 pm, cute touches. Location perfect walking distance to sawdust festival or you can take free shuttle steps from hotel, dont get turned off by first appearance, not much to see from outside, but would stay again. small pool, also has jacuzzi. but good enough for the kids to take a swim. centrally located to everything.

Summary Heading: Great place to relax and enjoy the Laguna beach life
