I decided on the spur of the moment to return to the Laguna Beach House after the family event for a SECOND stay. I will be back to enjoy The Laguna Beach House many more times in the future.  It's a real gem!  With Aloha, Carol/Kona!

Summary Heading: Great service and fun. Good value
Summary: Three generations (3 people) recently stayed. Such a great choice - spacious and comfortable room, good location, friendly and fun staff. Loved the extra touches - lots of beach/pool towels available, hot drinks & yoghurt/muesli in the morning, free wine o'clock every afternoon followed by free milk & cookies, the use of beach chairs and umbrellas to take to the beach. It was a little chilly but the pool water was heated and there is an outdoor fire by the pool. Will definitely stay again and would recommend to anyone. Loved the afternoon games of dominoes (available in the foyer) with wine!

Summary Heading: Dazzled by the quality, charming upgrades
Summary: We have been going to this hotel for many years.  It has a new owner and a wonderful new vibe...'Beach Cottage' done with such good taste in finishes and decor.  Really such an inviting environment filled with charming touches at every turn.  The staff was welcoming, accommodating...especially Louis who went above and beyond to insure all our wishes and preferences were met.  We are eager to return!

everyone was friendly. Rooms seem like they have been updated recently. enjoyed the decor in our room and around the hotel.  didnt realize it was pet friendly this led to aromas at times. backs to a beautiful part of the beach and really quaint shop a couple of doors down.

We stayed here one night when we were stopping through Laguna.  It was on the same side of the street as the beach, which was nice.  There is an awesome walking path that the hotel backs up to.  You can walk to most of the shops  / restaurants downtown. The rooms were very clean and big.  We would stay here again!

The hotel is newly renovated.  Everything is decorated in a beach/surfing theme.  It's clean, the bed is very comfortable and the staff is friendly and attentive.  There are chairs and tables outside the rooms for sitting out with a drink.  You can't beat the location.  You can walk to the beach and the town.  We could see the beach from our balcony.  The hotel is dog friendly and they don't even charge a fee for the dog.  There is parking under the hotel.  We will return to this hotel again.

Had a wonderful stay here over memorial weekend with a group of friends. Loved the recent remodel and all that they did with the decor -- very Cali boho surfer chic. Nice little touches like the milk and cookies were a hit too.  The staff were particularly awesome and accommodated our last minute change when we needed an additional bed. Wish we could have stayed longer!!

Really enjoyed our stay at this aptly named spot. I believe it is newly updated and the small touches give that complete sand between your toes vibe. The lobby is super hip and perfectly curated with rustic Cali artefacts. The rooms are well sized and of chic surf design- love the book shelf, hanging boards and in particular the south of the border bathroom sink. The staff were really on point with precise yet not too formal service. Of all this two things really stood out to me. 1. The best mini bar selection I have ever seen(strange I know!) 2. You actually get the feel of being a resident of Laguna. Of the various hotels in the area this is unique. Being nestled among the locals with views of the lawn bowls club and Pacific really makes you feel part of the scene. The

The Hotel is Great . The Front Desk personal is Very Nice. House keeping is another Story.   I would not recommend bring your pets. For House keeping make Big Issues and will cost you the Pet Waver. No Matter what you do to make every effort to take responsibility of your animals.   My dog had gotten sick while there and he used the patio potty. {while, was Water like Accidents} I proceeded to get rags and disinfectant from house keeping to clean up after every mess. I also used Hot water and soap. Ice was in his kennel 95 % of the time unless we were to go for walks or he was sick and we couldn't make it outside. Because of the issues I was Having with my Dog, I decided to cut my stay One day short.   House keeping Supervisor proceeds to tell the owner there was Dog Pooh on the
Manager Response: Dear Marlys A,  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Laguna Beach House.  We take all comments positive and negative seriously as we will learn from both.  We will certainly review our pet policy in order to avoid situations like yours in the future.  I am terribly sorry Ice was not feeling well and I am equally sorry you feel you cannot trust our staff.  We would love to restore your faith in the our product and service the next time you are in Laguna Beach, please give us a second chance to exceed you expectations.  Please reach out to me directly the next time you plan to visit.    Thank you,  Rachel

Summary: One star because I had to. It was and has been hell since my visit two weeks ago. Here's part of a letter I wrote to the general manager (in which I didn't get a reply on obviously), it should explain everything.   Rachel,  This hotels mistakes has put me in a financial mess. I do not have anymore time to spend on this issue. I have now been charged even more in overdraft fees than the cost of the room and your "smoking fee." Both my visit and the post experience were daunting which makes it hard for me to be patient. I am losing sleep at night and thinking about this issue even when I am at work because nothing seems to be getting done. (I also have a medical condition that can worsen due to this stress) Personally, I along with the friends I was staying at the hotel with felt
Manager Response: Dear Najiaam,  Thank you for your comments regarding your visit to The Laguna Beach House.  I am terribly sorry you did not receive a response to your letter; unfortunately, I did not receive it.  As per our phone conversations I am currently working with your bank to resolve the situation.  I would like to apologize for the less than favorable experience you had with my Guest Service Team, we strive to make every guest feel welcomed and clearly we did not deliver and for that I am truly sorry.  I want to rebuild your trust and faith in our property, please give us a second chance to do so.  Please reach out to me directly when you are ready to return to Laguna Beach.    Thank you, Rachel

Summary: Our son lives nearby so we have stayed here at least several times as it is somewhat affordable. They have done a great job with the remodel and it has received a totally new look. The rooms are quite refreshing from the old tired and dark look they once had. We wish they had glassware for the bar instead of plastic and paper cups. The shower gurgled when the toilet was flushed.....ugh and they no longer offer any pastries or fruit in the morning. The basket of snacks are ridiculously expensive and priced as if they don't really want you to take any. The staff is nice but it is really just one person at the front desk.

Summary Heading: Well done...applause for Laguna Beach House!
Summary: Stayed 2 night in oceanview room 208. The recent renovations have lightened up the surroundings and made this hotel very inviting. Parking is $14 but honestly, the walks to town easy so you don't the care very much. This hotel is located one block from Hessler Park, a beautifully landscaped park along the beach, so accessing ocean is quick and easy. Every morning, we walked to downtown Laguna Beach 15 minute walk and found great food and desserts (the deck for breakfast and gelato paradiso for gelato. There is also a whole foods on broadway and many oranice food and juice choices. We have stayed twice before and this third time was the best. Thank you Rachel Tejada for making our stay so pleasant and relaxing!

My fiancé and I recently visited The Laguna Beach House hotel , it was amazing! The wine reception, milk and cookies before bed and the coffee in the morning were great but what really made the stay perfect was the level of customer of service that Troy delivered.... Troy went above and beyond . , The rooms were beautiful & the bed extremely comfortable ...  Views of the beach were breath taking & romantic  We cannot wait to book our next long weekend there..  Thank you  Tammy & Douglas

Summary Heading: Fantastic place to stay in Laguna Beach!
Summary: We stayed here for a long weekend and were thoroughly pleased with this hotel.  Recent renovations complete and they offer a quaint, friendly and convenient place to stay while visiting Laguna Beach.  Within walking distance to Main Beach, Las Brisas and the downtown area, we found it to be a great option for our family.  Every night we enjoyed the hot tub/jacuzzi and pool, followed by time by the fire pit.  The beds are very comfortable and each room is clean, updated and retro style beach decor.  (I am a hotel snob and chose this hotel over a 4 star option!). The staff is very friendly and helpful each time you pass through the lobby area.  They made fantastic breakfast and dinner suggestions for us along with ensuring that our bags were taken care of on our last day in town.

What a fantastic trip my wife and I had staying at this property. The staff was friendly knowledgeable about the area  and very helpful. The hotel is just steps from the gorgeous Heisler park where we sat on the abundant benches to watch the whales,dolphins, surfers, and the waves crashing. When you decide to adventure to the many beaches within walking distance, the front desk has beach umbrellas and beach towels and even chairs that you can check out. I could not recommend  a better hotel  in Laguna . Special shout out  to Emily at the front desk for going above and beyond

We went to this hotel in April for my birthday on a travelzoo voucher. The room was king size bed pool level (handicap) room. It was nice, clean and beach style but was laid out awkwardly for a couple who are not handicapped. There were no clean pool towels available and when we asked the laundry attendendant if there were any available she just replied "no"! She didn't say that she would look into it or there would be some towels available in a short time. The male room attendant was extremely helpful and got us pool towels. The staff is very open to suggestions and served wine from 4-6 pm then milk and cookies from 6-8pm. Fresh coffee in the morning. The only downside is this hotel has no room service for food. The second trip was may 7-8 my husbands birthday. I requested a

Very nice place that unfortunate fell short on the service.  We came down here from canada for 5 days for a vacation. At first glance it is a very nice place and it's really to bad I have to give it a bad review -backed up shower from someone hair for our entire visit -they only cleaned the room once even though we requested it -ran out of toilet paper for the last two days -they never stocked our coffee or water up -one caffeine and one decaf coffee for two people per day  -never stocked up the mini bar  Again it's unfortunate and I have ever hope that this was just an off week for the hotel as it would be sad to think these are due to a lack of caring.

I have never stayed in such a perfect place in USA. Interior was stylish up to details, personnel very friendly, rooms beautiful, very clean, wine was good, nice fireplace, pool warm, very quiet and nice neighbours etc. Thank You!
Manager Response: Dear liivakati,  We could not agree with you more on calling our beach house the best place ever!  You have mentioned some of our great amenities such as our nightly wine reception, heated swimming pool, and our fire pit.  I would also like to thank you for mentioning our friendly personnel.  They provide our guests with attentive service and are always ready to help make your stay with us perfect.  Liivakati, thank you again for such a great review.  We hope that you will be able to visit us again soon.  Warm Regards, Rachel

Summary: I was so pleasantly surprised by this little gem.  Katie at the front desk was so nice & helpful, the decor is perfect casual beach, my room was spacious, clean and fun.  Love it, will definitely go back.

There is nothing like escaping from the hustle and bustle of Los Angeles and staying at the Laguna Beach House for a relaxing getaway. I really appreciated the attentiveness of the staff. From the moment I walked in they greeted me and continued to ensure my stay was the best it could be.   The rooms were spacious and the decor really made me feel I was in a coastal town.  I would recommend hanging out by the pool or taking a walk down to the shops downtown. The weather can't be beat!

My husband & I enjoyed a night away at this incredible Laguna Beach Bungalow!  From the moment we checked in, with the incredibly friendly & helpful staff including Troy & Rachel, this place blew us away. The tasteful decor & sweeping ocean views made it the perfect spot to relax & unwind at. Every detail in the hotel lobby, from the lined up colorful surfboards, to the surf report chalkboard, to the rope wall & table for 2 chess board set, this place is IMMACULATE & CHIC!  Plus, the pool deck & fire pit was THE spot to enjoy the magical sunset.  We can't wait to visit again soon and bring our little baby!

Summary Heading: Hands down favorite hotel in Laguna!
Summary: A cozy hotel that feels like home from the moment we walk through the door!  We already loved the friendly staff and great location, but the renovation of this hotel has taken it to a new level!  Beach access is just around the corner behind the hotel and all of our favorite restaurants and shops are a short walk down Heisler trail.  Milk and cookies each night are always a hit with our kids, as is the new fire pit, a great spot for s'mores under the stars!  We really wouldn't stay anywhere else!

What a gem this place is.  I had the pleasure of staying here during their first week of new ownership.  The place has been redone from top to bottom and it's not hard to notice.  If you're looking for a super clean-feeling and healthy environment in Laguna, this is it.  Nothing over the top, nothing stuffy, but everything refreshing.

Summary Heading: Coastal Chic in the Heart of Laguna
Summary: Love the renovation! The rooms have completely transformed and are very clean, chic and spacious. I love all of the little interior decorations; gave the place a relaxed beach feel. The location of the Laguna Beach House could not be more ideal, no car necessary! I will certainly return.

My girlfriend and I had a great time in Laguna Beach while staying at the Laguna Beach House.  We were looking for an easy getaway from LA and this turned out to be perfect.  The hotel was just what we were looking for: walking distance to downtown with a nice beach vibe.  The room was spacious and clean and we loved the little beachy touches throughout.  It was a great home base for our trip.  We parked the car when we showed up and didn't touch it until we left.  Definitely walk over and check out the Laguna Beach Art Museum.  It has a great collection of mostly Southern California art (Ruscha, Baldessari, etc.) and it's small enough so that you can see and appreciate everything.  Also, on your way out of town swing by the Sherman Library in Corona del Mar for a world class
Manager Response: Sean B,  I am thankful to hear that you had a perfect weekend with us in Laguna Beach.  Laguna Beach is the perfect getaway for our LA friends.  Our downtown area, which is in short walking distance, offers a great variety of activities.  Whether you are looking for a few art galleries, shops, or dining you will be sure to find it in Laguna.  I hope that others will take your recommendation to stop at the Laguna Art Museum as well.  It is the perfect venue to spend the morning while taking in the art.  Thank you again Sean B.  We hope to see you in the near future.  Regards, Rachel T

Summary: I have no question that this is one of the best hotel renovations in long time. For a small funky spot they have really made HUGE changes. All the furniture, décor, and renovations are spot on for the cool beach vibe they are going for. They have a sister hotel right down the street so you know that they have the crew to do this right. This will be a go to for me and surely worth recommending.  Great staff, comfortable rooms, and priced right!

I took my girlfriend here for a quick weekend getaway. You couldn't have asked for a nicer location and room. The view every morning out of the room is priceless. The staff was very helpful as well, parking was limited and on the front desk personnel moved there own car so we could park.

Love what they have done with this place! Such an affordable and relaxing hotel in a steller location. Excellent rooms, super lovely staff. Loved the small touches like flavoured water in lobby and all the art around the place too. Very restful stay. Will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Ann A,  Thank you for calling us the coolest motel ever!  You have definitely pointed out some of our highlights such as great location, lovely staff, and some of our small touches such as our flavored orange water.  As you walk around the property you will find some cool pieces of art such as our California Republic flag, vintage photographs and surf boards.    Ann A, thank you again for your review and we hope to see you in the near future.  Warmest Regards, Rachel

Summary: I recently stayed here for a romantic weekend getaway with my super hot girlfriend. We had an amazing time. The rooms have a classic beach/surf vibe and the staff is so friendly. The views are great and it's so close to all the shops and restaurants that we were able to leave our car in the parking garage and walk everywhere. If you are looking for a great weekend getaway I highly recommend the Laguna Beach House.

Summary Heading: Laguna has needed a place like this for a Long Time
Summary: been visiting Laguna for years. My wife and I live in LA and frequently do quick getaways to Laguna. Thought we'd try out a new place, and what we found with LBH is exactly the type of hotel that laguna has been desperate for. Not a better spot to be found for the price, location, and style. Cool surfer chic vibes around. in the morning, the lobby is great place to sip on some complimentary coffee before taking the 5min walk into town or to the main beach. there's a great locals beach even closer. in the evening have more complimentary beverages, this time being wine, and relax by the pool or in the hot tub, or by the fire pit. Rooms are nice size and comfortable. we had the one with a private porch on the pool level which was brilliant to have as we were traveling with our 1 yr

I love the Laguna Beach House. It has a great surf environment. I think that it is a hotel that would appeal to young surfers traveling to Laguna Beach.  It is in a great area of town.  The fire pit and pool area are awesome.    I would recommend this hotel to any of my friends.
Manager Response: Dear Hayden10324,  I think that your description of the hotel was spot on – we provide a great surf environment!  Once you walk in our lobby doors you are greeted by a warm beach house feel and you can’t help but hang out.  If you are wondering what the waves are like you can always check out our daily surf report board.  But I can’t help but think that the perfect way to end your day is by our fire pit.  Hayden10324, thank you for your great response and we look forward to seeing you again.  Regards, Rachel

Summary: We had a very warm reception from the manager and loved the decor in the Lobby. When we walked into our private patio, complete with water fountain and dining table, and then into our spacious and beautifully decorated room I was speechless. Everything in the hotel has been completely renovated by the owner, who is a local  native Californian and surfer. He really created a first class hotel with a very authentic beachy, surfer vibe of a bygone era, but still has all the amenities one comes to expect from a modern trendy hotel.  The decor and  attention to  detail is truly amazing and iconic California. Everything is first class, including  long comfy bath robes you can wear to the pool, and there are always plenty of fresh plush bath towels available.  Close to downtown and
Manager Response: Dear srdesigns California,  Laguna Beach and our Beach House is truly what California dreams are made of.  As you mentioned our recent 1.5 million dollar renovation transformed our hotel to reflect a modern and trendy hotel with a surfer vibe.    We look forward to seeing you in the near future!  Regards, Rachel

Summary Heading: Stayed begining of April 2015 - Newly remodeled - Fantastic!
Summary: Just love this small hotel right near the Ocean! The rooms are great, clean and very up to date! I would stay here again and again! Newly remodeled. The pool area was great, a nice fire pit and great Jacuzzi! I loved the early morning coffee in the lobby, and the wine they gave out in the evening.

We stayed at the Laguna Beach House hotel and right when I walked into the lobby & again when I saw the pool terrace & again when I saw our room, I felt so relaxed and pumped to be staying here!  Everything is crisp clean & all white with bright splashes of color, very hip decor, felt beachy-bohemian.  The staff was exceptional... the late night cookies & early am coffee delish.  Excellent proximity (5 minute walk to all the shops & restaurants) to downtown Laguna Beach...the beach, volleyball & basketball courts are steps away and cool yoga on the park lawn overlooking the water. To be in this amazing location on the coast of Southern California and to stay in a room with these incredible rates, you cannot find a better hotel!!  Thanks for the awesome stay Laguna Beach House,
Manager Response: Socalgal15,  Thank you for the lovely review!  Like you we have found that our newly renovated hotel provides a place of relaxation in a clean and crisp beach house setting.  We hope to see you in the near future for another relaxing weekend.  Warm Regards, Rachel

Summary: We just spent 5 days vacationing in Laguna beach. The beach house is in a great location only one block from heissler park which is an absolute gem. It's within 3 blocks along the ocean to wonderful restaurants.  And it's within walking distance or a short drive too many hillside paths.  The just renovated hotel is nice in every way.  Tastefully done. Great Hot tub and fire pit.  Poolside is a great place to lounge for the afternoon.  Great coffee in the morning. Great staff. The Laguna beach house is a great hotel in a perfect location.  Don't waste your money on more expensive places. Stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Captnbutch,  We could not agree with you more that the Laguna Beach House is in a great location! We are a short distance away from some of the most beautiful beaches in Laguna Beach along with our downtown area.  After a day exploring we invite our guests to lounge by our new fire pit and enjoy a refreshing beverage.  Captnbutch, thank you for the lovely review and we look forward to seeing you again.  Regards, Rachel

Summary Heading: Dang this place is sweet!!  No sense staying anywhere else in Laguna Beach
Summary: I will make this reveiw easy for you... stay here if your waffling over where to stay in Laguna... Ok more details:  So we rolled in here on a little overnight escape from the kiddos... after a peaceful drive up the 5 from San Diego we arrived in quaint Laguna Beach.  While Laguna is similar to where we live in costal San Diego its just nice to get outta town.  This place was literaly only an hour and 15 min from our house and a world apart.  The hotel is unassuming from the outside but you walk in the front door to find a hip lobby, super friendly staff and the coolest hotel room I have seen in a long time.  Brand new everything... super comfy bed... clean and cool like a summer breeze... ok slight exaggeration but this hotel was nicer than a $400 night place we recently stayed

My wife and I had a great stay at the Laguna Beach House over the weekend. The rooms are clean and beautifully designed and curated. Staff were friendly and really helpful. Great location near the beach. We'll definitely be back to stay again!

Laguna Beach House was the perfect romantic and fun spot for us. Out toom had a great view of the oven and the gentle sound of the waves was the perfect setting for a peaceful nights sleep. The pool area is so lovely with a long swanky firepit to warm by as the soft breeze of the ocean flows by.  We loved the feel of the original layout and the crisp, yet warm feel of the recently remodel. We'll staying there again soon!

I loved the Laguna Beach House! I saw some of the 'before' photos and the space has gotten quite the makeover. The rooms are incredibly cozy and hip, the staff is impeccable and the location is unbeatable (short walk to downtown). I'd highly recommend this for a Laguna get away!

Recently remodeled with really charming, beachy, style.  Perfect spot for a laid back weekend away.  Very attentive and professional staff provided service level of an upscale hotel.  Definitely coming back

Beautiful location for this quaint little, hip, comfortable, California- cool hotel. The views are beautiful and the ability to walk to galleries, bars, restaurants, and beach trails is awesome! Definitely recommended!

My son and I absolutely loved everything about the Laguna Beach House.  The staff is fun, professional and guest service oriented and our room was so crisp, cozy, clean and comfortable. Location is perfect for walking to beach and town.   The hotel is decorated in such a way that brings the beauty of Laguna kitschiness indoors.  This delightful surf environment is exactly what we want in our hotel when on a beach town vaca!!

Once a standard SoCal motor lodge this little hotel has gotten quite a face lift. With clean, modern decor and personal touches like the hand carved surfboards in the lobby this hotel is casual, yet classy. The Beach House is centrally located, right near the heart of Laguna and on PCH, which is great getting to the beach or into town with little effort. But at the end of a long travel day (or a long night out in town) the Beach House does a superb job of making you feel like you've left it all behind once you step into the lobby. Friendly staff, wine in the early evenings and cookies (!), you want to stay more than one night. I certainly did!

Summary Heading: What a great place! Feels just like home...
Summary: What a wonderful, cute find right in the middle of Laguna Beach. Loved the surf feel of the hotel and the way it's been redecorated. Feels just like being at home. Can't wait to return. Hihhly recommended!

Stayed here for a weekend getaway with my wife and loved it! The decor and style of the hotel was very fun and casual - like a California surf bungalow! The location is perfect, right near the beach with downtown just a short walk away. The staff was also very friendly and accomodating - the bed was super comfy as well. Some highlights: Sitting around the firepit relaxing with a glass of wine, walking the path along the beach into town, surfboards in the lobby and the awesome randomness of the mini bar snacks (pop rocks & IPA!?). Would def stay here again.

Just came here for the grand opening event and loved everything they've done to this location. The rooms are cozy and beautifully designed with gorgeous ocean views. Walkable to great restaurants and shops. We will definitely be back!
